story:
A well-functioning brain is key to high performance & win more games. 

neuroLeet helps you in becoming a better and fitter gamer by training your brain! 

An all in one device that seamlessly fits your favorite gaming headset! 

 

This brain enhancement training is known as EEG neurofeedback. The technology is well known and used to treat ADHD, improve creativity & performance, and train NASA astronauts.

NeuroLeet tracks, analyses and improves your cognitive performance with the power of EEG neurofeedback technology! 

 

  • Real-time brainwave feedback (EEG).
  • Using gyros to detect your physical state. 
  • Seamlessly fits your favorite gaming headset.

 

 

  • Software analyses brain patterns.
  • Get a full report on your mental performance.
  • Identify your mental strengths and weaknesses.

 

 

  • Finish interactive training sessions.
  • Follow your progress.
  • Reach the desired state of mind faster and faster.

 

 

neuroLeet application is compatible with Windows 10.

All Indiegogo backers who pre-order neuroLeet will receive a lifetime subscription to the app!

Brain activity, as measured by EEG contains deep insight into your state of mind. Using machine learning algorithms to recognize emotional states, stress levels, and concentration.

Link: EEG

When learning how to ride a bike, you learned how to balance through making small adjustments and feeling the feedback of balance or falling.  Eventually, with enough feedback and practice time, your brain learned how to ride a bike. 

Neurofeedback works in exactly the same way. 

 

 

The neuroLeet SDK has Brainflow as it's base framework.

 

Stretch goals:

 

 

Let your friends know!

Thank you for checking out our project and helping us make neuroLeet a reality.

If you’re a supporter of neuroLeet, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Instagram, Facebook and anywhere else you can think of!

 

Follow us!

story:
Everyone has a dream in a drawer….since today… 

From tomorrow on…

 

How SoKreate works…e.g….MUSIC!

 

Everyone could join in a “social” song creation, even the most inexpert.

It is sufficient to have a jingle in the mind, to whistle and record it, then to upload it on SoKreate.com. If it is appealing, someone best-accomplished could build a song and….make it popular! 

If you already have access to a backing track, a series of guitar chords, or even a complete song, then ... SoKreate is your kingdom!

Ask other members to participate in the build of your song ... or wait until your base is discovered by some musician with a good ear who wants to work with you.

The lyrics authors will instead directly enter their songs and search for musicians who wish to create their musical bases.

Do you use software to mix music tracks? Remix tracks posted on Sokreate and compose so your finished piece.

Are you part of a band? Make directly vote your finished piece and head for glory!

Each artist will have their own fan page and be able to manage the virtual wall.

The finished songs may be used by other artists to create music videos.

You can manage your artist activities through the Android app, iOS, BB and Windows Phone.

A particular “no-abuse” system, designed by us, will protect copyrights and fight plagiarism. 

But SoKreate will give you the opportunity to express your talent even if you are a photographer, a buddy filmmaker, an aspiring chef, a novelist, a cartoonist, a screenwriter, a fashion or jewelry designer or an inventor ... and this is just the beginning! 

  • As a photographer, you can create with other fellow adventurers or just alone photo albums with the same mechanism explained
  • As a novelist, you can post the story or the first chapter of a novel, or a screenplay, and let others to complete your vision! Or directly upload a complete novel!
  • As an amateur video, you can post your videos, maybe using as soundtracks songs created by other users!
  • As a cartoonist, you can collaborate in the creation of comic strips ... or invent a character, the first scenes of a story and let your creature come to life thanks to other SoKreate friends
  • As a fashion or jewelry designer you can invent models and compose with other users or alone entire collections!
  • As an inventor, you can submit an idea, even in draft form, and let others perfect and make it feasible for you
  • As a chef, you can post recipes and see your ideas used as bases for thousands
    • refined courses...

The most fascinating, interesting and funniest creations will be voted on by your fans.

The produced material will initially be owned by SoKreate.com, but every composer of the "social" opera can take part in competitions and the best ones will work with our partners and have back their deserved royalties.

And these are just examples of possible use of SoKreate ... there is no limit to creativity ... with SoKreate.com! 

But SoKreate.com will also be a "normal" multilingual social network.

So you can just be a spectator, chat, post photos, videos, and vote ... of course ... the works of others, directly through your SoKreate account or through the most popular social networks.

As a "fan" you'll have your own board, but you, in your turn, may participate in contests like Mr. or Miss SoKreate.

And of course you can create a "fan page" of your preferred artist.

And…last but not least…access to all works posted, such as listening to the music

created through the SoKreate.com webradio or reading posted e-books.

All this also means an Android, BB, iOS or Windows Phone app. 

Do you want to join in the constitution of the next generation social network, a social network where you finally become the protagonist?

Social networks today allow sharing of moods, moments, experiences…

There is who is active and who is a passive reader. But if more than this, a social network allows you to enhance, integrate, suggest what one wants to share with others?

SoKreate is this, a platform where everyone can make the best thought, the idea, the art of everyone and thanks to the contribution of all make it perfect.

Internet, globalization, social networks have given us a great power that we are using for fun… and this will not change…but having fun, we can improve the world and why not, also have a gain. It 's great to think that a social network can really unite people and nations which are located from opposite sides of the world giving a common purpose.

Forget humanity at the service of social networks, Sokreate is the social network at the service of humanity. 

 

But to do this we need your help.

We are working on this project since two years and we intend to release SoKreate.com in about 10 months, from the moment the campaign will end.

The figure that we estimated as a minimum to allow SoKreate to see the light and support it for at least one year, so that it can then stand on its own feet, is E. 1,925,000 (about $ 2,650,000).

The budget is broken down as follows:

  • E. 450.000 (around $ 615,000) are needed for software development
  • E. 300.000 (around $ 410,000) are needed to support business costs (administrative, commercial, logistics) during the development of software (10 months)
  • E. 150.000 (around $ 205,000) are needed for the technical management of the website and technical support, during the first year of life
  • E. 200.000 (around $ 275,000 ) are needed to ensure quality and compliance during the first year of life
  • E. 400,000 (around $ 550,000) are needed to support business costs (administrative, commercial, logistics) during the first year of life
  • E. 425,000 (around $ 590,000) are needed for taxes (e.g. VAT etc.)

So we ask you for a contribution, huge or little, we will be happy to accept it ... and to thank you the best way we can.

For one euro, you will receive a deep thanks by the founders of SoKreate.com for supporting an initiative that will go down in history.

Per 10 Eur (around $14), you'll have a cute mouse pad with the logo of SoKreate.com. To navigate every day in freedom on SoKreate.com!

For 15 Eur (around $ 20) you will receive an elegant ballpoint pen with SoKreate.com logo, with which you can write your first novel ... and why not .... see it at the top of the SoKreate charts!

For 18 Eur (around $ 25), you will receive a cotton T-shirt of your measurement, branded with the logo of SoKreate.com ... and you may boast to wear a preview of the first fashion product come out of SoKreate!

For 37 Eur (around $ 50) you will have the opportunity to show off the pendant with the logo of SoKreate.com, complete with chain, all in hypoallergenic material. Very chic, very fashion!

For 500 Eur (around prox $ 700), you'll have all to yourself, dear musicians, a beautiful acoustic guitar branded SoKreate.com ... to compose your first "social" song ....

For 5,000 Eur (around $ 6,850) your company could publish an advertisement (banner) on SoKreate.com, visible in every country of the world, for one day and you’ll get a discount if you get an ad for three days or one week.

Every item you will receive will be shipped directly to your home at no additional charge (in the EU). And with it you will also receive the beautiful SoKreate.com stickers.

You will have the option to pay through Paypal: and for any information related to the payment or delivery of your perk, you may contact the address support@sokreate.com.

And if you can not contribute in any way, you always have the opportunity to share this campaign with your preferred social networks friends .... we we will be deeply grateful! 

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/sokreate

TWITTER:    https://twitter.com/SOKREATE

GOOGLE+:  https://plus.google.com/u/0/101562589539850163567/about?hl=it

Lastly, we consider that this initiative will enable millions of people to have a window, which enhances their creativity through the power of the "social" mechanisms.

We believe this will soon allow you to have products of great quality and great appeal, now in the fields of music, literature, photography, comics, cooking, videos, design … but then this mechanism will be easily replicable in other areas where the contribution of many people brings the work of the individual, according to the Magic Formula 1+1=3.

So, in order to reach the campaign goal, we offer for E. 1,900,000 (approx $ 2,640,000) the acquisition, for one year, of the commercial rights for all or part of the material produced through SoKreate.

For partnerships details, please contact partnership@sokreate.com

story:
D3D-s: 3D jewelry scanner

Our D3D-s scanner takes advantage of LED-line technology, combining incredible accuracy and a price you can afford. Our sophisticated software achieves exceptional results when scanning jewelry. This technology does not require expensive projectors and cameras. Thanks to mathematics and highly refined algorithms, jewelers can get a 3D model that meets their demanding requirements for precision. The D3D-s scanner is suitable for both self-employed jewelers and professional teams with experience using super expensive scanners. Kickstarter empowered FormLabs to revolutionize 3D printing. Now Kickstarter will help us revolutionize 3D scanning for jewelers!

 

6 degrees of freedom 

You'll face challenges when scanning with projection technology. Complex objects will require you to repeatedly reposition the model and be fully engaged in the scanning process. We've solved this problem. The D3D-s was designed to not require repositioning, so all you have to do is place the object on the table and start scanning. Thanks to its 6 degrees of freedom, the scanner can access any part of the model. 

 

Retina resolution

In 3D scanning, accuracy that allows details to be discerned is paramount. For example, if some scanner has a scan area that is 90х80х55 mm and a 1.3 MP camera, then the width resolution will be 0.070 mm (90 mm/1280 pixels), and the height resolution will be 0.053 mm (55 mm/1024 pixels). You're unlikely to get an accurate model with parameters like that. We've solved this problem too! The vertical accuracy of the D3D-s reaches 0.010 mm, and the horizontal accuracy is up to 0.015 mm. Our projector's step resolution is 0.000625 millimeters. That's more than 84 times the resolution of projection scanners. We even had to limit the maximum resolution in order to get you a finished result within 7 minutes. These specifications are significantly superior to all other existing scanners! This is possible because of the 5 MP camera and high-quality lens. By the way, the lens is very important if you value quality. Such lenses are used to inspect products in machine vision applications at factories. The camera's high resolution is also important for creating high-quality textures. Thus, the D3D-s is the world's most accurate jewelers’ scanner. 

 

Scanning examples  

This is a model of a ring scanned with maximum precision.


 

This is a model is an inexpensive brooch scanned in quick mode. Note the complexity of the model. It's difficult to scan this many crystals if the scanner has less than 5 degrees of freedom in its movement. 



This signet ring is old and curved. It has a complex shape. But none of this is a problem for the D3D-s. It accurately reproduces all the flaws of the original model. 

The  D3D-s scanner has no trouble producing a 3D model of an ancient mantra engraved in stone.

The large scanning area lets you scan more than just jewelry. 


Before you buy a scanner, ask the seller to scan a 2 euro coins with radial lines. This will make everything clear immediately. Here are two models. One was scanned with a very expensive 3D projection scanner. The other — with the D3D-s scanner for jewelers. 

Walnut

 

 Comparison chart 

1) This information is not indicated in official documentation. We calculated it, and it may be incorrect.  55 mm/1024 pixels = 0.053 mm

2) Price was taken from www.amazon.com on 6/10/2019     

3) Day   One Special! D3D-s scanner at a special price (Save 50% Off Retail).    

 

Technical Specifications 

  •  Scanning Volume on turntable: Ø 100х130mm / Ø 3.937 x 5.118 inches
  •  Resolution in width: 15 microns
  •  Resolution in height: 10 microns
  •  Maximum weight on turntable: 2kg / 4.4 lbs
  •  Light: LED light 945 Luminous Flux (lm)
  •  Color: Mono
  •  Connectivity: 2xUSB 3.0 (Camera, PC) 
  •  Autonomous Scanning: Computer connection required
  •  Software: Windows Based
  •  External Dimensions: 600 x 300 x 420mm / 23.622 x 11.811 x 16.535 inches
  •  Weight: 10kg / 22 lbs

 

Minimum System requirements

  • 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • 8 GB RAM
  • OpenGL 3.2 compatible graphics card with 2 GB RAM
  • Fast SSD (recommended) 
  • 4GB of HDD free space
  • 2xUSB 3.x   

 

EMBARGOED AND SANCTIONED COUNTRIES 

We restrict exports to certain destinations: Crimea - Region of Ukraine, Russia, Venezuela, People's Republic of China, Iraq, North Korea, Balkans, Belarus, Central African Republic, Congo, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Yemen, and Zimbabwe, Cuba, Iran, Cyprus, Vietnam.

 

Electronics

We're proud of the electronics we developed specifically for this scanner. The four-layer circuit board distributes heat efficiently. Each part was selected for its high speed and accuracy. The electric motor is controlled by a L6472PD microcontroller. This lets us accelerate and slow the motor smoothly, and it supports other very powerful functions. It's so awesome that we can't sell it in Russia, since it can be used to make rockets. 

Software

We developed software specifically for the D3D-s with lots of unique features. The software is currently available for Windows 7/8/10. Once the scanning is done, you'll get an STL file that you can open in any program that supports STL files, such as ZBRUSH, RhinoGold, MatrixGold,  Jewelery cad dream and more.

How did we make the D3D-s affordable? 

The scanner is made of parts that are used in 3D printers and can be purchased one piece at a time. Only a few parts, such as the projector, mount, etc., are manufactured to order in small batches. Thus, we don't have to make a huge batch of scanners. This significantly reduces our costs and investments. 

3D scanning

This demo shows scanning in quick mode. You can choose the mode that's right for you based on the complexity of the model and the required scan quality.  

 

Combining two scanned models

Jewelers unfamiliar with 3D scanners often wonder how to remove the clips that hold the model. The answer is very simple — scan the model twice with the clips in different places. Then use special software, such as MeshLab (a free open-source program) to combine the models and remove anything undesired. In this video, you can see how to do this in a few clicks. 

 

Replacing models on the platform

Our model platform attaches to the scanner with magnets. This means you can use different platforms. We also made sure that the models were easy to change. Take a look at how easy it is to attach any model.

 

LED-line technology

Compared to laser sources, the light projector ensures more uniform illumination in addition to sharp edges and no speckle effect. 

Rewards

We want to give you a lot of different extras. But many of them require expensive mass production. For example, a polycarbonate case that protects the scanner from dust requires the manufacture of a mold. Help us raise more money for this project and you'll receive a protective case, scanning spray, and a larger set of clips for attaching various objects. Tell everyone about us on forums. Show your friends! Together we can do more!

How did this project get started?

A year ago, we successfully completed a Kickstarter project to create a super-accurate desktop scanner. Since then, we started receiving requests from jewelers and dentists to make a scanner tailored to their needs. In creating our desktop scanner, we set out to achieve a resolution that would let us scan a coin. As a result, adapting the scanner to jewelers' needs was not a problem. We added another axis of rotation and reduced the size of the scanner. We also updated the optics and camera, since jewelers don't need color scanning. We also installed high-precision motors. Taken together, these changes significantly increased the accuracy of an already high-precise scanner. 

 

Who are we?

Leonid Nazarenko began his career at the Antonov Plant, which built the An-225, the world's largest airplane. Since childhood, Leonid has created model planes, and then taught schoolchildren to do the same. He enjoys radio-controlled model planes and has won RC helicopter competitions. He has a deep understanding of metalworking and a wide range of engineering disciplines. He passed his meticulousness and love of accuracy on to his son. 

Denys Nazarenko has won various competitions in mathematics, physics, and computer science. Denys developed the well-known Start Menu X, which has delighted users around the world with a convenient alternative to the Windows start menu for more than 10 years. btw. This is a real plasma gun but with limited distance :(

 

Risks and challenges

We've learned a lot from the process of producing our desktop scanners, which began with just an idea and ended with packaging and delivering finished products to end customers. Of course, our first attempt involved a lot of imperfections, and we delayed deliveries for several months. This was due to our inexperience and small budget. This is now our second Kickstarter project, so we've accounted for both financial aspects of the project and logistical challenges related to suppliers. Of course, problems may arise. But we gained a lot of experience over the past year. You can trust us, because our goal is to create a sustainable business. Indeed, we've invested a lot of money in this project. For us, Kickstarter is only the first step, a springboard for mass production of the world's most accurate scanners.

It has a complex shape. But none of this is a problem for the D3D-s. It accurately reproduces all the flaws of the original model. The  D3D-s scanner has no trouble producing a 3D model of an ancient mantra engraved in stone.The large scanning area lets you scan more than just jewelry. Before you buy a scanner, ask the seller to scan a 2 euro coins with radial lines. This will make everything clear immediately. Here are two models. One was scanned with a very expensive 3D projection scanner. The other — with the D3D-s scanner for jewelers. Walnut  Comparison chart 1) This information is not indicated in official documentation. We calculated it, and it may be incorrect.  55 mm/1024 pixels = 0.053 mm2) Price was taken from www.amazon.com on 6/10/2019     3) Day   One Special! D3D-s scanner at a special price (Save 50% Off Retail).     Technical Specifications 
 Scanning Volume on turntable: Ø 100х130mm / Ø 3.937 x 5.118 inches
 Resolution in width: 15 microns
 Resolution in height: 10 microns
 Maximum weight on turntable: 2kg / 4.4 lbs
 Light: LED light 945 Luminous Flux (lm)
 Color: Mono
 Connectivity: 2xUSB 3.0 (Camera, PC) 
 Autonomous Scanning: Computer connection required
 Software: Windows Based
 External Dimensions: 600 x 300 x 420mm / 23.622 x 11.811 x 16.535 inches
 Weight: 10kg / 22 lbs
 Minimum System requirements
64-bit Windows 7/8/10
8 GB RAM
OpenGL 3.2 compatible graphics card with 2 GB RAM
Fast SSD (recommended) 
4GB of HDD free space
2xUSB 3.x   
 EMBARGOED AND SANCTIONED COUNTRIES We restrict exports to certain destinations: Crimea - Region of Ukraine, Russia, Venezuela, People's Republic of China, Iraq, North Korea, Balkans, Belarus, Central African Republic, Congo, Iraq, Lebanon, Liberia, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, Yemen, and Zimbabwe, Cuba, Iran, Cyprus, Vietnam. ElectronicsWe're proud of the electronics we developed specifically for this scanner. The four-layer circuit board distributes heat efficiently. Each part was selected for its high speed and accuracy. The electric motor is controlled by a L6472PD microcontroller. This lets us accelerate and slow the motor smoothly, and it supports other very powerful functions. It's so awesome that we can't sell it in Russia, since it can be used to make rockets. SoftwareWe developed software specifically for the D3D-s with lots of unique features. The software is currently available for Windows 7/8/10. Once the scanning is done, you'll get an STL file that you can open in any program that supports STL files, such as ZBRUSH, RhinoGold, MatrixGold,  Jewelery cad dream and more.How did we make the D3D-s affordable? The scanner is made of parts that are used in 3D printers and can be purchased one piece at a time. Only a few parts, such as the projector, mount, etc., are manufactured to order in small batches. Thus, we don't have to make a huge batch of scanners. This significantly reduces our costs and investments. 3D scanningThis demo shows scanning in quick mode. You can choose the mode that's right for you based on the complexity of the model and the required scan quality.  

 
Combining two scanned modelsJewelers unfamiliar with 3D scanners often wonder how to remove the clips that hold the model. The answer is very simple — scan the model twice with the clips in different places. Then use special software, such as MeshLab (a free open-source program) to combine the models and remove anything undesired. In this video, you can see how to do this in a few clicks.  Replacing models on the platformOur model platform attaches to the scanner with magnets. This means you can use different platforms. We also made sure that the models were easy to change. Take a look at how easy it is to attach any model.

 
LED-line technologyCompared to laser sources, the light projector ensures more uniform illumination in addition to sharp edges and no speckle effect. RewardsWe want to give you a lot of different extras. But many of them require expensive mass production. For example, a polycarbonate case that protects the scanner from dust requires the manufacture of a mold. Help us raise more money for this project and you'll receive a protective case, scanning spray, and a larger set of clips for attaching various objects. Tell everyone about us on forums. Show your friends! Together we can do more!How did this project get started?A year ago, we successfully completed a Kickstarter project to create a super-accurate desktop scanner. Since then, we started receiving requests from jewelers and dentists to make a scanner tailored to their needs. In creating our desktop scanner, we set out to achieve a resolution that would let us scan a coin. As a result, adapting the scanner to jewelers' needs was not a problem. We added another axis of rotation and reduced the size of the scanner. We also updated the optics and camera, since jewelers don't need color scanning. We also installed high-precision motors. Taken together, these changes significantly increased the accuracy of an already high-precise scanner.  Who are we?Leonid Nazarenko began his career at the Antonov Plant, which built the An-225, the world's largest airplane. Since childhood, Leonid has created model planes, and then taught schoolchildren to do the same. He enjoys radio-controlled model planes and has won RC helicopter competitions. He has a deep understanding of metalworking and a wide range of engineering disciplines. He passed his meticulousness and love of accuracy on to his son. Denys Nazarenko has won various competitions in mathematics, physics, and computer science. Denys developed the well-known Start Menu X, which has delighted users around the world with a convenient alternative to the Windows start menu for more than 10 years. btw. This is a real plasma gun but with limited distance :( Risks and challengesWe've learned a lot from the process of producing our desktop scanners, which began with just an idea and ended with packaging and delivering finished products to end customers. Of course, our first attempt involved a lot of imperfections, and we delayed deliveries for several months. This was due to our inexperience and small budget. This is now our second Kickstarter project, so we've accounted for both financial aspects of the project and logistical challenges related to suppliers. Of course, problems may arise. But we gained a lot of experience over the past year. You can trust us, because our goal is to create a sustainable business. Indeed, we've invested a lot of money in this project. For us, Kickstarter is only the first step, a springboard for mass production of the world's most accurate scanners.

story:
Gole11 Mini PC

Gole ships worldwide from its company Gole Technology (HK) Limited in Hong Kong, according to Indiegogo limitations, the crowdfunding is thus in Hong Kong dollars and exchange rates are as following:

Early Bird 1: $99 USD = 767HKD (30pcs) SOLD OUT!

Early Bird 2: $119 USD = 923HKD (100pcs) SOLD OUT!

Early Bird 3: $169 USD = 1310HKD (500pcs)

Normal campaign price: $199 USD = 1543HKD (unlimited, until June 20th)

MSRP Retail Price after Indiegogo: $249 USD = 1930HKD


 

Articles online

You can read some articles talking about the features here:

https://liliputing.com/2020/05/gole11-is-a-smal...
https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/06/gole11-...
https://www.notebookcheck.net/Gole11-An-all-in-...
https://www.techradar.com/news/this-windows-tab...
https://www.geeky-gadgets.com/mini-pc-06-05-2020/
https://forum.freaktab.com/forum/tv-player-supp...
https://www.pcdemano.com/sc/12408/
https://www.muycomputer.com/2020/05/06/mini-pc-...
https://www.ixbt.com/news/2020/05/05/intel-11-1...

Those links aren't reviews yet, just articles with info for now, once YouTubers/bloggers have posted reviews (hopefully soon) the links will be added here.

This product is also known as the HiGole F11APL, the link from some articles to Gole's Alibaba page lists the product sample at $229 but that is without the $20 Windows 10 Pro licence.

https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/02/26/higole-...
https://androidpctv.com/higole-f11apl-minipc-ta...
https://androidtvbox.eu/higole-f11apl-is-a-late...

 

Shipping and Support provided by

Gole Technology (HK) Limited
http://gole.tech

Product comes with 1 year standard warranty. Please don't try to open it up if you wish to keep your warranty.

Quality should be appropriate from consumer to industrial use, with a glass based touch screen, should remain very usable and fully functional for a long time.

Since we launched the Gole1 in 2016, Gole has sold millions of these kinds of Mini PCs, their factory production capacity can scale to any kind of potential demand.

story:
Collective investment increases speed upon reaching the finish line.
Our goal is to reach a greater number of users who collectively manage to reach large sums for a single digital investment.

What does it mean?
A single user cannot achieve a goal alone.
We have thought about collective investment so that more users, even with very small amounts, can be able to reach a high budget. The large budget gives us the opportunity to significantly increase the cash fund in order to reach an amazing result in a few months.
So even an investor of very small amounts is still able to reach much higher amounts than he would have achieved if he had been the only one to contribute.
 Today we know that bitcoin has a value of around $ 9,000. A value that has fallen a lot in the last month and that is destined to increase considerably as has happened since its birth ..

So a user who only invests $ 10 can, thanks to the collective investment, have a higher income than he would have obtained singularly since, together with other users, the budget increases faster.

Each supporter will have no economic loss since he will have the opportunity to redeem the donated sum.

Hi everyone, I'm Giovanni Stano.
I have been investing in bitcoin and silver for many years.
I gained experience through specific courses and I was able to multiply my profits thanks to digital.

You can contact me for more info at gn.stano@gmail.com.

No fear!! Become a supporter of this project and give yourself a chance.

story:
OVERVIEW
According to the World Health Organization, 1.2 million people are killed and about 20 to 30 million are injured in road accidents worldwide every year.

 

THE PROBLEMS
Road accidents are caused due to three factors:
The human factor: The condition of the car driver and his conduct on the road greatly effect the occurrences of many traffic related accidents such as a lack of attention, distraction, etc.
The infrastructural factor: The condition of infrastructure greatly influences the conduct of the car driver. Poorly maintained roads, unclear signs and vague directional signs, roads without separation of lanes, oil stains on the road, safety hazards, and lack of proper lighting, may cause road accidents.
The mechanical factor: A vehicle’s condition can have quite an impact on accidents. A poor mechanical state could cause an accident, such as a mechanical failure in which a wheel is detached from the vehicle, which could risk the vehicle and cause it to reverse. Old vehicles are not properly protected from accidents.

 


THE SOLUTION 

The company is working on a product + software that will communicate the location of the accident to the company’s systems thus immediately activating the emergency services in that country


HOW IT WORK


It will first perform an initial scan of the vehicle computer and only in the case of an accident, the vehicle airbag will inflate. The system will send a signal to the company systems which will try to get a hold of the driver twice (by calling). In case the driver doesn’t answer both times, the system will send a signal to the medical emergency services to have them arrive at the site as fast as possible.
The little product you will install in your vehicle that will protect you and your families.

MISSION & VISION


⦁    Our missions  is to provide extra saving while driving and provide drivers with peace of mind.
⦁    Our vision is to  continue developing, growing, and most importantly saving live.

CAMPAIGN OBJECTIVE 
What we need 
Right now, we are turning to you for helping to raise the funds that we need to complete the development, implementation, and the market to a global audience .
Our goal through this campaign is to raise $250,000. What we are asking from you today is an open heart, open donation, and helping hands. 
⦁    
Even the smallest of contributions will make a big difference for us - for every pledge, above $5 we will send a Personal Thank you email to you as a token of appreciation along with other rewards given for the donation.


IMPACT

Our impact is to develop and grow thus shortening waiting time for emergency services to the shortest time possible.
We believe it’s worth spending more money on vehicle protection than not being        protected at all and relying on your luck!
REWARD IDEAS
Beck it because you believe in it - 5$ or more
You're just happy to be here!! Support the project for no reward, just because it speaks to you.


GOOD KARMA - $15 or more 
Thank you so much. Your help at any level encourages us to move forward with this project.
Estimated delivery: At the most unexpected time :-)


Email update on the product every month - pledge 50$ or more
We will update your curiosity every month

1 wonder - pledge $85 (10% discount)
Get the product and our eternal gratitude! 
1 wonder $95
Get the product and our eternal gratitude! 
2 wonder 180$
Get the product and our eternal gratitude! 20
2 wonder 190 (15% discount)
Get the product and our eternal gratitude!
3 wonder 248$
Who needs 3 wonders you might ask? Someone with a big family maybe. Imagine how comfortable it would feel for everyone to receive the product
5 wonder 470
Who needs 5 wonders you might ask? Someone with a big family maybe. Imagine how comfortable it would feel for everyone to receive the product


Commit $ 10,000+ 8 wonder
You will visit the company's offices, including a tour and a meal and a meeting with the company's leading staff  


RISK AND CHALLENGES
As with most crowdfunding projects, there may be some unexpected circumstances and or scenarios; but our team is fully prepared to take on any challenges by virtue of our full preparedness and crowdfunding experience. If we do run into any logistical challenges so significant that may delay us, we will be sure to keep all our contributors in the loop

Other Ways You Can Help
in addition to supporting this project with your donation, You can also show your support by sharing a link to this campaign on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. The more people that are aware the more it will make this campaign a success.
 

 
 
We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for taking the time to read about what we are doing

story:
Dieser Tortenständer ist der einfachste Weg eine großartige Motivtorte herzustellen, ohne viel Aufwand, aber dafür mit ganz viel WOW-Effekt!


Was steckt dahinter:

Es ist über ein Jahr her, dass ich etwas ganz Besonderes für den ersten Geburtstag meiner kleinen Tochter machen wollte. Ich stellte mir einen Kuchen vor, der genau so aussehen sollte wie meine kleine Prinzessin. Mit viel Aufwand, Holz, Ton, Gips und Herzblut bastelte ich über eine Woche an der Figur. Die Überraschung der Gäste war groß und die Nachfrage rießig. Um für Jeden etwas zu haben kam noch etwas Neutrales, also das Schaf, und der Junge dazu.

Leider waren die Konstruktionen nicht von langer Dauer. Die Teile fielen auseinander, die Reinigung war sehr schwierig bis unmöglich ohne Schäden zu verursachen und der Arbeitsaufwand enorm hoch.

Es verging über ein halbes Jahr bis ich mich dazu entschlossen habe, mehr aus dieser Idee zu machen und wendete mich an einen professionellen Modellbauer mit dem Auftrag ein gebrauchstaugliches und produktionsfähiges Muster herzustellen ...

 

.....und hier ist das Ergebnis:

 

Die Grundidee ist eine fertige Basis, die nur ineinander gesteckt wird. Der Kuchen den Ihr backt kommt zwischen den Kopf und den Fuß und muss nur noch dekoriert werden. Der Lieferumfang besteht aus einem Fuß, einer Tortenplatte von 20cm Durchmesser (die je nach Kuchengröße ausgetauscht werden kann), einem Stab und dem Kopf.


Wie ihr den Kuchen gestaltet, bleibt euch überlassen. Möglich ist Alles!

Wenn ihr zusammen mit euren Kindern den Geburtstagskuchen vorbereiten wollt, beklebt ihn doch einfach mit Gummibärchen, macht einen Schokoüberzug oder besprüht ihn mit Sahne und natürlich nicht zu vergessen die Tortenkünstler unter euch, die mit Fondant und Marzipan ganze Kunstwerke herstellen können.


Mit der Figur seit ihr nicht nur Kuchenkünstler, sondern auch Modedesigner! 



 Benutzen könnt ihr nahezu jede handelsübliche Backform! Je nachdem für wie viele Personen euer Kuchen sein soll, wählt ihr die Größe. Die Breite der Hose beträgt 12,5cm, die Kuchenplatte darauf könnt Ihr von der Größe her frei wählen und seid nicht an die im Lieferumfang enthaltene gebunden. Passt etwas nicht genau, dann schneidet ihr den Kuchen einfach zu, Hauptsache die Höhe stimmt und diese beträgt 14cm.

Und wenn es mal schnell gehen muss, dann benutzt einfach einen fertigen Kuchen.


Wo liegen die Vorteile:

Das Gute an dieser Figur ist, dass ihr sie immer wieder verwenden könnt. Ganz im Gegensatz zu den üblichen Motivtorten die Ihr vom Bäcker oder Konditor kennt, bei denen man sich in der Regel erst durch viel Dekoration durchkämpfen muss um an den Kuchen zu gelangen und dann leider schon die ganze schöne Optik verloren geht.

Meine Figur bleibt bis zum Schluss stabil und verliert nichts von ihrer schönen Optik, selbst wenn der Kuchen ganz aufgegessen ist.

Auch wenn ihr gerade keinen Kuchen braucht, könnt ihr die Figur verwenden, ob als Tapasplatte, Cupcake- oder Obstständer. Mit den verschiedenen Platten könnt ihr immer wieder neu dekorieren.


Zusammenfassung:

  • Die Figur besteht aus einem patentierten System, welches einfach ineinander gesteckt wird
  • sie besteht aus Polyresine, einem Material mit ähnlichen Eigenschaften wie Porzellan
  • sie ist handbemalt und hochwertig gearbeitet
  • die Reinigung erfolgt einfach unter fließendem Wasser 
  • Sie ist natürlich lebensmittelecht
  • die Platten sind austauschbar
  • Der Kuchen darf maximal eine Höhe von 15cm besitzen, die Breite mindestens 13cm
  • nahezu jede handelsübliche Backform ist einsetzbar
  • die Variationen sind unendlich!


Wie ist der Stand der Dinge?

Es fehlt nur noch das Startkapital, alles andere ist schon erledigt. Das Patent ist gesichert, die Master sind erstellt und die Produktionsfirma wartet auf meine Freigabe. Zur Zeit steht eine Lieferzeit von maximal 5 Monaten ab Auftragserteilung im Raum, das heißt es könnte sofort losgehen. 

Gibt es ein Risiko?

Da alle Kostenfaktoren geklärt sind, wird es keine bösen Überraschungen geben, dass das Geld plötzlich doch nicht reicht und es deswegen zu Lieferschwierigkeiten kommt. Falls das Finanzierungsziel nicht erreicht wird, bekommt ihr euer Geld automatisch wieder zurück, wenn es erreicht wird, bekommt ihr eure Figur!

Ihr werdet immer auf dem Laufenden gehalten, wie der aktuelle Status gerade ist.


Jetzt kommen wir zum spannenden Teil.... Was bekommt ihr für Eure Unterstützung?


Für 5,- €

... bekommt Ihr zwar leider nichts materielles, aber dafür eine ganz große mentale Umarmung.

Ich danke Euch vielmals dafür, dass Ihr an die Idee glaubt und mich unterstützt!


Für 15,- €

... bekommt Ihr ein großes Danke und eine Dankeskarte von mir mit einer kleinen persönlichen Widmung.


Für 25,- €

... bekommt Ihr nicht nur eine Dankeskarte von mir mit einer kleinen persönlichen Widmung, sondern obendrauf noch Tipps und Tricks wie Ihr Fondant richtig bearbeiten könnt, wo Ihr das passende Fondant für Eure Kuchen her bekommt und welche Werkzeuge und Utensilien ich selbst zum Dekorieren verwende. Nicht zu vergessen, das noch größere DANKE!


Für 50,- €

.... könnt ihr euch eine der folgenden Figuren aussuchen und natürlich gibt es dazu auch eine Dankeskarte:


Die Farben der Abbildungen sind am PC entstanden und können bei der fertigen Figur noch etwas abweichen.


Für 100,- €

... bekommt ihr eine Figur wie oben abgebildet und außerdem noch 2 Edelstahlschüsseln mit 20cm und 12cm Durchmesser, 2 Tortenplatten in 15cm Durchmesser und 30cm Durchmesser und 5 Anleitungen zum downloaden!


Für 150,-€ 

... bekommt ihr zwei Figur wie oben (50,- € Perk) abgebildet und außerdem noch 2 Edelstahlschüsseln, 2 Tortenplatten in 15cm Durchmesser und 30cm Durchmesser und eine Anleitung in heftform mit 15 Anleitungen.


Die Preise sind Willkommenspreise und werden sich, wenn das Alles mit eurer Hilfe erfolgreich wird, noch steigern. Ihr könnt mit dieser Möglichkeit hier also den Preisvorteil nutzen.


Alle Perks sind ohne Versandkosten, für die kommen noch einmal 6,99€ innerhalb Deutschlands dazu. Für den Versand in andere Länder kontaktiert mich bitte. 


Ich wünsche euch ganz viel Spaß!

Dieser Tortenständer ist der einfachste Weg eine großartige Motivtorte herzustellen, ohne viel Aufwand, aber dafür mit ganz viel WOW-Effekt!Was steckt dahinter:Es ist über ein Jahr her, dass ich etwas ganz Besonderes für den ersten Geburtstag meiner kleinen Tochter machen wollte. Ich stellte mir einen Kuchen vor, der genau so aussehen sollte wie meine kleine Prinzessin. Mit viel Aufwand, Holz, Ton, Gips und Herzblut bastelte ich über eine Woche an der Figur. Die Überraschung der Gäste war groß und die Nachfrage rießig. Um für Jeden etwas zu haben kam noch etwas Neutrales, also das Schaf, und der Junge dazu.Leider waren die Konstruktionen nicht von langer Dauer. Die Teile fielen auseinander, die Reinigung war sehr schwierig bis unmöglich ohne Schäden zu verursachen und der Arbeitsaufwand enorm hoch. Es verging über ein halbes Jahr bis ich mich dazu entschlossen habe, mehr aus dieser Idee zu machen und wendete mich an einen professionellen Modellbauer mit dem Auftrag ein gebrauchstaugliches und produktionsfähiges Muster herzustellen ... .....und hier ist das Ergebnis: Die Grundidee ist eine fertige Basis, die nur ineinander gesteckt wird. Der Kuchen den Ihr backt kommt zwischen den Kopf und den Fuß und muss nur noch dekoriert werden. Der Lieferumfang besteht aus einem Fuß, einer Tortenplatte von 20cm Durchmesser (die je nach Kuchengröße ausgetauscht werden kann), einem Stab und dem Kopf.Wie ihr den Kuchen gestaltet, bleibt euch überlassen. Möglich ist Alles!Wenn ihr zusammen mit euren Kindern den Geburtstagskuchen vorbereiten wollt, beklebt ihn doch einfach mit Gummibärchen, macht einen Schokoüberzug oder besprüht ihn mit Sahne und natürlich nicht zu vergessen die Tortenkünstler unter euch, die mit Fondant und Marzipan ganze Kunstwerke herstellen können.Mit der Figur seit ihr nicht nur Kuchenkünstler, sondern auch Modedesigner!  Benutzen könnt ihr nahezu jede handelsübliche Backform! Je nachdem für wie viele Personen euer Kuchen sein soll, wählt ihr die Größe. Die Breite der Hose beträgt 12,5cm, die Kuchenplatte darauf könnt Ihr von der Größe her frei wählen und seid nicht an die im Lieferumfang enthaltene gebunden. Passt etwas nicht genau, dann schneidet ihr den Kuchen einfach zu, Hauptsache die Höhe stimmt und diese beträgt 14cm.Und wenn es mal schnell gehen muss, dann benutzt einfach einen fertigen Kuchen.Wo liegen die Vorteile:Das Gute an dieser Figur ist, dass ihr sie immer wieder verwenden könnt. Ganz im Gegensatz zu den üblichen Motivtorten die Ihr vom Bäcker oder Konditor kennt, bei denen man sich in der Regel erst durch viel Dekoration durchkämpfen muss um an den Kuchen zu gelangen und dann leider schon die ganze schöne Optik verloren geht.Meine Figur bleibt bis zum Schluss stabil und verliert nichts von ihrer schönen Optik, selbst wenn der Kuchen ganz aufgegessen ist.Auch wenn ihr gerade keinen Kuchen braucht, könnt ihr die Figur verwenden, ob als Tapasplatte, Cupcake- oder Obstständer. Mit den verschiedenen Platten könnt ihr immer wieder neu dekorieren.Zusammenfassung:
Die Figur besteht aus einem patentierten System, welches einfach ineinander gesteckt wird

sie besteht aus Polyresine, einem Material mit ähnlichen Eigenschaften wie Porzellan

sie ist handbemalt und hochwertig gearbeitet
die Reinigung erfolgt einfach unter fließendem Wasser 
Sie ist natürlich lebensmittelecht
die Platten sind austauschbar
Der Kuchen darf maximal eine Höhe von 15cm besitzen, die Breite mindestens 13cm
nahezu jede handelsübliche Backform ist einsetzbar
die Variationen sind unendlich!
Wie ist der Stand der Dinge?Es fehlt nur noch das Startkapital, alles andere ist schon erledigt. Das Patent ist gesichert, die Master sind erstellt und die Produktionsfirma wartet auf meine Freigabe. Zur Zeit steht eine Lieferzeit von maximal 5 Monaten ab Auftragserteilung im Raum, das heißt es könnte sofort losgehen. Gibt es ein Risiko?Da alle Kostenfaktoren geklärt sind, wird es keine bösen Überraschungen geben, dass das Geld plötzlich doch nicht reicht und es deswegen zu Lieferschwierigkeiten kommt. Falls das Finanzierungsziel nicht erreicht wird, bekommt ihr euer Geld automatisch wieder zurück, wenn es erreicht wird, bekommt ihr eure Figur!Ihr werdet immer auf dem Laufenden gehalten, wie der aktuelle Status gerade ist.Jetzt kommen wir zum spannenden Teil.... Was bekommt ihr für Eure Unterstützung?Für 5,- €... bekommt Ihr zwar leider nichts materielles, aber dafür eine ganz große mentale Umarmung.Ich danke Euch vielmals dafür, dass Ihr an die Idee glaubt und mich unterstützt!Für 15,- €... bekommt Ihr ein großes Danke und eine Dankeskarte von mir mit einer kleinen persönlichen Widmung.Für 25,- €... bekommt Ihr nicht nur eine Dankeskarte von mir mit einer kleinen persönlichen Widmung, sondern obendrauf noch Tipps und Tricks wie Ihr Fondant richtig bearbeiten könnt, wo Ihr das passende Fondant für Eure Kuchen her bekommt und welche Werkzeuge und Utensilien ich selbst zum Dekorieren verwende. Nicht zu vergessen, das noch größere DANKE!Für 50,- €.... könnt ihr euch eine der folgenden Figuren aussuchen und natürlich gibt es dazu auch eine Dankeskarte:Die Farben der Abbildungen sind am PC entstanden und können bei der fertigen Figur noch etwas abweichen.Für 100,- €... bekommt ihr eine Figur wie oben abgebildet und außerdem noch 2 Edelstahlschüsseln mit 20cm und 12cm Durchmesser, 2 Tortenplatten in 15cm Durchmesser und 30cm Durchmesser und 5 Anleitungen zum downloaden!Für 150,-€ ... bekommt ihr zwei Figur wie oben (50,- € Perk) abgebildet und außerdem noch 2 Edelstahlschüsseln, 2 Tortenplatten in 15cm Durchmesser und 30cm Durchmesser und eine Anleitung in heftform mit 15 Anleitungen.Die Preise sind Willkommenspreise und werden sich, wenn das Alles mit eurer Hilfe erfolgreich wird, noch steigern. Ihr könnt mit dieser Möglichkeit hier also den Preisvorteil nutzen.Alle Perks sind ohne Versandkosten, für die kommen noch einmal 6,99€ innerhalb Deutschlands dazu. Für den Versand in andere Länder kontaktiert mich bitte. Ich wünsche euch ganz viel Spaß!

story:
Check the Gallery Tab for a Demo Video of the BladeKey!

-------------

Finally, a Pocket Tool Made to Fit Your Life!

BladeKey was inspired by the lack of affordable and effective ways to comfortably carry standard metal keys in a pocket.  I found keys to be uncomfortable, noisy, and that they would easily get disorganized.  Furthermore, many keychain pocket tools are seemingly not designed to be comfortable in a pant pocket, and contain many different unneeded tools or too few tools. I knew there had to be a better way to carry keys and pocket tools.

The BladeKey is also a platform that users can customize to build their own pocket tool, that includes standard metal keys--without modification.  There are many one-off DIY solutions that require the destruction of a standard pocket tool.  These DIY solutions require a substantial amount of effort and modification to both keys and tools.  This makes it difficult to impelment these solutions because it may be hard to find the right tool or correctly modify existing keys and tools.  BladeKey attempts to solve this problem once and for all by providing a customizable platform that does not require modification of keys or tools.

With your support, an all metal version of the BladeKey will become a relality.    The factory has produced a high quality first batch, and is ready to produce as many as needed.  They just need to know how many to make in what colors and sizes!

As a supporter, you will get to vote on the colors that BladeKey will be manufactured in.  Furthermore, backers can also pre-order BladeKey devices at a discount to the anticipated retail price.

About BladeKey™ DIY Modular Pocket Tool and Key Organizer   

BladeKey is a minimalist "Swiss Army" style pocket key organizer and DIY multi tool that is designed to work with your existing standard metal keys, current key-shaped tools, and future tool inserts that will be available.

BladeKey N9 - 3D Printed Prototype / Chicago Skyline

BladeKey was created to be as minimalist and utilitarian as possible, and to solve specific problems that everyone encounters carrying keys.  Keys can be bulky, become disorganized, or become tangled with other objects.

BladeKey keeps the sharp parts of keys away from flesh, and itself contains no sharp edges. Additionally, the BladeKey keeps keys in order and eliminates any jingling of keys, while the design remains minimal so that there is not a great deal of bulk added to the keys. 

To hold the keys in, the BladeKey uses a single zip-tie. A zip-tie was chosen over other fasteners for several reasons: 

  • Zip-ties are ubiquitous, and strong. 
  • Zip-ties do not become too loose or too tight when keys are rotated (like a screw or Chicago Binding Post does).
  • Zip-ties are easy to insert and remove (as compared to pop-rivets).
  • A zip-tie works regardless of the width of any particular BladeKey device. 
  • A zip-tie applies pressure to the heads of the keys thereby applying constant friction that keeps the keys in place whether stored or deployed for use.
  • If keys need to be occasionally removed, it is easy to snip a portion of the zip-tie, reconfigure the keys, and install a new zip-tie. 

Using the BladeKey is easy. The key that is needed is simply rotated out from the device.  The other keys can remain stored in the BladeKey.  The deployed key is held in place with friction.

 
Silver Aluminium BladeKey N9 with 8 keys and attached to a modern car key.

As shown above, larger keys and other items may be attached to the BladeKey using a standard metal key ring.

History of BladeKey

BladeKey has been a hobby of mine for some time.  It started as a little project in 2005.  The original version was quite bulky and was composed of many pieces that were held together with bolts.  The bolts would work themsleves loose over time.

In 2009, my efforts were reinvigorated when I purchased a 3D printer.  With the 3D printer it was easier to prototype numerous different concepts.

Timeline of BladeKey Prototypes

After producing several plastic versions, people started asking me if I was ever going to produce the BladeKey in aluminium.  While the plastic worked well, the quality depended largely on the particular 3D printer used to make each BladeKey device.  Furthermore, the look and feel of ABS plastic simply does not compare to high quality aluminium.

After selling many BladeKey devices in all shapes and sizes on Shapeways, I had the data I needed to determine the most optimal sizes to manufacture an aluminium version of the BladeKey.

With your support, the aluminium production version of the BladeKey will become a reality.

Aluminium BladeKey Sizes

If our funding goal is reached, the BladeKey will be manufactured in three different sizes.  All of the money will go to covering the costs of production and shipping.  In addition the three different sizes will come in Black, Silver, and other colors that backers will get to vote on.

  • BladeKey N3 - Up to 3 Standard Metal Keys. The BladeKey N3 can accommodate any number of keys measuring at most 6.5 mm wide x 57 mm long.  In addition to zip ties, spacers are included to ensure a proper fit for people with less than three keys.
  • BladeKey N6 - Up to 6 Standard Metal Keys. The BladeKey N6 can accommodate any number of keys measuring at most 12.5 mm wide x 57 (on each side) to ~63 mm (in the middle).  In addition to zip ties, spacers are included to ensure a proper fit for people with 4 or 5 keys.
  • BladeKey N9 - Up to 9 Standard Metal Keys. The BladeKey N9 can accommodate any number of keys measuring at most 19 mm wide x 57 (on each side) to ~66 mm (in the middle).  In addition to zip ties, spacers are included to ensure a proper fit for people with 7 or 8 keys.
BladeKey N3 3D Printed Prototype
 
BladeKey N6 3D Printed Prototype
 
BladeKey N9 - Black Anodized Aluminium Prototype with 9 Keys
 
BladeKey N9 - Silver Anodized Aluminium Prototype with 8 Keys

BladeKey N9 with Bike Lock Key and USB Key

Selecting and Using the BladeKey

Selecting the Right Size. 

Select a BladeKey that is the same size, or slightly wider and longer than your set of keys. Use the sizing tool and follow the instructions available on the BladeKey website.  

BladeKey Sizing Tool

Spacers will also be included so that people with 2 keys can use the BladeKey N3, people with 4 or 5 keys can use the BladeKey N6, and people with 7 or 8 keys can use the BladeKey N9. Measure your keys to be sure that BladeKey will work for you.

Adding Keys to the BladeKey. 

To add keys to the BladeKey, follow the step by step instructions available on the BladeKey website.  Installing keys into the BladeKey is simple. The zip-tie is recessed into the side of the device, runs through the holes in the heads of the keys, loops around the thin side of the BladeKey, and comes back through the holes in the keys.  Finally, the zip-tie is secured and trimmed.

Removing Keys from the BladeKey. 

To remove keys from the BladeKey, follow the three step process outlined on the BladeKey website.  Removing keys from the BladeKey is a simple three step process.  First, snip the exposed portion of the zip tie on the thin side of the BladeKey.  Second, pull the back portion of the zip-tie clear of the device through the head of the zip tie.  Finally, pull the front portion of the zip-tie out of the BladeKey device.  The keys are now separated from the BladeKey.

Tentative Schedule  

  • DONE - Summer 2011 - Design BladeKey / Prototype with Makerbot Cupcake 3D Printer (the green BladeKey pictured in above videos). 
  • DONE - Fall 2011 - Launch of 3D Printed Version on Shapeways (pictured in the Chicago skyline pictures above). 
  • DONE - Sept. / Oct. 2012 - Work with aluminium manufacturing company to set up for manufacture of BladeKey N9 out of milled aluminium 6061 that is sandblasted, anodized, and laser etched.
Aluminium BladeKey N9 in Production
 
  • DONE - Oct. / Nov. 2012 - Receive initial two milled BladeKey N9 devices.
BladeKey N9 - Black and Silver Aluminium Prototypes
  • DONE - Nov. 2012 - Authorize production of initial small batch of aluminium BladeKey N9 devices.
Parts from an initial small batch of production BladeKey N9 devices.
  • DONE - Dec. 2012 - Receive initial small batch of milled BladeKey N9 devices. 
  • Jan. 2013 - Successfully Backed? If so ... 
  • Jan. 2013 - Ship initial small batch of milled BladeKey N9 devices to backers, if funding is successful.
  • Jan. 2013 - Place order for remainder of BladeKey N9 devices.
  • Jan. 2013 - Work with aluminium manufacturing company to set up for manufacture of BladeKey N3 and N6 out of milled aluminium 6061 that is sandblasted, anodized, and laser etched.
  • Jan. / Feb. 2013 - Receive initial milled BladeKey N3 and N6 devices for testing prior to ordering remainder. If ok then order remainder.
  • Mar. 2013 - Receive remainder of milled BladeKey N3, N6, N9 devices. 
  • Mar. 2013 - Ship remainder of milled BladeKey devices to backers. 
  • Summer 2013 - Set up BladeKey online store.

Patent Pending / Patent Allowed

The USPTO has allowed a patent that protects the BladeKey design.  The patent is expected to issue within the next few months.

Notice of Allowance for the First BladeKey Patent (USPTO)

What Funds Will Be Used For 

The funds that are raised will be used to produce three versions of the aluminium milled anodized BladeKey device in quantity:

  • BladeKey N3 (holds up to 3 standard metal keys),
  • BladeKey N6 (holds up to 6 standard metal keys), and
  • BladeKey N9 (holds up to 9 standard metal keys).

With your pledge, you will become a part of BladeKey's future.  With your help and support funding BladeKey's aluminium manufacturing process, it is my hope and eventual goal that BladeKey will become the standard for modular pocket tools in the future.  Thank you for your time and I hope you will enjoy BladeKey.

Future of BladeKey

With your support, BladeKey will continue to become more useful over time.  Specifically, in addition to holding standard keys, we hope that BladeKey will become a de facto standard for pocket tool inserts that BladeKey LLC, and others may develop.  This would enable BladeKey owners to construct their own custom pocket tool with no more and no less functionality than is needed for each BladeKey owner's particular needs.

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The product is designed, tested for over a year in 3D printed plastic versions, and the first patent allowed (still pending issuance). Two aluminium BladeKey N9 devices have been ordered, received and tested. There may still be risks with a larger order; for example, there could be unforeseen manufacturing delays or quality issues that arise during production of larger batches. There may also be shipping issues etc. In any event, BladeKey has endeavored to ensure that all rewards and deadlines can be met prior to posting this Kickstarter campaign. To the extent unforseen delays arise, BladeKey will use its best efforts to minimize such delays.

story:
About this project

Cables, cables, cables, and more cables. Nowadays, most people have multiple devices and gadgets that often create a "cable catastrophe" on the desk. Personally, I have cables and cords from my laptop, external hard-drive, printer, cellphone, monitor, and, tablet. A couple friends of mine have even more cables. More annoyingly, when I remove the cables from my devices or gadgets, the cables always slide and drop under the table.

I went searching online for solutions, but the cable organizers that I have found can typically hold only 1 or 2 cables at once. To meet my need, I would need to use 3 to 5 cable organizers.This is too wasteful and tedious. 


My friends and I thought to ourselves - "why don't we design something that can meet our needs? Something that can hold many more cables at once? Something that doesn't have to be wasteful?" And this is what we have come up with - the 2+3 Cable Organizer. 


It is simple, and it works. It can hold up to 5 cables which eliminate the wasteful need to use multiple cable organizers. Each slot diameter is 6.4mm. More importantly, the product is made of environmental-friendly material called Thermoplastic Rubber, and the packaging of the product is made of 100% recyclable plastic.


No more cables falling to the ground. 


 It can be used to shorten cables that are too long.


Holds up to 5 cables with up to 6.4mm in diameter. 

The 2+3 Cable Organizer works really well for desktop users who often struggle with many more cables and cords. Very often, the cables and cords come in at various lengths which can be really intimidating to deal with. Since the 2+3 Cable Organizer has multiple slots and can shorten long cables, the task is much simpler.


Having the cables secured on a vertical surface prevents the feet from kicking and disconnecting the cables and cords....especially the power cord.

It also works well for people who like to charge their devices all at once at night before they go to sleep.

Furthermore, not having lots of cables lying on the ground really makes vacuuming much easier. 

Lots and lots of samples were made and tested to ensure this product works.

 

We were very selective on the adhesive. After experimenting with lots of adhesive, we decided to use a high quality 3M adhesive that does not leave any residue!



The 2+3 Cable Organizer come in classic black. 


And also three other amazing colours - China red, blue violet, and space grey. 

The 2+3 Cable Organizers will come in a set of 3 and will retail at 9.99 USD later on. 


By supporting our project, you will be able to receive the organizers at a special price (+ a bonus unit!!). Please check out our perks structure below! 




After working with several manufacturers, we have decided that the 2+3 Cable Organizer will be made by a reliable and trustworthy manufacturer located in Taiwan. The manufacturer produces consumer goods for several major brands and big box stores in North America, Europe, and Australia. They implement strict QC/QA procedures and guidelines which ensure the organizer will be manufactured to the highest standards. 


We welcome any questions or suggestions, so feel free to leave us a message! We will review all messages and will reply to them ASAP. 

Thank you for checking out our project. We really hope you have enjoyed the project as much as we have!
story_txt:
About this project

Cables, cables, cables, and more cables. Nowadays, most people have multiple devices and gadgets that often create a "cable catastrophe" on the desk. Personally, I have cables and cords from my laptop, external hard-drive, printer, cellphone, monitor, and, tablet. A couple friends of mine have even more cables. More annoyingly, when I remove the cables from my devices or gadgets, the cables always slide and drop under the table.
I went searching online for solutions, but the cable organizers that I have found can typically hold only 1 or 2 cables at once. To meet my need, I would need to use 3 to 5 cable organizers.This is too wasteful and tedious. 

My friends and I thought to ourselves - "why don't we design something that can meet our needs? Something that can hold many more cables at once? Something that doesn't have to be wasteful?" And this is what we have come up with - the 2+3 Cable Organizer. 



It is simple, and it works. It can hold up to 5 cables which eliminate the wasteful need to use multiple cable organizers. Each slot diameter is 6.4mm. More importantly, the product is made of environmental-friendly material called Thermoplastic Rubber, and the packaging of the product is made of 100% recyclable plastic.


No more cables falling to the ground. 


 It can be used to shorten cables that are too long.



Holds up to 5 cables with up to 6.4mm in diameter. 




The 2+3 Cable Organizer works really well for desktop users who often struggle with many more cables and cords. Very often, the cables and cords come in at various lengths which can be really intimidating to deal with. Since the 2+3 Cable Organizer has multiple slots and can shorten long cables, the task is much simpler.




Having the cables secured on a vertical surface prevents the feet from kicking and disconnecting the cables and cords....especially the power cord.
It also works well for people who like to charge their devices all at once at night before they go to sleep.






Furthermore, not having lots of cables lying on the ground really makes vacuuming much easier. 
Lots and lots of samples were made and tested to ensure this product works.
 We were very selective on the adhesive. After experimenting with lots of adhesive, we decided to use a high quality 3M adhesive that does not leave any residue!



The 2+3 Cable Organizer come in classic black. 



And also three other amazing colours - China red, blue violet, and space grey. 



The 2+3 Cable Organizers will come in a set of 3 and will retail at 9.99 USD later on. 




By supporting our project, you will be able to receive the organizers at a special price (+ a bonus unit!!). Please check out our perks structure below! 




After working with several manufacturers, we have decided that the 2+3 Cable Organizer will be made by a reliable and trustworthy manufacturer located in Taiwan. The manufacturer produces consumer goods for several major brands and big box stores in North America, Europe, and Australia. They implement strict QC/QA procedures and guidelines which ensure the organizer will be manufactured to the highest standards. 



We welcome any questions or suggestions, so feel free to leave us a message! We will review all messages and will reply to them ASAP. 
Thank you for checking out our project. We really hope you have enjoyed the project as much as we have!

story:
Throughout my life, I never really knew what I wanted to do. I would try any and everything, but be good at essentially nothing. In 2016, it felt like I had a mid-life crisis (strange for a teenager, I know), I felt hopeless for the future, all the projects I've tried have failed miserably. After months of feeling sorry for myself, I decided to pick myself up and jump headfirst into self-improvement.

I asked myself the question, "How did the most successful people get where they are?" With that guiding question, I started to read. I found a common principle that seemed to be evident in all of the books I've read. It was first in one book. Then two. Then eventually, dozens of books that have stated essentially the same one single concept.

 

To get anything you want in life, do something consistently and become 1% better every single time.

I thought to myself, "that's too simple to be true." It was until it wasn't. I started implementing this rule in my life, and suddenly everything began to change for me. It was with this one principle that pulled me out of my negative spiral and built up a life of satisfaction, intention, and focus for myself.

Everything that I have ever learned in self-improvement is put into this one journal. With this key concept at the forefront, the Progression Journal was my way of improving myself 1% every single day. It can do the same for you.

With the Progression Journal, every day you write in it, you are becoming one step closer to who you were meant to become.

The Progression Journal is a physical journal designed to cater to your self-improvement needs. The sole purpose of the journal is to keep your daily schedule steady with a 1% improvement regularly. 

We’ve designed the journal so that you start with the Progress Section, which will help you clarify your life to the main essentials. Then you’ll reverse engineer those goals through the daily, weekly, and monthly sections. 

The process is one funnel towards reaching any of your goals. 

  •  Pushes you out of your comfort zone: Daily challenges that will invoke a sense of change into you after a couple of weeks of completing them. We also have weekly challenges to ensure you learn something new, make a small life change, and help someone else every single week.
  •  Have a 30,000 feet view on life: Most of the time, we get bombarded by the small problems, we don’t realize the positives that are in our lives. We have a dedicated monthly and weekly review section to ensure a streamlined focus and push towards your goals.
  •  Starts your self-improvement journey: The first 50 pages of the journal are to help prime you for the rest of the three months. This is done through utilizing growth writing exercises to figure out who you are, what you want, and your motivations towards it.
  •  Helps you become happier: At the top of every journal entry, we have a daily quote to inspire and motivate you for the day ahead. We have also included gratitude prompts in the morning and for the night journal as well.
  •  Organizes your life: Our brains are way better at creating ideas, rather than storing them. We have included notes and reflection portions on each daily, weekly, and monthly entry to ensure you keep a clear head and organized life.
  •  Creates a sense of self-confidence: There is something about doing something consistently that makes us look back and feel a sense of pride. At first, you’ll start, it may be a little rocky, but as you go along, you’ll begin to gain confidence in your journaling abilities.
  •  Saves you time: There are productivity prompts integrated into each page of the journal. By giving yourself ten minutes of using this journal every day, you save decision fatigue throughout the day. You can never get time back, so why not build a structure with the Progression Journal? 

 

  •  The Progress Section: Seven activities to help you find who you are as a person, what your strengths are, and how you can move forward in life.
  •  Monthly Journal: A reflection of your goals, fears and prompts to help you break through any problem
  •  Weekly Layout for reflection on where you are. The progress section to help you move forward in life.
  •  Daily Pages to complete every day for 13 weeks (3 months)
  •  Morning Routine: Starting your day with positivity, gratitude and focus.
  •  Evening Routine: Making tomorrow better and finding the good daily.

  •  Daily Quote: Daily inspiration and motivation from those the greats of the world.
  •  Blank Dates: In case you miss a day, there is no judgement here. Take the journal at your own pace
  •  Gratitude: To cultivate a habit of gratitude for each morning and evening.
  •  Looking Forward: Setting up a positive expectation for each day.
  •  Awesome things: Reflecting on why the day will be and was great for the day.
  •  Daily Tasks: Utilizing Ivy Lee's To-Do List, focus only on the most essential work
  •  Self-Awareness: We won't always feel our best, this section allows for you to see where you are and to take care of yourself as well.
  •  Notes Section: Your brain is good for generating ideas, not keeping them.
  •  Daily Challenge: Selectively curated challenges to push you out of your comfort zone on a daily basis.
  •  Check-ins: To ensure you have finished your daily routines, challenge, and key metrics for the day.
  •  Blank Dates: In case you miss a day, there is no judgement here. Take the journal at your own pace.

  •  Biggest Wins: Find the best parts of your week.
  •  Week Losses: Look at the not so good portion of the week.
  •  Next Week Tasks: Scan the main things you need to complete for the next week.
  •  Lessons Learned: Revaluate the losses this week and take lessons for next week.
  •  Notes Section: Jot down emotions and feelings for the week so far. 
  •  Making a Small Life Change: See how you can make next week better through a small manageable life change
  •  Learning Something New or Reading: We often are too busy to learn or read, by prioritizing, it's easier to put in our schedule.
  •  Helping Someone Else By: We want to become better people, that can be done by helping others in small ways as well.
  •  Why Is This Important to Me: Finding a reason why your weekly progress improvement will ensure you are more likely to actually do it.
  •  How Will I Ensure This Gets Done: Break the goal into a more manageable daily task for yourself to complete.

 

Making this campaign has been an awesome project for me. I really hope that this journal will help you in your life and to foster growth every single day. Thank you so much for checking out my project, and I want to thank you for your support!

If you want to build sustainable habits, learn new skills, and create a foundational system for yourself, consider pledging to make the Progression Journal a reality.

story:
Why.

The short video above says it best...

The RollPro Mini was created to easily organize and carry your GoPro cameras and accessories. The roll up design keeps this organizer super compact and lightweight. Once unrolled, everything is laid out in front of you for full visibility and access.

It is a truly portable GoPro organizer case.



Made in California, USA.

Every RollPro Mini will be handmade here in California. All materials used in making each organizer will be sourced in the US. Even the thread is made here. This ensures quality and consistency goes into every Mini made. 

Fits.

This organizer fits all GoPro cameras, and most GoPro accessories up to the size of a suction cup. The RollPro Mini easily fits into a backpack alongside your gopole, chesty, and other larger accessories.


Details.

Materials

- Sunbrella hightech industrial grade fabric. Made in USA.
- Velcro brand fasteners. Made in USA.
- Shindo high quality elastics. Made in Japan.
- Eddington nylon thread. Made in USA.
- YKK zippers. Made in Japan.

Why a Roll?

Conventional camera bags have voids of space for large equipment and are designed to protect delicate units. Since GoPro has defied both size and fragility, a new means of organizing and carrying is also in order.

With the RollPro Mini, I've set out to create an organizer that complements GoPro's characteristics by designing it exclusively for the GoPro and its accessories. The result is a fat free case that tames the GoPro and its entourage of pieces in a functional and beautiful fashion.

The Power of Indiegogo.

Your support brings the RollPro Mini to life! Materials must be purchased in bulk to bring the costs to a reasonable level. A larger RollPro manufacturing volume requires an efficient and streamlined process, for a refined final product.

RISEFUL

Riseful is an outlet for dreams to materialize. It was started to create things with four values in mind.

Form. attractive design
Function. highly useful
Interface. easy to use
Quality. long lasting

When something is created with these standards at heart, it becomes a simply useful tool to complement our individual journeys.
-
The success of the RollPro Mini means the success of Riseful for which I am deeply grateful. Thanks to all who are reading, and especially those who choose to support. Thank you!

story:
Brief Info:
Book My Cloud - Virtual Disk [www.bookmycloud.com] Maintains state of art framework allowing its users to store / view / edit / share their files in cloud using a simple Drag-N-Drop operation. we began our operations in June 2012 and within a month it acquired 900+ potential users (head count is still increasing day by day). The same growth is being also tracked on by the Alexa Ranking.

Book My Cloud also has recently started FREE CPanel Premium Hosting services to support small business and young enthusiast in bringing their Ideas live. We provide 27x7x365 Support to our customers in case they have any difficulties , queries in using Book My Cloud services. [ support.bookmycloud.com ]

Team:
We are currently a team of 2 people maintaining Web Infrastructure + Support Services and Sales operaions.

Projections & Fund Utilization:
I am looking for Funds to support Data Center & Website Maintenance Costs also the part of funding would be utilized in expanding the Book My Cloud reach by adapting some potential sales strategies and advertising.

With the current growth rate, we are expecting a strong customer base of 15000 Users in Quarter and 45000+ Users in next 6 months.

We appreciate a lot your time and support in bringing our Idea Live !
