story:
UPDATE (8/6/12)- Thanks to everyone for your support for the Indiegogo campaign! Unfortunately, we didn't hit our goal (any $'s you gave should have been returned from PayPal). :( But stay tuned for updates on the project--we'll be posting on our website www.sdglabsinc.com as we restructure and re-focus. Never give up!

 

UPDATE (07/3/12)- We just added two new perks. They are great best deals! Get them before time runs out. Check out the updates tab for more info.

UPDATE (07/3/12)- We created a fun new video to help explain how Indiegogo works. Check it out on the updates tab or the media tab!

UPDATE (06/21/12) - Check out the updates tab to see more details about the budget and answers to questions from some of our facebook fans. :)

PLEASE CHECK OUT THE ‘UPDATES’ SECTION TO STAY IN THE KNOW WITH ALL THE NEWSY STUFF

What we’re doing:

We’re making an RFID-opening pet food/water bowl.

If you have more than one pet, or a pet and a smallish person, you’ve probably encountered a few problems:

--a pet who likes the other pet’s food better. The expensive, medicated food, usually.

--a child who really likes pet food. Yum. Or to splash in the water-yay!

Maybe you have pet friends who come to visit or grandkids, so you only think about this when you’re leaping to remove your pet’s bowl out of range.

An adorable toddler named Jamie. Who has an affinity for dog food and water.

 Wouldn’t it be nice if there was a way to have a pet food/water bowl that only the specified pet could get access to? Since dogs and cats don’t have opposable thumbs (and the toddlers we tested weren’t very cooperative) we’ve come up with a clever way to do this.

Conceptual Drawing

How we’re doing it

We have built a proof-of-concept bowl with a lid that opens when a specific pet’s tag is detected and closes when the pet moves away from the bowl. (Yes, you can have a bowl open up to multiple tags so several pets can get access to, say, the water.)

We have developed mechanical design prototypes that proved to be very useful in teaching us ways NOT to make the bowl (note: a loud motor is a) interesting to kids and b) scary to pets). Through testing various motor types, an RFID reader and numerous mechanical configurations we now have several prototypes. (With the help of lots of coffee and doggy treats.)

Here are some nifty features and innovations of the RFID-opening pet bowl:

  • Automatically opens and closes to a specific pet i.d-type tag, worn on their collar. It’s not just a proximity sensor.
  • Designed with pet-friendly features (so that your pet will use it).
  • Human-friendly with a removable bowl for ease of filling and cleaning.
  • Eco-friendly, made out of recyclable materials/possibly post-consumer plastics.      
  • The initial bowl design has a 2qt capacity.
  • Powered by 4-AA batteries or a wall charger.
  • An RFID range of ~1 ft.
  • Aiming for a retail price around $100.
  • Nifty design that looks spiffy in your home. And a great conversation piece—‘cause it’s just so cool.

What we need to do next, with your support (aka, help!)

After extensive testing and research, we have three distinct design ideas to be cast or laser sintered and electronics and RFID antennas to be designed and fabricated. We are ready to build prototypes that are fully functional and manufacturable.

After additional prototype testing, a final design will be selected. That final design will become the production model that will be sent off for testing by an outside lab to verify that the bowl complies with FCC regulations for transmitting RF signals.

Then, we’ll be ready to manufacture the problem-solving RFID pet bowl! This includes building the injection molds, the electronic and RFID antenna boards, and assembly and product fulfillment (i.e., when it can show up at your door). Just think, if you’re one of the lucky Indiegogo supporters who invested at that level, you’ll get yours first!

The budget and beyond

The goal we have set for this Indigogo campaign covers the detailed mechanical, electrical and RFID engineering of the pet bowl and pet tag, the prototype manufacturing, testing, and production startup costs.

Our assembled team of mechanical, electrical, software and RF engineers are lined up and ready to go. As are the prototype shop and mold shop. We also have dogs, cats and kids on hand to test the product. (We want to be thorough.) Once we are fully funded in this campaign, we are ready to hit the ground running.

If we exceed our goal (woot!), we will be able to explore different versions of the bowl and other capabilities, such as:

       --a more cat-friendly sized bowl

       --a double-bowl design

       --a stand/base that can be adjusted for your pet’s height

       --testing for RF signal transmission compliance for Canada and Europe

       --a solar-chargeable adapter

How you can help

First, support us on Indiegogo. :) This is going to be a fun ride and we’d love to have you as part of our community!

Second, ‘Like’ us on Facebook www.facebook.com/sdglabs You’re welcome to like us in real life, too.

Third, follow us on Twitter www.twitter.com/sdglabs Tweet, tweet.

Fourth, if you think this is pretty cool and know people who might like to help us promote it, let us know! We’d love to connect you with more info and some spiffy stuff to help do that!

How this works

If you're new to Indiegogo, here's how it works: You get excited about the project and think, 'Hey, I'd love to help them!' You click the spiffy red 'Contribute Now' button and it will take you to the 'Perk & Amount' page. You thumb through your wallet (or dig into that trust fund), decide how much to contribute. Then, pick an appropriate Perk. Alternately, you can discover the thing you can't live without on the Perks list and make your contribution decision from there.

When the campaign ends, one of two things can happen: 1) (and the awesome thing) we meet our goal and the project is fully-funded--Yay!  Off to work we go to get the perks out to our supporters and fulfill our dreams! *Within a day or so of the campaign ending is when Indiegogo will withdraw your contribution amount.*

If the campaign ends and we haven't met our goal (sob!), you won't be charged anything. 'Course, you won't get your spiffy perk either. :(

Click here for more info

Who we are

At SDG Labs, we are changing the way technology works to make life simpler. We think it should be easier, more human friendly. We have made it our mission to do just that—to make how you interface with technology so seamless you don’t even notice it. You’ll just notice how it makes your life better.

Casey Caddell, Founder and CEO of SDG Labs, has over 16 years of software development and management experience in technology research and development in the defense industry. He specializes in the creation, planning, management and development of cutting edge technology ideas, bringing them to realization. His career includes positions such as a lead flight software manager for Lockheed Martin, an engineering software manager for Goodrich-ISR Systems, and a lead software developer for Raytheon, Honeywell, and Hughes Aircraft. Education: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology. He is married and (specific to the RFID pet bowl) has a dog, three kids and several nieces and nephews who visit often and require him to sprint to move the dog bowl.

Warren Langley, Chief Technical Officer and Lead Developer, has over 10 years of software development experience in new technology for applications, embedded real-time systems, and high-performance computing. His career in aerospace and defense gives him experience in technology areas that bring a breadth of knowledge and provide insight into the development efforts of SDG Labs. He has worked as a lead software engineer for Sandia National Laboratories and Goodrich. Education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from New Mexico State University. He is married, has three kids and several dogs. One dog in particular (who will go unnamed, but who’s initials are Toby) is supposed to be on a special diet but likes eating all the other pet food better.
story_txt:
UPDATE (8/6/12)- Thanks to everyone for your support for the Indiegogo campaign! Unfortunately, we didn't hit our goal (any $'s you gave should have been returned from PayPal). :( But stay tuned for updates on the project--we'll be posting on our website www.sdglabsinc.com as we restructure and re-focus. Never give up!
 
UPDATE (07/3/12)- We just added two new perks. They are great best deals! Get them before time runs out. Check out the updates tab for more info.
UPDATE (07/3/12)- We created a fun new video to help explain how Indiegogo works. Check it out on the updates tab or the media tab!
UPDATE (06/21/12) - Check out the updates tab to see more details about the budget and answers to questions from some of our facebook fans. :)
PLEASE CHECK OUT THE ‘UPDATES’ SECTION TO STAY IN THE KNOW WITH ALL THE NEWSY STUFF
What we’re doing:
We’re making an RFID-opening pet food/water bowl.
If you have more than one pet, or a pet and a smallish person, you’ve probably encountered a few problems:
--a pet who likes the other pet’s food better. The expensive, medicated food, usually.
--a child who really likes pet food. Yum. Or to splash in the water-yay!
Maybe you have pet friends who come to visit or grandkids, so you only think about this when you’re leaping to remove your pet’s bowl out of range.

An adorable toddler named Jamie. Who has an affinity for dog food and water.
 Wouldn’t it be nice if there was a way to have a pet food/water bowl that only the specified pet could get access to? Since dogs and cats don’t have opposable thumbs (and the toddlers we tested weren’t very cooperative) we’ve come up with a clever way to do this.

Conceptual Drawing
How we’re doing it
We have built a proof-of-concept bowl with a lid that opens when a specific pet’s tag is detected and closes when the pet moves away from the bowl. (Yes, you can have a bowl open up to multiple tags so several pets can get access to, say, the water.)
We have developed mechanical design prototypes that proved to be very useful in teaching us ways NOT to make the bowl (note: a loud motor is a) interesting to kids and b) scary to pets). Through testing various motor types, an RFID reader and numerous mechanical configurations we now have several prototypes. (With the help of lots of coffee and doggy treats.)
Here are some nifty features and innovations of the RFID-opening pet bowl:

Automatically opens and closes to a specific pet i.d-type tag, worn on their collar. It’s not just a proximity sensor.
Designed with pet-friendly features (so that your pet will use it).
Human-friendly with a removable bowl for ease of filling and cleaning.
Eco-friendly, made out of recyclable materials/possibly post-consumer plastics.      
The initial bowl design has a 2qt capacity.
Powered by 4-AA batteries or a wall charger.
An RFID range of ~1 ft.
Aiming for a retail price around $100.
Nifty design that looks spiffy in your home. And a great conversation piece—‘cause it’s just so cool.

What we need to do next, with your support (aka, help!)
After extensive testing and research, we have three distinct design ideas to be cast or laser sintered and electronics and RFID antennas to be designed and fabricated. We are ready to build prototypes that are fully functional and manufacturable.
After additional prototype testing, a final design will be selected. That final design will become the production model that will be sent off for testing by an outside lab to verify that the bowl complies with FCC regulations for transmitting RF signals.
Then, we’ll be ready to manufacture the problem-solving RFID pet bowl! This includes building the injection molds, the electronic and RFID antenna boards, and assembly and product fulfillment (i.e., when it can show up at your door). Just think, if you’re one of the lucky Indiegogo supporters who invested at that level, you’ll get yours first!
The budget and beyond
The goal we have set for this Indigogo campaign covers the detailed mechanical, electrical and RFID engineering of the pet bowl and pet tag, the prototype manufacturing, testing, and production startup costs.
Our assembled team of mechanical, electrical, software and RF engineers are lined up and ready to go. As are the prototype shop and mold shop. We also have dogs, cats and kids on hand to test the product. (We want to be thorough.) Once we are fully funded in this campaign, we are ready to hit the ground running.
If we exceed our goal (woot!), we will be able to explore different versions of the bowl and other capabilities, such as:
       --a more cat-friendly sized bowl
       --a double-bowl design
       --a stand/base that can be adjusted for your pet’s height
       --testing for RF signal transmission compliance for Canada and Europe
       --a solar-chargeable adapter
How you can help
First, support us on Indiegogo. :) This is going to be a fun ride and we’d love to have you as part of our community!
Second, ‘Like’ us on Facebook www.facebook.com/sdglabs You’re welcome to like us in real life, too.
Third, follow us on Twitter www.twitter.com/sdglabs Tweet, tweet.
Fourth, if you think this is pretty cool and know people who might like to help us promote it, let us know! We’d love to connect you with more info and some spiffy stuff to help do that!
How this works
If you're new to Indiegogo, here's how it works: You get excited about the project and think, 'Hey, I'd love to help them!' You click the spiffy red 'Contribute Now' button and it will take you to the 'Perk & Amount' page. You thumb through your wallet (or dig into that trust fund), decide how much to contribute. Then, pick an appropriate Perk. Alternately, you can discover the thing you can't live without on the Perks list and make your contribution decision from there.
When the campaign ends, one of two things can happen: 1) (and the awesome thing) we meet our goal and the project is fully-funded--Yay!  Off to work we go to get the perks out to our supporters and fulfill our dreams! *Within a day or so of the campaign ending is when Indiegogo will withdraw your contribution amount.*
If the campaign ends and we haven't met our goal (sob!), you won't be charged anything. 'Course, you won't get your spiffy perk either. :(
Click here for more info
Who we are
At SDG Labs, we are changing the way technology works to make life simpler. We think it should be easier, more human friendly. We have made it our mission to do just that—to make how you interface with technology so seamless you don’t even notice it. You’ll just notice how it makes your life better.
Casey Caddell, Founder and CEO of SDG Labs, has over 16 years of software development and management experience in technology research and development in the defense industry. He specializes in the creation, planning, management and development of cutting edge technology ideas, bringing them to realization. His career includes positions such as a lead flight software manager for Lockheed Martin, an engineering software manager for Goodrich-ISR Systems, and a lead software developer for Raytheon, Honeywell, and Hughes Aircraft. Education: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from New Mexico Institute of Mining and Technology. He is married and (specific to the RFID pet bowl) has a dog, three kids and several nieces and nephews who visit often and require him to sprint to move the dog bowl.
Warren Langley, Chief Technical Officer and Lead Developer, has over 10 years of software development experience in new technology for applications, embedded real-time systems, and high-performance computing. His career in aerospace and defense gives him experience in technology areas that bring a breadth of knowledge and provide insight into the development efforts of SDG Labs. He has worked as a lead software engineer for Sandia National Laboratories and Goodrich. Education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from New Mexico State University. He is married, has three kids and several dogs. One dog in particular (who will go unnamed, but who’s initials are Toby) is supposed to be on a special diet but likes eating all the other pet food better.

story:
When you are on the road but still need to have fun and get things done, it’s always difficult on a small screen. Gaming on the go just isn't the same as playing games at home in front of the big screen. And carrying around a full-size, high-def monitor that is fast enough for games and work is inconvenient and unpractical. There's no substitute for a small-sized panel designed for gamers to enjoy the best gaming experience on the go as at home.
 

  • How did the idea come from? 
     

The most common refresh rate of portable monitors in the market is 60Hz. But the serious gamers need more than a smooth 60 FPS frame rates while playing the racing, first-person shooting, or competitive games. Why there is rarely a portable monitor with a high refresh rate? The main reason is that the high power consumption to maintain the high refresh rate continuously makes it difficult on the portable monitor. Besides, the high manufacturing cost makes it unpractical for the common office uses. We're always looking forward if there is a portable monitor that can bring us the smooth gaming experience on the go just as playing on big screen at home.
 

  • How was MageDok born?
     

The idea of making a portable monitor with a high refresh rate came in our mind last year. After countless nights, we created MageDok, a portable gaming monitor with an incredible refresh rate of 144Hz at an affordable price. The monitor can be driven and powered by the laptop or smartphone with only one USB C cable. We manage to design the unique power and display management that can maintain the high refresh rate in low power consumption. 

MageDok is lighter, faster, more vivid, and operates at a high refresh rate to keep game play smooth and images accurate. It’s the ultimate monitor with a more expansive view for work and play. 
 


 




 

 

 

Shot by Allen Ngo, Notebook Check

 

  •  Ultra-fast with 144Hz Refresh Rate 

MageDok 15 performs with a high refresh rate of 144Hz and 5 ms response time, decimating lag and motion blur to give you the upper hand in first-person shooters or racing games. Win with MageDok!
 

  •  Perfectly Smooth with FreeSync 
     

By dynamically synching the screen refresh rate with the image frame rate, AMD FreeSync eliminates screen tearing and minimizes display stutter to ensure perfectly smooth gameplay.
 

  • Build Your Mobile Game Console
     

MageDok delivers an unparalleled, fast and smooth gaming experience while you’re on the go. Compatible with Nintendo Switch, PS4, Xbox One, smartphone, laptop, and more. It lets you experience your games with better speed, clarity, and fun. You also can build your own mobile Play Staion or Xbox with MageDok while your're on the road. 
 

  • Dynamically Pulsing Lightshow
     

The special RGB lighting including color cycle, pulsation and fixed colors makes your monitor look cool and unique in the dark.
 


 

 
  • More Vivid
     

With 2K resolution & 120Hz frequency, MageDok 17 offers you the best graphics quality. Designed to meet the needs of photographers, designers, filmmakers, and gamers.
 

  • Extra Monitor for Photography
     

An extra monitor allows you to closely review all the pictures that you take while photographing or traveling. Perfect for making adjustment to the pictures during the photographing.
 

  • Eye Care
     

The patented Eye Care technology protects you from harmful blue light and helps relieve eyes strain and fatigue that is common with prolonged screen time. 

  • Compact and Portable
     

The small size of MageDok 13 is perfect to pack in your bag and carry around. It is a lightweight and compact work station anytime and anywhere.
 

  • Multi-touch Capacitive
     

The 10-points multi-touch feature allows you to play mobile games, work on the big screen or type quickly and easily on a virtual keyboard.
 

 
  • Plug and Play
     

MageDok can be driven and powered by the laptop or smartphone with only one USB C cable. Display your laptop or smartphone’s content simply by plugging. The USB C port supports the data  transfer, the power supply and the reverse charge. MageDok can charge your connected device through the other power supply.
 

  • Boost Your Productivity
     

An extra screen helps you work more efficiently when you deal with multiple tasks, apps, or documents at the same time. It eliminates task switching and speeds performance and productivity. 
 

  • Portrait Mode for Better Coding
     

Portrait mode gives you the perfect view of documents, books, or mobile websites and lets you perform tasks such as coding in a more practical viewing perspective.
 

  • Versatile Connectivity

 

USB-C and micro-HDMI connectivity enable displaying content from a wide range of portable devices such as smartphones, laptops, Nintendo Switch, Play Station, Xbox, Raspberry Pi, and more.

"It was always frustrated by the lack of a high-end portable gaming monitor when I want to play the games on a long journey or at the party. I love to play the first-person shooting games and it needs a monitor with a high refresh rate. The most common refresh rate of the portable monitor is 60Hz in the current market and I can’t find a good portable monitor that aims at gaming. Without the compromise with the low refresh rate, I and our team came up with the idea of making a portable gaming monitor with a 144Hz refresh rate.” - Benny, Founder of MageDok 

We are a team of engineers who are enthusiastic fans of Play Station and Nintendo Switch games as well. Last year we came up with the idea of the perfect portable monitor with a high refresh rate and started the design. After countless nights of research, testing, and debugging, MageDok finally came to life. 

MageDok can be driven and powered by your laptop or smartphone with only one USB C cable. We spent lots of efforts to

design the circuit board and keep the monitor maintain the high refresh rate in low power consumption. The unique power and display management makes MageDok last longer and much lighter. It is perfect to carry around with your laptop without your bag's overload. 

 

The whole body of the monitor is made of metal by CNC manufacturing and equipped with a  more narrow bezel. We want to bring you a perfect portable monitor with a wider vision.
 

The RGB lighting usually shows only in the conventional desktop gaming monitor but not in the portable monitors. But we hope that the portable gaming monitor can have these cool features as well and make it more professional. It is quite tough at the beginning. After more than half a year of optimization and test, we finally made MageDok become the first portable gaming monitor with the RGB lighting. 
 

 

Risks and challenges

We're an innovative team from China that has many years of experience in monitor design and manufacturing. We have successfully launched more than 20 models of on-the-go monitors to meet the different needs of our customers. Additionally, we also build custom display solutions for enterprise users and have delivered more than 460,000 units of our products all over the world. We are very confident with our process and production schedule for MageDok monitor.

However, we also know that hidden obstacles and challenges often occur. Because of that, we’ve made sure to account for some amount of craziness or unforeseen problems that may occur in our schedule. If something does go wrong, we promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues and about the way in which we are solving them.

Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
What?

Are you tired of having to jump around between social media sites and news apps to stay up to date on current events?

so are we!!

tott stands for 'talk of the town,' and we are dedicated to bringing the top stories in one place. Read the article, watch the video, laugh at the memes, and share with your friends, all in one place

What We Need & What You Get

THE APP IS FREE.... but in order for us to grab all of this data into one place, building the platform and the connections will be very costly to maintain.

All of your contributions will go towards building the platform and hiring the right team to maintain it.

tott's Impact

We are hoping to build a community where everyone is educated on topics as they affect their social settings.

With online harassment and the dopamine addiction to likes, social media has become more exclusive than ever, so we want to bridge the gap for those who lack the time to app-jump.
Risks & Challenges

Finding impartial sources will always be a difficulty; so our role isn't to vet stories, we are only sharing the news that everyone is searching and interacting with online.

One challenge will be finding a way to run the platform in the long run without going broke. We have NO PLANS of charging our users, but we will be asking for donations in order to keep this platform free

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the 'news' <-- ha...ha...ha 

No, but seriously, thank you for taking the time to read through this and we hope you feed your curiosity once we launch.

story:
Introduction

Open Game Station Player Kit is an open-source hardware platform, building a modular game device to play Arduboy-based games. And it supports module expansion and code modification for customized game playing.

 

What Is inside Box

Basic Version:

Basic version is for all users including new starters and DIY lovers. 

Part List:

  • Game Board x1
  • Carduino 32U4 x1
  • OLED Display Card x1
  • Buzzer Card x1
  • AAA Battery Card x1
  • Acrylic Board x1
  • Screw Package x1
  • Quick Guide x1

 

For basic and pro version, the kit all consists of the Longan Cards modules, Game Board, and structure parts.

Game Board: The deck of Open Game Station. It provides a base for inserting Longan Cards modules to build the complete game device. The overall shape comes from classic game controller, which gives you a good holding.

Structure Parts: Includes a piece of acrylic board, several screws and pillars, and a piece of quick guide, which are fun to assemble and provide a better holding for long period of time.

Longan Cards modules are with various functions, connected to Game Board with slots-inserting.

  • Carduino 32U4: This is the micro-controller for this game device and powered by Arduino Leonardo boot-loader. You can upload any Arduboy-based games to Carduino.

  • OLED Display Card: This is the monitor for game. It is a monochrome and retro-style display.

  • Buzzer Card: It gives out background music and beep sounds for game events.

  • AAA Battery Card: It provides portable power to the whole device. (AAA battery is NOT included, however it is easy to get.)

 

Pro Version:

Pro version is for DIY lovers, Arduino practicians,  programmers, geeks and makers.

Part List:

  • Game Board x1
  • Carduino 32U4 x1
  • OLED Display Card x1
  • Buzzer Card x1
  • AAA Battery Card x1
  • Sound Sensor Card x1
  • 9-Dof Sensor Card x1
  • Extension Board x1
  • Acrylic Board x1
  • Screw Package x1
  • Quick Guide x1

 

Be compared to basic version, following modules are special for pro version:

  • Sound Sensor Card: Detect the volume of sound as game control input.

  • 9-Dof Sensor Card: Detect movement of players’ hand as game control input, through acceleration, gyroscope, and magnetometer sensing.

  • Extension Board: One Extension Board would provide three more slots and be connected as the way of tree branch.

 

Assembling

  • STEP-1: Insert OLED Card into central slot.

  • STEP-2: Insert other Cards into vertical slots without certain sequence. And add more Cards with Extension Board.

  • STEP-3: Assemble acrylic board with screws and pillars as quick guide tells.

 

Games & Software

Free Games:

All Arduboy-based games are available for Open Game Station.

  • Firstly connect Carduino to your PC with Type-C cable.
  • Then go to https://arduboy.ried.cl/ and find a game you like.
  • Click "Upload to my Arduboy" and wait for seconds.
  • Insert Carduino back to Game Board after uploaded successfully.

 

DIY with Longan Cards and Arduino:

Beyond this, you can modify the code of games with Arduino, and combine rich module functions to create new ways of game playing. For example, you can jump through your voice, shoot with shaking, and turn direction by moving hands.  

For more Longan Cards modules, please click HERE.

For details of use, please click HERE.

 

Specification

  • Atmega 32U4
  • Micro-controller
  • 16MHz Clock Speed
  • 32K Flash & 2K RAM
  • 128x64 OLED Display
  • Arduino Compatible
  • 6 Click Buttons

 

Project Time Line

We started funding on Indiegogo after final working sample is ready and the money we raise would be used as the cost of mass production for our backers. We started funding from October and would start shipping when December comes to make sure that our backers would receive products before Christmas.

 

The idea of building a modular game device comes from the memories of playing FC day and night. We hope to make our own game console and controller, recreate the simple joy of inserting cards, and revisit the world of retro-style games.

 

About Longan Cards System

Open Game Station Player Kit is developed based on Longan Cards system which is a modular, open-source platform for electronic DIY projects. 

 

Longan Cards system consists of Cards and Boards. There are many gold finger antennas on Card and several gold finger slots on Board. They are combined together through slots interpolation, which is intuitive and easy to use. With this unified and flexible interface, you can realize a variety of ideas. Many more Boards with different themes would launch to help you explore more joy.

 

Longan Cards modules are classified into many types and every card is with a certain function. Main control, sensor, input, output, communication, power, and so on.

 

STEM is an acronym for science, technology, engineering, and math. STEM education began in the United States in the 1990s. It is an interdisciplinary teaching method that combines STEM content and real life situations, which helps stimulate students’ original curiosity and thirst for knowledge and novelty. Longan Cards contains dozens of modules, involving a wide range of knowledge in the process of use, including electronic circuit, mechanical structure, programming, science of nature, daily wisdom, and humanities, etc. It is a powerful tool for STEM education at fields of electronic prototyping, science experimentation and DIY project.

 

About Longan Labs

Longan Labs is an international platform offering open source products and customized service for global makers. It is also a co-creation laboratory, co-work with maker and link the project to customers.

Longan is a kind of Chinese fruit we all love it. We started first project in the summer of 2014 when it is the best time to enjoy longan. And then we found the company in the spring of 2018 at Shenzhen and Hong Kong.

Longan Cards is one of the core product lines of Longan Labs, and for more information, you can go to longan-labs.cc.

 

Risks and Challenges

  • The picture is only for reference, please make the object as the standard.
  • The receiving time is affected by express delivery in different regions.
  • There might be project pause and delivery delay caused by force majeure.
  • Game software comes from open source community, not developed by Longan Labs.

Screw Package x1
Quick Guide x1

 
For basic and pro version, the kit all consists of the Longan Cards modules, Game Board, and structure parts.
Game Board: The deck of Open Game Station. It provides a base for inserting Longan Cards modules to build the complete game device. The overall shape comes from classic game controller, which gives you a good holding.
Structure Parts: Includes a piece of acrylic board, several screws and pillars, and a piece of quick guide, which are fun to assemble and provide a better holding for long period of time.
Longan Cards modules are with various functions, connected to Game Board with slots-inserting.

Carduino 32U4: This is the micro-controller for this game device and powered by Arduino Leonardo boot-loader. You can upload any Arduboy-based games to Carduino.
OLED Display Card: This is the monitor for game. It is a monochrome and retro-style display.
Buzzer Card: It gives out background music and beep sounds for game events.
AAA Battery Card: It provides portable power to the whole device. (AAA battery is NOT included, however it is easy to get.)

 
Pro Version:

Pro version is for DIY lovers, Arduino practicians,  programmers, geeks and makers.
Part List:

Game Board x1
Carduino 32U4 x1
OLED Display Card x1
Buzzer Card x1
AAA Battery Card x1
Sound Sensor Card x1
9-Dof Sensor Card x1
Extension Board x1
Acrylic Board x1
Screw Package x1
Quick Guide x1

 
Be compared to basic version, following modules are special for pro version:

Sound Sensor Card: Detect the volume of sound as game control input.
9-Dof Sensor Card: Detect movement of players’ hand as game control input, through acceleration, gyroscope, and magnetometer sensing.
Extension Board: One Extension Board would provide three more slots and be connected as the way of tree branch.


 
Assembling


STEP-1: Insert OLED Card into central slot.
STEP-2: Insert other Cards into vertical slots without certain sequence. And add more Cards with Extension Board.
STEP-3: Assemble acrylic board with screws and pillars as quick guide tells.


 
Games & Software
Free Games:

All Arduboy-based games are available for Open Game Station.

Firstly connect Carduino to your PC with Type-C cable.
Then go to https://arduboy.ried.cl/ and find a game you like.
Click "Upload to my Arduboy" and wait for seconds.
Insert Carduino back to Game Board after uploaded successfully.

 
DIY with Longan Cards and Arduino:

Beyond this, you can modify the code of games with Arduino, and combine rich module functions to create new ways of game playing. For example, you can jump through your voice, shoot with shaking, and turn direction by moving hands.  
For more Longan Cards modules, please click HERE.
For details of use, please click HERE.

 
Specification


Atmega 32U4
Micro-controller
16MHz Clock Speed
32K Flash & 2K RAM
128x64 OLED Display
Arduino Compatible
6 Click Buttons

 
Project Time Line

We started funding on Indiegogo after final working sample is ready and the money we raise would be used as the cost of mass production for our backers. We started funding from October and would start shipping when December comes to make sure that our backers would receive products before Christmas.
 

The idea of building a modular game device comes from the memories of playing FC day and night. We hope to make our own game console and controller, recreate the simple joy of inserting cards, and revisit the world of retro-style games.
 
About Longan Cards System
Open Game Station Player Kit is developed based on Longan Cards system which is a modular, open-source platform for electronic DIY projects. 
 

Longan Cards system consists of Cards and Boards. There are many gold finger antennas on Card and several gold finger slots on Board. They are combined together through slots interpolation, which is intuitive and easy to use. With this unified and flexible interface, you can realize a variety of ideas. Many more Boards with different themes would launch to help you explore more joy.
 

Longan Cards modules are classified into many types and every card is with a certain function. Main control, sensor, input, output, communication, power, and so on.
 

STEM is an acronym for science, technology, engineering, and math. STEM education began in the United States in the 1990s. It is an interdisciplinary teaching method that combines STEM content and real life situations, which helps stimulate students’ original curiosity and thirst for knowledge and novelty. Longan Cards contains dozens of modules, involving a wide range of knowledge in the process of use, including electronic circuit, mechanical structure, programming, science of nature, daily wisdom, and humanities, etc. It is a powerful tool for STEM education at fields of electronic prototyping, science experimentation and DIY project.
 
About Longan Labs
Longan Labs is an international platform offering open source products and customized service for global makers. It is also a co-creation laboratory, co-work with maker and link the project to customers.
Longan is a kind of Chinese fruit we all love it. We started first project in the summer of 2014 when it is the best time to enjoy longan. And then we found the company in the spring of 2018 at Shenzhen and Hong Kong.
Longan Cards is one of the core product lines of Longan Labs, and for more information, you can go to longan-labs.cc.
 
Risks and Challenges

The picture is only for reference, please make the object as the standard.
The receiving time is affected by express delivery in different regions.
There might be project pause and delivery delay caused by force majeure.
Game software comes from open source community, not developed by Longan Labs.

story:
+++ Für die deutsche Version siehe unten +++

 

Did you know that to charge your phone you use approximately 3kWh of energy per year? This is a small number, and in general, it doesn't affect your finances, but nowadays there are 2.530.000.000 (2.53 billion) active smartphones around the world! Overall, around 7.590.000.000 (7.59 billion) kWh of energy is used in a year to only charge our smartphones! This equals the usage of energy by 8.500.000 (8.5 million) households in a month or to generate about 7.000.000.000 (7 billion) kilograms of CO2 emissions from a coal power plant! These numbers were only smartphones. If we tell you that to charge your tablet, you use around 10kWh? The rest is about calculations...

 

What is "City Charge" about?

We aim to solve everyday problems that we all have. Very often many of us face the challenge of fast discharge of their devices. And what we do for that? We carry power banks, use all the options to charge our device and very often it causes discomfort. The first Idea that we came up with is the "City Charge." City Charge is about providing a free service for everyone. 

 

We have two main directions for reaching our goal:

  1. HoReCa / Gastronomie Sector
  2. Public Places: Bus stops, parks, crowded parts of the city

The goal of Gastronomie sector is to have as many places as possible, to increase the availability of charging stations. As soon as there are more than 6000 places in Berlin, we aim to deliver the power stations to as many places as possible. Customers just need to ask for a charger, and they will use it for free. 

The installment in Public Places is our second significant step to take. We plan to install Charging Stations which work with Solar Energy. Do you want to know why? Do you remember about the 7 billion kilograms of CO2 emissions that we told you about? That is why!

The stations will not require hard installations or energy sources. The aim is to promote renewable energy use among people!

To help people quickly find the spots we plan to develop a mobile application. In the app, people can check the nearby places and get the directions.  

 

Do you want to see how our Solar Charging Stations will look like? Here it goes! They will be eco-friendly, free and very easy to use!

We are very passionate about this project, as we are not going to stop only with one city! Your city will be next, and you will enjoy your Chargest life with us :) 

What is our EVIDENCE?

Within the scope of the City Charge project, we have conducted a small scale survey to gain a preliminary understanding of the magnitude of the need for the services we aim to provide. 69.7% of our respondents indicated that they charge their mobile devices at least once a day and only 9.1% of them reported that they always carry a power bank. 97% of our respondents indicated that they use a cable charger. The great majority of the respondents (69.7%) mentioned that they charge their phone once a day whereas if we take the full usage of the phone the one-time charge will suffice only for 7 hours. This indicates a need for a recharging of the device at least more than once a day.

A vast majority of our respondents (~70%) expressed positive attitudes towards having the phone charging stations in Berlin, and 93.9% expressed the need for charging their phone in safe public places. Most preferred places that the respondents indicated included pubs, bars, clubs and bus/train stations.

 

Why are YOU the key to SUCCESS?

Our chosen model to address our simple but important issues of everyday life can only be realized when we have likeminded people that will support us. For that, we have developed our perks in a way that will make you happy! You can contribute just as much as you can, and if you want something more, you want us to present your contribution to the public, you can do so! It is our primary target: To show that People do for People!

 

Our project timeline is the following:

 

The ways you can help us

To implement this project, we need your help! Please contribute to our campaign at whatever level you can. Every contribution is greatly appreciated, and we will be grateful forever for your support!

Please SHARE this campaign (the Indiegogo link) with your family, friends, network, clients, email it, post it, tweet it or just talk about it :) 

 

+++ DEUTSCH +++

Wussten Sie, dass Sie etwa 3kWh Energie pro Jahr verbrauchen, um Ihr Telefon aufzuladen? Dies ist eine kleine Zahl und betrifft im Allgemeinen nicht Ihre Finanzen, aber heutzutage gibt es 2.530.000.000 (2,53 Milliarden) aktive Smartphones auf der ganzen Welt! Insgesamt werden in einem Jahr etwa 7.590.000.000 (7,59 Milliarden) kWh Energie verbraucht, um nur unsere Smartphones zu laden! Dies entspricht der Nutzung von Energie durch 8.500.000 (8,5 Millionen) Haushalte in einem Monat oder zur Erzeugung von etwa 7.000.000.000 (7 Milliarden) Kilogramm CO2-Emissionen aus einem Kohlekraftwerk! Diese Zahlen waren nur Smartphones. Wenn wir Ihnen sagen, dass Sie Ihr Tablet aufladen, verwenden Sie ungefähr 10kWh? Der Rest ist über Berechnungen ...

 

Worum geht es bei "City Charge"?

Wir wollen alltägliche Probleme lösen, die wir alle haben. Sehr oft stehen viele von uns vor der Herausforderung, ihre Geräte schnell zu entladen. Und was machen wir dafür? Wir führen Powerbanks, nutzen alle Möglichkeiten, um unser Gerät aufzuladen, und oft verursacht es Beschwerden. Die erste Idee, die wir uns ausgedacht haben, ist die "City Charge". Bei City Charge geht es darum, einen kostenlosen Service für alle anzubieten.

 

Wir haben zwei Hauptrichtungen, um unser Ziel zu erreichen:

1. HoReCa / Gastronomie Sektor
2. Öffentliche Plätze: Bushaltestellen, Parks, überfüllte Teile der Stadt

Ziel der Gastronomie sektor ist es, möglichst viele Plätze zu haben, um die Verfügbarkeit zu erhöhen. Sobald es in Berlin mehr als 6000 Plätze gibt, wollen wir die Kraftwerke an möglichst viele Orte liefern. Kunden müssen nur nach einem Ladegerät fragen, und sie werden es kostenlos nutzen.

Öffentliche Plätze (Public Places) ist unser zweiter wichtiger Schritt. Wir planen, Ladestationen zu installieren, die mit Solarenergie arbeiten. Willst du wissen warum? Erinnern Sie sich an die 7 Milliarden Kilogramm CO2-Emissionen, von denen wir Ihnen erzählt haben? Deswegen!

Die Stationen benötigen keine harten Installationen oder Energiequellen. Ziel ist es, die Nutzung erneuerbarer Energien unter den Menschen zu fördern!

Um Menschen zu helfen, die Spots schnell zu finden, planen wir eine mobile App zu entwickeln. Innerhalb der App können die Leute die Orte sehen, die am nächsten sind und mit ihrer Hilfe die Richtung dorthin bekommen.

Möchten Sie sehen, wie unsere Solar-Ladestationen aussehen? Hier kommt's! Sie werden umweltfreundlich, kostenlos und sehr einfach zu bedienen sein!

Wir sind sehr begeistert von diesem Projekt, denn wir werden nicht nur mit einer Stadt aufhören! Deine Stadt wird die nächste sein, und du wirst dein Leben mit uns genießen. :)

Was ist unsere Evidenz?

Im Rahmen des City-Charge-Projekts haben wir eine kleine Umfrage durchgeführt, um ein vorläufiges Verständnis für das Ausmaß des Bedarfs an Dienstleistungen zu erlangen, die wir anbieten möchten. 69,7% unserer Befragten gaben an, dass sie ihre mobilen Geräte mindestens einmal am Tag aufladen, und nur 9,1% von ihnen gaben an, dass sie immer eine Powerbank haben. 97% unserer Befragten gaben an, dass sie ein Kabelladegerät verwenden. Die große Mehrheit der Befragten (69,7%) gab an, dass sie ihr Telefon einmal am Tag aufladen, während bei einer vollständigen Nutzung des Telefons die einmalige Gebühr nur für 7 Stunden ausreicht. Dies zeigt deutlich, dass das Gerät mindestens einmal am Tag aufgeladen werden muss.

Eine große Mehrheit unserer Befragten (~ 70%) äußerte eine positive Einstellung gegenüber Telefon-Ladestationen in Berlin und 93,9% äußerten die Notwendigkeit, ihr Telefon an sicheren öffentlichen Orten aufzuladen. Die am meisten bevorzugten Orte, an denen die Befragten angaben, waren Pubs, Bars, Clubs und Bus- / Bahnhöfe.

 

Warum bist DU der Schlüssel zum Erfolg?

Unser gewähltes Modell, um unsere einfachen, aber wichtigen Fragen des täglichen Lebens herauszufordern, kann nur verwirklicht werden, wenn wir gleichgesinnte Menschen haben, die uns unterstützen. Dafür haben wir unsere Vergünstigungen so entwickelt, dass Sie glücklich sind! Du kannst so viel wie möglich beitragen und wenn du mehr willst, möchtest du, dass wir deinen Beitrag der Öffentlichkeit präsentieren, du kannst es tun! Es ist unser Hauptziel: zu zeigen, dass Menschen für Menschen tun!

 

Unser Zeitplan für das Projekt ist folgender:

 

Die Möglichkeiten, wie Sie uns helfen können

Um dieses Projekt umzusetzen, brauchen wir Ihre Hilfe! Bitte leisten Sie einen Beitrag zu unserer Kampagne auf jedem Niveau, das Sie können. Jeder Beitrag wird sehr geschätzt, und wir werden für Ihre Unterstützung für immer dankbar sein!

Bitte TEILEN Sie diese Kampagne (den Indiegogo-Link) mit Ihrer Familie, Freunden, Netzwerk, Kunden, mailen Sie sie, posten Sie sie, tweeten Sie oder sprechen Sie einfach darüber :)

story: Indiegogo doesn't work without Press Releases and more content. Just as a heads up to others.
story_txt: Indiegogo doesn't work without Press Releases and more content. Just as a heads up to others.

story:
EMY

The World's First Mobile app to identify your real emotions!

Who am I?
I am Emy - your personal assistant in emotions. 

Meeting sincere people, share emotions with them, manage your emotions - I will be your faithful assistant in this! My creators have made me an expert in emotional intelligence and emotions. Special device cap will catch your mood, and I will tell you what you need right now. Magic? Yes!

 

Emy will help you:

  • To find acquaintances easily based on your emotional state at the moment.
  • To develop skills of emotional intelligence, to help you control emotions and support in stressful situations.

 

How it works?

Why Emy is special?

The service is suitable for those who do not want to spend their time searching for an interlocutor. There are no profiles and the possibility of connecting with another person - only emotions are needed.

What's the difference from other dating services?

The main difference from competitors is the criterion for choosing a person for communication. The idea of ​​the satellite selection algorithm is based on emotion and the desire to share it.

 

And one more thing!

In addition to dating features that are offered within Emy, the functionality for training emotional intelligence skills, increasing productivity and reducing stress is declared.

Emotional Intelligence or EQ - the ability to recognize and manage your emotions, perceive feelings, understand the motivation and desires of others. Psychologists started talking about EQ when they realized: IQ tests are not enough to predict a person’s success in life and career

Emotional intelligence includes: communication skills, motivation, empathy, social responsibility, conflict management skills.

 

Emy will help you to improve EQ skills and will give you practical advices to tune in to an important meeting. Be calm, self-confident and positive,

 

 

Only emotions. No profiles, no correspondence

Emy was designed to communicate with all people who has not perfect profile pictures that cannot chatting so well as to describe their true character and emotions in a couple of sentences. And for people who sees the meaning that real emotions cannot be faked.

Why will you like Emy?

Each of us had come across a situation when you want just to talk with someone in order to cheer you up. And Emy will help to organize this naturally!

Empathy and real meetings - what is really important for good communication. And only empathy have a huge power to make your mood better. Not correspondence in social networks.

 

Facts + Specification

  • 8 EEG electrodes
  • Weight <250 gr
  • Charging time <3 hours
  • 256 Hz sample rate
  • Low power Bluetooth
  • micro USB
  • Battery for 8h
  • 3 different cap colors
  • Mobile app for Android and iOS

 

About us

We are developers of mobile applications of neurotechnology, specialists in graphic design and emotional intelligence. We have created more than 30 mobile applications in various fields, including those related to neuroscience and the physiology of brain activity.

 

Partners

Connect with Us

We’d love to answer any questions you have.

  • Website
  • Instagram
  • Twitter

We know how important communication is and we promise to be transparent and open with you to the best of our abilities. We commit to resolving issues rapidly. We need your help to grow the project and fulfill our mission of helping people to learn emotions and we are incredibly appreciative your complicity. 
If you have any questions or recomendations - feel free to email us support@emyfeeling.com

Thanks for believing in us!

 

Help Out By Sharing With Friends!

Emy was designed to communicate with all people who has not perfect profile pictures that cannot chatting so well as to describe their true character and emotions in a couple of sentences. And for people who sees the meaning that real emotions cannot be faked.

Why will you like Emy?
Each of us had come across a situation when you want just to talk with someone in order to cheer you up. And Emy will help to organize this naturally!
Empathy and real meetings - what is really important for good communication. And only empathy have a huge power to make your mood better. Not correspondence in social networks.


 
Facts + Specification


8 EEG electrodes
Weight <250 gr
Charging time <3 hours
256 Hz sample rate
Low power Bluetooth
micro USB
Battery for 8h
3 different cap colors
Mobile app for Android and iOS

 
About us
We are developers of mobile applications of neurotechnology, specialists in graphic design and emotional intelligence. We have created more than 30 mobile applications in various fields, including those related to neuroscience and the physiology of brain activity.




 
Partners

Connect with Us
We’d love to answer any questions you have.

Website
Instagram
Twitter

We know how important communication is and we promise to be transparent and open with you to the best of our abilities. We commit to resolving issues rapidly. We need your help to grow the project and fulfill our mission of helping people to learn emotions and we are incredibly appreciative your complicity. If you have any questions or recomendations - feel free to email us support@emyfeeling.com
Thanks for believing in us!
 
Help Out By Sharing With Friends!

story:
What motivation causes us to start this project?

In 2007, Winson was trying to sell computer hardware, software and network devices with his associates on the web. Although he and his associates were engineers, they found building an e-commerce site and all intranet operational applications involved huge amount of money and time. They realized something was wrong therefore they then spent the following 5 years on developing the “Codeless Computing Platform” to facilitate an economical method of rapid application development.

 

Shred IT expenses, time and effort by 90% +

Have you ever purchased or got quotes from Information Technology solution providers at staggering prices? Have you ever waited for a long time for these application to be ready? Have you ever wondered why computer programs must be done by technical experts? Have you wondered whether this money and time spent is worth your investment?

We have. And therefore, we built a platform that facilitates users to:

  • Spend only $200 per year for applications/infrastructure
  • Create an application in a day
  • Develop applications without technical knowledge
  • Use one "Company-wide" database across all applications

Not only do we believe that applications should be created with minimal time, money, expertise and effort, but also, we believe that applications should and can be shared across the globe.

 

Current IT issues

Staggering Cost

Why is it so expensive in developing applications? The cost involved are-

    1. Hardware cost
    2. Software cost
    3. Application Development cost
    4. Maintenance cost including network fees, software maintenance
    5. Future upgrade cost

Just a simple web application like on-line marketing survey or order taking, may cost at least $8,000 to $10,000 already.

Long lead-time

Even if you would like to spend these huge expenses, the lead time is unbearable. It may take 3 to 6 months to develop a simple application. It includes requirement gathering and confirmation, prototyping, programming, testing, installation etc..

Programming difficulties

What then is the real problem? The ugly truth is software applications started off with “hard-code” in mind. This means that only computer programmers can develop applications. While high-paid computer programmers are expert in programming, they do not know much about your business processes. So, they have to spend time and effort to understand your business process before even drafting anything. You can imagine there is enormous cost.

 

How we drive down cost, time and remove programming barrier: Codeless Computing

Our view is totally different,  ”Applications must be code free.”  Software system should be able to handle all back-end development. Business owners should just handle application development themselves to drive down the cost. (The same analogy happened decades ago, only secretaries typed for the bosses. Now, everybody uses the Word Processor.)

We visualize the system should-

  • Be code free
  • Have a single interface
  • Use one database across all applications
  • Be Zero hardware / software cost
  • Charge minimal cost
  • Incur minimal development time
  • Support multi-language
  • Be usable by personal computers, mobiles and tablets

Users can develop their applications with simple points and clicks. So, anybody should be able to develop a simple application within a day or two.

Results of deploying canned solutions, eventually you were creating multiple data islands. Imagine you ask two different solution providers to deploy a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and an Account applications, it is highly likely that you have to input data twice by two interfaces. In contrast, BAX assigned only one dedicated database for each company therefore if you develop applications in our BAX platform then you use only one interface, input data once and maintain only one set of data.

BAX is a profile driven programming environment. Users need to fill in the detail of an application profile “form” then a module will be generated accordingly. A lot of pre-built functions are ready to use e.g. Document Audit Trailing, Document Add/Edit controlling etc.  BAX platform is not Independent Development Environment (IDE). It is much simpler than IDE. Better still, it is on the cloud. It means that once an app is developed, it can be used instantly.

 

What we offer

Default business applications

A platform on Cloud comes with the most commonly used business applications:

    • Customer profile
    • Vendor profile
    • Sale Lead Management application
    • Purchase application
    • Account application
    • IT Helpdesk
    • Document Library application

Our platform supports multi-language in all field labels and data. We provide full flexibility for each user who can choose his/her preferred language.

All of these applications can be customized by changing the application profile settings to meet user requirements. In our current practice, while we are getting user requirements, we can modify the application and show the application final results on the spot. In this way, an application is created already.

Application Generator

We know you want more than our default applications. Our Application Generator allows you to add your own application. We provide all simple Web development interfaces for you to “Do It Yourself” and save cost and money.

How much savings you can get from developing your own application? Let me give you an example. The most prominent Customer Relationship Management service provider, salesforce.com is charging a whopping $250 per user / month for their highest end customizable solution. If there are only 5 users in the company, it costs $15,000 per year. We charge you only $200. That is a 98.67% savings. Remember our system does not confine a user to customize only the CRM application. All BAX applications are 100% customizable.

Application Sharing / Selling as a business

Since applications can be easily developed through our platform, we believe users would like to share / sell their applications.

Can you imagine that you once are spending money on business applications can now earn money from developing applications? You can turn your brilliant business processes into an application and sell to the whole world. “BAX Application Marketplace” allows you to do so.

 

Demonstration videos

Please visit our demonstration videos so that you will know how user-friendly the system is-

  • Setup your company site
  • Default Applications Overview
  • Customize an Existing Applications
  • Multilingual Support
  • Creating an application (Document Library) 

 

Who we are

We are a bunch of engineers who would like to make business applications affordable and timely.

  • Winson Chan, Database engineer, Rapid Java developer expert, Lotus Notes Expert, Web-hosting development consultant, Online merchant payment gateway specialist
  • Edwin Kwong, Network, Windows and Unix systems engineer and GPS specialist
  • Alan Leung, LAMP and J2EE application specialist, SAP Project Management Consultant and Lotus Notes expert.

 

What we did and how we can help businesses reduce IT expenses

We have already contributed five years’ time to develop the Codeless Computing Platform. It is a Web base system and it is in full function. We target to help users save 90%+ of their Information Technology expenses, probably in $000s and months of development time.

 

When you back us up, in two months’ time, we will….

  • Revamp look and feel of graphic user-interface by professional graphic designers
  • Set up one year network hosting facility for 10,000 initial users
  • Develop training video clips and documentation

 

Please back us up so that you can-

  • spend $200 per year for application and infrastructure
  • create an application in a day
  • develop applications without technical expertise
  • share / sell your BAX applications by applying your business know-how

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Question: Why do you do this project? What is your vision?

Answer: We believe that computing and automation should not have high cost of entry.  Our vision is Information Technology (1) should be provided at a very affordable cost. It should be at most 10% of the current cost. In the event that only a SME with fewer than 5 persons, 90%+ of the cost can be saved. (2) Development time should be within a day or two. (3) Anybody can do this. (4) Since anybody can develop applications, these applications should be shared / sold easily in web-space.

 

Question: Your project has an interesting name, Business Application Express?

Answer: Our vision is to facilitate Codeless Computing Platform to develop application with minimal time, a day or two.

 

Question: What is codeless computing platform? What is the benefit?

Answer: Codeless Computing Platform means the user does not have to do any coding or learn any specific computer language. Our platform does all these already. Users with no technical knowledge can develop business application. A similar analogy is in the past only secretaries  typed. Now everybody uses word processors. Users only need to make an application process by some simple clicks.

Traditional application development results in multiple data islands and interfaces. Imagine you ask two separate IT solution companies to develop a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) and an Account applications, it is highly likely that you have to input data twice by two interfaces. Our platform utilizes only one database. If you develop applications in our platform, you use only one interface, input data once and maintain only one set of data.

 

Question: How can I utilize BAX services? What devices are compatible?

Answer: BAX services need web browsers. Computers, iphones and android phones or any smart phone browsers like Safari, Chrome and Internet Explorer can access our services.

 

Question: How can non-technical people develop applications? Shouldn’t this for smart programmers only?

Answer: Nobody believed everybody could type 60 years ago. Only secretaries did that. With word-processors around, everybody can type because there is no penalty for typing wrongly. BAX Application Generator provides a “What You See is What you Get” development environment.

 

Question : How can an application be developed within a day or two by ordinary people when programmers say they need 3 to 6 months?

Answer: A typical application development process includes

  • requirement gathering and confirmation, 1 month
  • prototyping and programming, 1 month
  • testing, 2 weeks
  • installation, 2 weeks

That is a 3 month lead time.

For BAX, the back-end system with business logic, complex code and database are already there. Therefore, with the “What You See is What you Get” development environment, all these are done when you gather the user requirements. Please visit our demonstration video to see how we develop an application in 3 minutes.

 

Question: My internet access is not stable and that storing data in the cloud at BAX platform seems not convenient. Can I install BAX software in my own server?

Answer: Well, we are just starting off and we plan to add in server software version. However, we strongly recommend you to test out our service via the web-space before initiating any purchase. We want you to be 100% satisfied with our platform before spending more money. Please drop us a mail, twitter or facebook instant message if you are interested in getting a server software version.

 

Question: Are you saying that I can sell my application?

Answer: Yes, you are right. BAX Marketplace allows users to host their applications for sale / trial in the web-space. Users decide whether they would like to charge other users for using their developed applications.

 

Question: I like BAX services. But I have data in existing applications. It is impossible for me to change to your services.

Answer: Our services accept data from Excel spreadsheet. As long as your input data is in CSV format file, BAX can import it.

story:
Minimal & Unibody Design

The Endurance: Model A is a minimalist writing instrument crafted from precision-machined aluminium. The body is created with a single block of Aircraft Grade Aluminium Alloy, such design are very rare even in bolt-action series pen. The materials coupled with the Model A's clean, rugged design, make it a creative tool that will inspire you to create every day. ​Inspired by Japanese shibui and zen concept.  

As a small independent manufacturer, we really need your support to launch a production run of the Endurance: Model A. As the only way to make these minimalistic and rugged writing instrument with the highest quality material available to everyone is to purchase them in bulk. By backing this project you will be supporting us to create a set of truly premium and lasting writing instruments at an affordable price.

Bolt action mechanism

The smooth and satisfying “Click"

 

Writing Experience

Pen is an essential tools of our everyday life. It is not just a writing instrument, it is a tool for self-expression. It embodies soul and wisdom of its owner. Pen is an extension of your thoughts, goals and achievements.

With Model A we enabled exactly that, the smooth yet grippy feeling of Model A. The satisfying and heafty feel of the pen makes jotting down boring notes fun. Plus the satisfying bolt action mechanism makes even your friend jealous.

The satisfying feeling of Model A lessen the fatigued of writing down thousand word essay.

 

 

Material 

We choose Aircraft Grade Aluminum Alloy as the main material of the pen. It is much lighter than other metal and has exhibited durable strength to bending when force is applied to it. The lightness of the pen makes writing much more fluid and less tiring. To make the pen more durable, Stainless Steel will be used on parts that need to withstand high stresses, which are the Slotted bolts to hold the clip, the bolt action trigger and bolt action body.

 

Specification

  • Minimalist and rugged design
  • High precision CNC-machined 
  • Aircraft Grade Aluminium Alloy (Body and Clip)
  • Stainless Steel (Slotted blots, Bolt-action mechanism)
  • Length: 13 cm
  • Grip Size: 1 cm

 

Compatible Refill

Here's a list of some of the refills you can use in the pen 

  • Schmidt P900 B Ballpoint Pen Refill
  • Faber-Castell Ballpoint Pen Refill
  • Parker ballpoint refill
  • Parker Gel ink ballpoint refill
  • Monteverde Parker Style Gel ink ballpoint refill
  • Monteverde standard ballpoint refill
  • Parker Gel ink ballpoint refill
  • Monteverde Parker Style Gel ink ballpoint refill
  • CARAN D'ACHE BALLPOINT REFILL
  • FISHER SPACE PEN BALLPOINT REFILL
  • SHEAFFER BALLPOINT Monteverde Sheaffer compatible ballpoint refill
  • STANDARD INTERNATIONAL BALLPOINT Parker ballpoint refill
  • Monteverde standard ballpoint refill
  • Parker Gel ink ballpoint refill
  • Monteverde Parker Style Gel ink ballpoint refill

As long your refill looks something like the refill below it would fit. 

Rewards

Early bird: $39
1X Endurance: Model A
1X Free Ink Refill

($20 off retail price of $59)

Early bird: x2 $78
2X Endurance: Model A
2X Free Ink Refill

($40 off retail price of $118)

Standard: $49
1X Endurance: Model A
1X Free Ink Refill

($10 off retail price of $59)

Duo Combo: $98
2X Endurance: Model A
2X Free Ink Refill

($20 off retail price of $118)

Triple Combo: $147
3X Endurance: Model A
3X Free Ink Refill

($30 off retail price of $177)

 

Manufacturing

All Endurance : Model - A pen will be manufactured through Precision CNC Machining process, which ensures that each pen will meet its desired quality. All pen will also be inspected and hand polished by us before we ship it to our client. 

Made and assembled in Malaysia.

 

    Timeline

     

    About us

    The Impact

    With your contribution and us achieving our funding goal, this would enable people like you and me to have finally have a affordable, minimalistic and rugged precision machined aluminium pen.

    Risks & Challenges

    We have been working on this precision machined pen for more than a year. Through trials and error we have pinned down every design detail and manufacturing process. We have produced multiple prototypes which have helped us to better understand the design and mechanism of the pen. The pen is now ready for production and we have secured the best manufacturer in Malaysia that specializes in precision metal components.

    Our greatest challenge is to achieve our funding goal and be able to place our very first production order. Your support is essential and we will be very grateful for your support and kindness.

    Please let us know if you have any further questions. We are looking forward to produce this pen just for you.

    Other Ways You Can Support Us

    Help us share this page of course and if... you are still studying, ❤️  the pen but just can't afford it? Send us a message and we'll see what we can do about it. Help us spread the word and you might just get a surprise. 

    Made with ❤️  from Malaysia

Timeline

 
About us

The Impact
With your contribution and us achieving our funding goal, this would enable people like you and me to have finally have a affordable, minimalistic and rugged precision machined aluminium pen.

Risks & Challenges
We have been working on this precision machined pen for more than a year. Through trials and error we have pinned down every design detail and manufacturing process. We have produced multiple prototypes which have helped us to better understand the design and mechanism of the pen. The pen is now ready for production and we have secured the best manufacturer in Malaysia that specializes in precision metal components.
Our greatest challenge is to achieve our funding goal and be able to place our very first production order. Your support is essential and we will be very grateful for your support and kindness.
Please let us know if you have any further questions. We are looking forward to produce this pen just for you.

Other Ways You Can Support Us
Help us share this page of course and if... you are still studying, ❤️  the pen but just can't afford it? Send us a message and we'll see what we can do about it. Help us spread the word and you might just get a surprise. 
Made with ❤️  from Malaysia

story:
VOYAGE
Experience the Trinity.

 

III elements

What makes Voyage so appealing.


 

  • Locked in Handmade Timber Pen-case
     
  • Hidden in Genuine Leather Pouch
     
  • Made from Space-grade Aluminium Body

 

III functions

The Voyage in writing space.

 

  • The Pen - It’s a usual pen living in an unusual body. Made from space-grade aluminium to give you an experience of reliability and confidence for years.
     
  • The Pencil - We know how important it is to sketch something before you write it down, so here it is: fully automatic, always sharp and just a twist away from the pen.
     
  • The Touch Pen - For convenient use of devices with touch screen like tablets, smartphones or laptops. Specially designed shape of rubber end prevents from scratches on the screen surface, extending its lifetime. It’s irreplaceable when you need to write something quick.
 

So, u can draft it, write it and send it using your Voyage and any type of touch device.

 

III virtues

Trinity that u need for eternity.


 

  • Solid - Due to the design and components, it’s one of those things that you will pass to your descendant… unwillingly.
     
  • Elegant - Looks like a pen, not like a heavy machine gun.
     
  • Handy - Compass and thermometer are not included. Because you know what you need at work.
     

Short Summary
 

✅ Space-grade aluminium

✅ Automatic pencil

✅ Minimalistic and elegant design

✅ Touch screen top

✅ Genuine leather pouch

✅ Handmade timber case



 

Shipping

Free Worldwide shipping.

 

Timeline

Prototyping

The design of the Voyage looks simple, we spent countless hours tweaking the geometry and design, and we reworked and redesigned the mechanism multiple times. It was a long journey to get to the current design, and we can't wait for you to use it!

 

Risks & Challenges

The main risks and challenges are as follows:

Taking a product from a prototype into mass production will always surface new challenges that have to be addressed. It takes time and patience to make the right call and can even lead to minor changes and tweaks in the appearance than what the prototypes currently show. Since this will be the first production run, we may have to change some things and will let everyone know about any changes via project updates.

Production delays: 
We are working with extremely experienced machining and finishing suppliers that are used to handling quantities well over the amount that are typical for Kickstarter which means that there is little risk of a production bottleneck. Though it is unlikely, delays can still happen as machinery can break down, raw materials can arrive late etc. which can create unanticipated setbacks. If this highly unlikely scenario takes place, frequent communication and transparency with our backers is our top priority.

 

Why Indiegogo?

Since everything about this pen is custom machined, there is a sizable upfront cost, as well as a minimum quantity needed to get this off the ground. If you are interested in supporting your new favorite pen, hit the pink button to help bring the Voyage pen into existence.

Thanks for your support!
