story:
WHO ARE WE?

The Mother magazine is an independent print  and digital publication and has been publishing magazines for almost 13 years.

We publish beautiful images and inspiring content. 

The Mother magazine is a successful publication and after many years in business, we understand how mothers want and need to communicate with each other. 

As a business, we are active social media users and constantly receive requests from readers / followers all over the world asking us to put them in contact with other readers in their local area.

So we had a great idea... 


OUR BIG IDEA

The plan is to build a MOBILE APP that will make it easy and effortless for mothers to find and connect with each other based on their geographic location and common interests.

We need to raise at least £25,000 to build this application, initially in iOS. Any money raised above this target will allow us to launch it in Android and then the other major mobile platforms (helping even MORE mothers to get the support they need!).

Mothers want to CONNECT with like-minded mothers, they need these friendships.

Statistically mothers use social media more than ANY other demographic - including teenagers! (this is such an amazing statistic!!).  

This app will give people a better sense of community and bring people together that have similar interests and live close to each other, it just makes sense.

We need your help with this campaign so we can create this wonderful support network.


IMPACT

We think that this is a really special project.

We know from experience with our readers that it is all too easy for mothers of all ages to feel isolated, and we also know that more mothers every day are using social networks, looking to form those really important mother circles and friendships and get the support that every mother needs. 

Our app will easily allow mothers to CONNECT with other like-minded mothers that live close to them and share their common interests. This idea uses social media in its highest form  - connecting people online and in real life.

We want to create a social and safe place for mothers to meet other mothers online AND in person, creating a nurturing, safe place to meet / get advice or just to make friends!

We think mothers will love using this app...

 
PERKS

We have some really amazing perks, and all the products are available to be shipped anywhere in the world. Take a look:


SUBSCRIPTIONS TO THE MOTHER MAGAZINE

Digital and print subscriptions. Our natural, holistic mothering magazine is a bi-monthly publication. Stunning imagery and inspiring content. These subscriptions will begin with issue 68  (Feb/March 2015).


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HAND STAMPED CHARM NECKLACE

Galway Designs charm necklace - 1 charm - stamped with a name of your choosing.

Simply beautiful...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

AWARD WINNING BABY BODY BUTTERS

Cath Mather - skin care specialist's wonderful  Baby Body Butters - 100g, soft, natural, and good for baby's skin.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"FOR MY CHILDREN" - HARDBACK BOOK

By Dionna Ford - Author and Blogger

"FOR MY CHILDREN, a mother's journal of memories, wishes and wisdom" by Dionna Ford, from the blog Code Name: Mama, has written this beautiful journal for mothers. It contains thought-provoking, fun, and creative writing prompts that allow mothers to share a lifetime of experiences 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"HOMEMADE CLEANERS" - PAPERBACK BOOK

 Co-authored by Dionna Ford and Mandy 'O Brien

Quick and easy toxic-free recipes.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE MOTHER MAGAZINE BACK ISSUES

12 years of The Mother magazine. Our entire collection of back issues in digital format, 66 issues of inspiring content  - worth over £130.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GORGEOUS COLOURING BOOK

By Artist Susan Merrick

Featuring some of her gentle, nature inspired images. Children love these. This colouring book will arrive in your email inbox as a pdf for you to print again and again for hours of fun!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PACK OF 3 GREETING CARDS

By Artist Susan Merrick 

Featuring the image "Hold Them Close". These cards are blank inside so can be used for any occasion or simply put in a frame to hang on the wall.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

2015 CALENDAR 

By Artist Susan Merrick

Featuring images from the "LIFE" collection. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BLISS BALLS FOR BEGINNERS

Digital recipe book by writer and blogger Luschka van Onselen

Bliss Balls makes our mouth water...

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"HAPPY HAIR" 

The Definitive guide to Giving Up Shampoo.

by writer and blogger Lucy AitkenRead 

The Amazon Number One Bestseller as seen in The Telegraph, The Guardian and Cosmopolitan! Full of fantastic information about going shampoo free, 

Lucy's digital book will arrive direct to your email! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE MOTHER MAGAZINE - ADVERTISING DEALS  

Natural Parenting or Lifestyle businesses? ECO friendly or Fairtrade company - we have some pretty fabulous advertising opportunities for you! 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We understand that some people aren't able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help us!!

    Share. Please share this campaign, share it wherever you can...

    Talk. Please talk about this campaign to anyone who needs advice, help, friendship and support..

    Bond  - with another mother. laugh, cry, and inspire each other.

Lucy's digital book will arrive direct to your email! 



-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Other Ways You Can Help 

We understand that some people aren't able to contribute financially, but that doesn't mean you can't help us!!


Share. Please share this campaign, share it wherever you can...


Talk. Please talk about this campaign to anyone who needs advice, help, friendship and support..


Bond  - with another mother. laugh, cry, and inspire each other.

story:
We are a development company from Estonia and we created open source project SaaS Platform. Our main objective is to create a general-purpose application framework for StartUp companies. SaaS Platform saves you weeks of development by starting you off with all the features that are the same in every SaaS, so you can focus on what makes your app unique.

In today's digital world, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) generally refers to a new and alternative way of accessing software, as opposed to more traditional methods of access.  

 

​​

Multi-Tenant Teams Marketing Manager
Team Billing Connects to Stripe CRM
Configure plans Subscriptions Management Accounting
Per-Seat Pricing Subscriptions Helpdesk
Invoices Announcements Sales Management
User Impersonation Two-Factor Authentication Queue Management
API Out Of The Box Manage users and roles Push Notification Management
API Authentication for your mobile app Localization Social Media Manager
Authentication Enhanced UI BI
Website Manager Content Management Emal Management
ANALYTICS: Payment Management Log Management
eCommerce Management Notification Manager System Management
Advertisement Management Referral Management  
SEO Manager Cache Management  
Easy to Customize & Extend Newsletter Management  

 

We are integrated with more than 50 partners:

SMS: - NEXMO - CLOCKWORK - TEXTLOCAL - AWS - TWILIO
SEARCH - ALGOLIA - SPIHNX - ELASTICSEARCH - AWS
EMAIL: - MAILGUN - SMTP - SPARKPOST - AWS SES - MANDRIL - SENDGRID - ELASTIC EMAIL - TIPIMAIL
CACHE: - REDIS - MEMCACHED
QUEUE - BEANSTALKD - AWS SQS - REDIS - KAFKA - RABITMQ
ERROR REPORITNG / LOGGING - BUGSNAG - SENTRY - GAYLOG - LOGSTASH - LOGGY - AWS SNS - SLACK
ACCOUNTING: - QUICKBOOKS
STORAGE: - AZURE STORAGE - AWS S3 - DIGITAL OCEAN - RACKSPACE
DATABASE: - MYSQL - PSSQL - MARIADB - MONGODB
REPO: - GITHUB - BITBUCKET
ANALYTICS: - Google Analytics - Heap - MATOMO
NEWSLETTER: - MAILCHIMP - SENDY - COMPAING MONITORING
PAYMENT: - STRIPE - PAYPAL - BRAINTREE

 

Modular design enables sales and marketing teams to build flexible, scalable and comprehensive customer relations.

Help Desk
CRM
Website
Blog
Queue Management
API Management
Media Manager
Email Manager
Notifications Manager
Log Manager 
Documentations
Sandbox
SocialMedia
Accounting
Invoices
Finance
Newsletter
Marketing Management
SEO
Roles
Backup Manager

 

Our technology stack is based upon PHP (7.3) and running on Linux. Configurations and templates are available on the GitHub.

Cloud Support: Azure, AWS, Digital Ocean
IAC Templates: Terraform
Docker templates: Docker Swarm, Docker Compose
Configuration templates: Puppet
Programming language backend: PHP 7.3
Framework Laravel 5.7
Database: MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
Queue: Beanstalkd, Kafka, Redis
Search: Elasticsearch
Storage: AWS S3, Azure Blob Storage
Logging: GrayLog, Logstash
HTTP Servers: Nginx, Apache
HTTP Cache Server: Varnish

SaaS Platform provides several built-in system roles which serve specific functions within SaaS Platform, and which provide common roles and functions. System roles are pre-defined in SaaS Platform. Some system roles may be assigned to specific user accounts to perform certain types of actions. Other system roles are special roles which allow you to grant certain users permissions to access specific objects.

RAD is one of the most successful software development programs available today, with numerous benefits for both software development teams as well as their clients.

Here are just a few advantages:

  • RAD lets you break the project down into smaller, more manageable tasks.
  • The task-oriented structure allows project managers to optimize their team’s efficiency by assigning tasks according to members’ specialities and experience.
  • Clients get a working product delivered in a shorter time frame.
  • Regular communication and constant feedback between team members and stakeholders increases the efficiency of the design and build process.

With a shorter planning phase and a focus on highly iterative design and construction, RAD teams are able to accomplish more in less time without sacrificing client satisfaction.

A win-win for both project managers and clients.

 

 

 

We are currently in the development phase.

We need donations, so we can have a good test of our platform. We need $3,500 for Amazon, AWS and Digital Ocean credit.

We are developing this fundraising campaign to solicit for your support which may be financial or in-kind (technical support, advice, and suggestions). Please feel free to donate any amount you can. Each donation procures a codified voucher. Regardless of whatever you donate, you will be issued a certificate of appreciation/recognition which will reflect the amount donated and a number of coded vouchers rewarded. 
 

Even if you can't make a donation, you can still help us meet our goal!
If you are ready to join this exciting journey with us, please support our campaign and spread the word! A few clicks for you make a big difference for us.

 

Each contribution or donation will receive a ‘thank you letter’ plus coded certificate (soft copy) as evidence of your contribution and for reference purposes. This is in addition to other rewards (see below indicated in Perks).
 

The concept of design for SaaS Platform is based on the FLAT design and finally, it comes out with a clean and neat design. It is built on top of the popular Bootstrap Framework. Besides that, it is bundled with a lot of third-party plugins and other usable elements.

 

What is SaaS Platform?
SaaS Platform is an open-source, PHP based, a cloud-ready multi-tenant Application Development Platform. It is designed for building practical, production-ready Web Apps. SaaS Platform offers several pre-built modules that heavy lifts most of the complex, non-functional requirement and operational needs of an application.
How long does it take for my developers to learn your framework?
It takes less than 3 days for developers to get comfortable using the framework. Our training program structure consists of Class Room/Online Sessions and hands-on assignments, which can enable the developers to get a good hold of the framework. We also provide surplus materials in the form of Developers guide, API Documents, Videos and Step by Step How-To s with sample code. Request the access for SaaS Platform Knowledge Base.
How do I get started with SaaS Platform
git clone https://github.com/saas-consulting/saas-dev-pla...
How to install SaaS Platform?
It's really easy to get started with SaaS Platform. We invite you to take a look at the starting guide. https://github.com/saas-consulting/saas-dev-pla...:
What version of PHP is required for SaaS Platform?:
It is required to use the latest version of PHP (currently 7.2).
How can I contribute?
You can contribute to the open-source project on GitHub but please make sure to read the contributing file first. For more information, take a look at the community page. Also, feel free to join us on Slack and give us your feedback.
Where do discussions take place?:
Discussions take place on Slack, GitHub and Stack Overflow. See our support page for more information.
Who is behind SaaS Platform?:
SaaS Platform is actively sponsored and maintained by SaaS Consulting - Estonia, the company behind the SaaS Platform open-source project. Visit the company page to discover more about the company and the team.

 

Have a suggestion?  We want to hear it!
If you have a comment or suggestion regarding our project, our Customer Service staff would like to know.  
Contact us (contact@saas-consulting.eu) or write in comments.

 

Share SaaS Platform and hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this!

 

Launching software from the ground up has its challenges. Although we are almost certain we will be ready to launch by January 1st, 2019, and will work our very hardest to meet that deadline, unanticipated hurdles may occur. We will keep you updated every step of the way.

 

There are many ways to get in touch with us. Choose your preferred method. We shall be at the other end.

  • SaaS Consulting LTD
  • LÕÕTSA 8, TALLINN
  • 11415, ESTONIA
  • contact@saas-consulting.eu

How long does it take for my developers to learn your framework?
It takes less than 3 days for developers to get comfortable using the framework. Our training program structure consists of Class Room/Online Sessions and hands-on assignments, which can enable the developers to get a good hold of the framework. We also provide surplus materials in the form of Developers guide, API Documents, Videos and Step by Step How-To s with sample code. Request the access for SaaS Platform Knowledge Base.
How do I get started with SaaS Platform
git clone https://github.com/saas-consulting/saas-dev-pla...

How to install SaaS Platform?
It's really easy to get started with SaaS Platform. We invite you to take a look at the starting guide. https://github.com/saas-consulting/saas-dev-pla...:
What version of PHP is required for SaaS Platform?:
It is required to use the latest version of PHP (currently 7.2).
How can I contribute?
You can contribute to the open-source project on GitHub but please make sure to read the contributing file first. For more information, take a look at the community page. Also, feel free to join us on Slack and give us your feedback.
Where do discussions take place?:
Discussions take place on Slack, GitHub and Stack Overflow. See our support page for more information.
Who is behind SaaS Platform?:
SaaS Platform is actively sponsored and maintained by SaaS Consulting - Estonia, the company behind the SaaS Platform open-source project. Visit the company page to discover more about the company and the team.
 Have a suggestion?  We want to hear it!If you have a comment or suggestion regarding our project, our Customer Service staff would like to know.  Contact us (contact@saas-consulting.eu) or write in comments. Share SaaS Platform and hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs this! Launching software from the ground up has its challenges. Although we are almost certain we will be ready to launch by January 1st, 2019, and will work our very hardest to meet that deadline, unanticipated hurdles may occur. We will keep you updated every step of the way. There are many ways to get in touch with us. Choose your preferred method. We shall be at the other end.
SaaS Consulting LTD
LÕÕTSA 8, TALLINN
11415, ESTONIA
contact@saas-consulting.eu

story:
In our experience ideas come best to life if you capture them on paper. For this purpose we designed an iPhone Sketchbook and sell it online at http://www.uishape.net.
Many of you asked when we finally will offer an iPad Sketchbook. Now we hope to start the production with your help.
For this we created a bunch of perks and we hope you like them. Some are limited so do not hesitate too long!

The iPad Sketchbook will have the same high quality as the iPhone Sketchbook. This means that you will get 60 double-sided printed sheets of 70lb/100g white paper protected by a cardboard front and back cover.
The whole Sketchbook is ring bound and every sheet will be perforated at the top.

What We Need & What You Get

We ask you for a funding of $1300. Without your help we would need months to get the funds to pay for the printing and shipping. So we hope you like the chance to preorder the Sketchbook.

Most of it will be used to pay the printing company.
The production is so expensive, because we demand high quality, want to produce in Germany and only with a certain amount we can order for an cost-efficient calculation.

The rest will be used for packaging, shipping and running the online store.

What happes if we do not reach the goal?

In the case we do not reach the goal you will get the full amount refunded. So you have no risk in supporting us. But lets work on reaching the goal together!

At the top and in the gallery you can see pictures of our prototype. They do not represent the final quality but you can get a feeling how the Sketchbook will look like.
To get an impression of our high quality Sketchbook have a look at our existing iPhone Sketchbook:

The perks

We basically provide two kinds of perk variants for you:

Our first perk variant will preorder you one or more of the iPad Sketchbook. You also have the chance to bundle it with the iPhone Sketchbook. The bigger the bundle, the bigger your savings!
Every perk (except for the $3 "Thank You") will also include a limited edition pencil. It will have "UI Shape Supporter" laser engraved onto it.

The second kind of perks gives you the chance to get a very reasonable priced written UX and Usability evaluation by a trained and certified Usability Engineer based on your (Prototype-)App, concept and/or wireframes.
This perks also include one iPad Sketchbook.

After the campaign ends we will commission the printing. This will take 4-8 weeks, but we hope to get the Sketchbooks earlier to you. Because of the production time we estimate a deliver date in early January 2013.

Who is behind this?

UI Shape is located in Germany and our mission is it to provide App Developers, Designers and User Experience Engineers with the right tools to enhance productivity and improve their work.

UI Shape is run by Sascha Uereten, an experienced Software and Usability Engineer. He is supported by his lovely fiance Anna.

Thanks so much for your support and even if you can not contribute we hope that you will tell everybody about this campaign.

story:
fxGo


Is the most revolutionary 3-axis waterproof gimbal system for GoPro.

System which consists of designed Watches, special Handheld and focus Balls, all synchronized via bluetooth for controllability. 

Just drop one ball in somebody's pocket, and the person always be in the fx Focus



be in one line with horizon



Set the needed angle using the comfortable stylish Watches, and the system of gyroscopic gears combined with electronic drives will keep your GoPro in the same angle the whole trip.

fxGo fully controllable wirelessly via bluetooth watches.


and share this moment 

with your friends



The box will be additionally packed with 3 amazing, bluetooth friendly, Focus Balls. Each ball in conjunction with watches, allows to split the roles in the scene with no worries.

When the balls appear in the area of watches (~20 meters max), the special Follow mode activated. The actor always be in the focus of your GoPro camera.


try to imagine what begins

when your add one more ball


You can freely switch between balls 
using watches' joystick


Selfie mode with handheld



Our handheld is designed to be comfortable regardless where your are. In the handheld we hide additional battery pack. 



Waterproof

Every element in this system is going to be waterproofed.



Goals


We are all-day working on new product, which will bring new possibilities in the GoPro lives.

We are thinking about new features, about new design, which will be published here as soon as possible. 

All we want - make shooting videos more fantastic and more attractive.



Risk and challenges


Our team is a mix of extremal developers and designers who worry about quality, targets and convenience of the final product. Our skills are targeted to produce the finest product. We are closely working with our manufacturers, treat all their ideas in a proper manner to make the gimbal more revolutionary.

We are perfectionists! We have already made the prototype and now we are writing code to synchronize balls watches and fxGo. Separately we are trying to improve the design and convenience of the device.

If we did not collect required sum, all money will be paid back.

We appreciate your choice and your ideas, be free to write your own opinion.

story:
Burdened with routine worries, I made the first prototype of  DIZZY360  for myself to soothe my nerves and gather my thoughts.

Having realized the effectiveness and uniqueness of the created thing, I did several things for my relatives too, the reviews were excellent. Based on this, the idea of ​​mass production of DIZZY360   came, so that more people could take advantage of  DIZZY360.

Everything necessary to make the first hundred pieces is available, so if the project is auspicious, these hundred pieces will be delivered in December 2017.

I would need the help of the participants to make polishing process possible in place to save time and expenses.DIZZY360   is the first and unique in its kind.                                                              If the targeted amount is not collected, the deposits will be returned.

We would also be very grateful for sharing information about   DIZZY360  with your friends.

story:
My Story

I created Mesh-It, the world's first silent fidget pen as a discreet solution for fidgeters in an office or classroom setting.

Currently, I'm a secondary teacher in Texas. After 16 years of teaching, I identified a desperate need to find a resource for my students and colleagues that would keep their hands occupied with minimal distractions.

I suffered from ADHD as a child and struggled to focus in the classroom. As a fidgeter myself, I discovered that a tangible object helped me focus. I created the Mesh-It pen (patent pending) to help quietly relieve nervous energy in both schools and offices alike.

The Mesh-It pen is an alternative to popular gadgets like the Fidget Spinner. Most of these sensory gadgets are highly visual and make noise becoming more of an interruption than a fix.

I have more than students in mind for the Mesh-It pen. My friends often vent to me about antsy co-workers who disrupt meetings with retractable pens or loud child-like widgets. The Mesh-It pen was truly created for all the nervous pen clickers of the world. 

How It Works

Mesh-It pen has a squeezable pouch that makes no sound and will not draw unwanted attention to the user. Using one or both hands, the user can slide, roll, or squish the marble back and forth in tight tube of mesh to soothe anxiety and stress. 

 

Pen Design

Why We Need Your Support

The number of children diagnosed with attention deficit hyperactivity disorder has reached more than 10 percent, a significant increase over the past 20 years. Our hope is to help both children and adults who struggle with ADHD or fidgeting so they can live and work to their fullest potential.

In order to accomplish this, we need your help to sell our inventory, allowing us to keep our pricing low by ordering in bulk and get our product quickly to market.

Public Reviews From Crowdfunding

"I’ve been letting my high school students use my pens and they love them!! I have a student who constantly drums and taps with his pencil and I haven’t heard a peep out of him this week after I gifted him one of them. They also write very smooth. Thanks for making an awesome product!"      -Chelsea

"I love the pens. I bought 3 pack for my sister and I who are autistic. My mom teaches special ed middle school students. She loved them and had me order 3 more for her and she plans to introduce them to her faculty." -Stephen

"I received my pens in the mail this week and in addition to being addicted to the silent fidgeting, I love how they write! My co-workers and family are placing orders as well. Once they got to see them and try them out, they were sold! Great product!" -Pat

"Just received my pens and love them! My coworkers cannot put them down and our students are loving them as well! These pens are AMAZING!!!" - Nancy

"I got mine today and I'm very happy with them. They write extremely well and the fidget part works great! Thank you!" -Rachel

"I got my Pen today and love them they are simple yet good." -Naveen

"I just got my pens today! yay!!! This was a quick, well-managed project! I love the pens." -Jim

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help spread the word and share on social media by using Indiegogo's share tools!

story:
Advantages of this invention are the fact that the people not owning a garage do not need to wipe of the snow from the car, do not have to defrost the windows and waste time with these operations during winter. Also, during summer, the interior of the car will not overheat excessively and not be so much dust on the vehicle anymore.

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Who are we?

Alivemaker was formed in 2011, motivated by a desire to make 3D printing easy to use and accessible to all. We have first-hand knowledge of many of the issues faced by those who wish to get into rapid prototyping and over 20 years of experience in plastic molding, plastic injection and CNC engraving. We've formed a wonderful team of electronic, software and machine design engineers. Some of us have worked in prototyping and plastic molding for more than 10 years.

Desktop 3D printing

We have developed an easy-to-use, low-cost, open-sourced 3D Printer that will change the way you can use your 3D printer. The printer server feature will make the 3D Printer able to be controlled from around anywhere, and it will work on either your Windows PC or Mac, or even your Smart Phone or Tablet.

Designed for professionals and hobbyists alike, the ALivemaker LANDr 3D printer lets you easily create high-quality plastic parts. The Alivemaker LANDr is perfect for prototype development, object replication and so much more!

The ALivemaker LANDR desktop printer is able print objects up to 200mm x 200mm x 150mm in size, yet has a compact base similar to that of an inkjet printer, making it easy to integrate into your workspace.

 

Easy to use, one-touch 3D printing

Easy to use, one-touch 3D printing
We believe that 3D printing should be as simple as using a 2D printer, and accessible to everyone. Yet today's 3D printers are either very expensive or require significant effort to produce acceptable results. Many systems require the user to learn how to perform complex and tricky calibrations.

Our 3D printer will change that. With the Alivemaker LANDR 3D printer you simply put your object file into the 3D printer, press a button and print. 

 

 

 

Alivemaker Hovercraft - 3D printing server

We believe the 3D Printing Server is the leap-forward in development for 3D printers in 2013.

A 3D printer is not the same as a 2D Printer, even if we try to make it work faster, it still need a lot of time to print the parts, sometimes an hour or more.

So, if you need to print a large object, then may be you can not power off your computer during the whole night.

Now with the Alivemaker LANDR, you can connect the 3D printer to your local area network. You can control it than by each PC, Mac, Smart Phone or Tablet in your local network. (If you want to use the Alivemaker Hovercraft with WiFi, you need to install a USB Wifi adapter on it, because the raspberry pi board does not have a WiFi module).

 

The appearance of the Alivemaker Hovercraft 3D printing server may chang before we ship it. Because we just want to make the Hovercraft look like a real Hovercraft.

With the 3D printing server, you just need to upload the STL or G-code file onto the server, finish a few settings and it will work. Than you could turn off your PC or Mac, or use your Phone to make a call to your friends or use you tablet to watch some movies. You just need to keep the 3D printing server powered on during the time the LANDR is working.

 

The Ink (i.e. ABS/PLA plastic): 

The Alivemaker LANDr uses 3mm ABS or PLA plastic as its "ink". Every Alivemaker LANDr which is backed on Indiegogo will come with one bag of plastic, each bag will contain 500g of plastic. 

Highlight:

 

*Alivemaker LANDr is accessible to anyone.

*Printing server in the local area network.

*Precise and high detail printing.

*Grand printing area / 200mm x 200mm x 150mm

*Fresh look, professional

*Sturdy structure, high quality parts

*Low – cost & Easy-to-use

*Great advanced printer (accessible to all user if you just heard about 3D printing

 

 

For our dear backer, we also have custom special:

such as the Alivemaker Custom USB-Flash card

 

 

Beside, we also provide Alivemaker custom T- shirts for our backers. Every T-shirt will have " Alivemaker Pioneer" printed on it. This will be limited and we hope it will be an honor for the backers. "We are so Proud of you".

 

 

Red

Here's a tip we just forget to inform before

All of the perks were including shipping fees to worldwide, but not including the tax which it may occured.

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

We've been working on our hardware and software applications for over a year. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it into production. 
Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING the Alivemaker LANDr . With your support, we will be able to bring the  Alivemaker LANDr 3D printer worldwide and carry on developing more useful, smart and affordable desktop 3D printers. While we're super close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:

 

  • Tooling and manufacturing setup.
  • Our first production run.
  • the development of some iOS and Android applications for 3D Printing Controll or 3D Scanning.

 


Besides, we still want to improve the Alivemaker LANDr:

So the final LANDr you get may be a little bit different from the LANDr you see here.


For example:
1.We are working tightly together with lots of manufacturing partners and we may be able to change all the 3D printed parts into polyamides or ABS plastic injection, this would improve the reliability and durability. What you have seen in the video and photos is our prototype LANDr. We have melt down and reborn the LANDr for thousands times to perfect our design. (We believe it is one of the most useful aspects of 3D printers to test the design and rework it if needed).
2.We may have to adjust the final appearance before the LANDr ships. But this will be just a little adjustment, not a big change. We would like to improve the quality of LANDr, and we also want to make it easy and fast to produce so our backers will get the Alivemaker LANDr fast.
3.In the near future, we would like to make speciall IOS or Andriod Apps for Alivemaker, such as some software for 3D scanning, 3D Printing Controll, or Sharing. But this kind of software will not be finished in a short period. We will try to speed it up. ^_^
4. We've staggered the rewards into several manageable batches so that we can meet our delivery targets on-time. However, Testing and Certification must be finished before the Alivemaker LANDr can be shipped. We've been careful to design and assemble the printer to make it more safe and reliable, but there is always a risk of delay while the product undergoes final testing and certification.

Last BUT not Least

For now, any news or update would be posted on these two website:

  •  www.indiegogo.com
  • www.alivemaker.com

If you like us, you could us the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign on your facebook or twitter.

 And also, we are very happy to get you e-mail and woud reply you soon.

Thanks for watching

From Alivemaker

We have developed an easy-to-use, low-cost, open-sourced 3D Printer that will change the way you can use your 3D printer. The printer server feature will make the 3D Printer able to be controlled from around anywhere, and it will work on either your Windows PC or Mac, or even your Smart Phone or Tablet.
Designed for professionals and hobbyists alike, the ALivemaker LANDr 3D printer lets you easily create high-quality plastic parts. The Alivemaker LANDr is perfect for prototype development, object replication and so much more!
The ALivemaker LANDR desktop printer is able print objects up to 200mm x 200mm x 150mm in size, yet has a compact base similar to that of an inkjet printer, making it easy to integrate into your workspace.

 
Easy to use, one-touch 3D printing
Easy to use, one-touch 3D printingWe believe that 3D printing should be as simple as using a 2D printer, and accessible to everyone. Yet today's 3D printers are either very expensive or require significant effort to produce acceptable results. Many systems require the user to learn how to perform complex and tricky calibrations.
Our 3D printer will change that. With the Alivemaker LANDR 3D printer you simply put your object file into the 3D printer, press a button and print. 
 

 
 
Alivemaker Hovercraft - 3D printing server
We believe the 3D Printing Server is the leap-forward in development for 3D printers in 2013.
A 3D printer is not the same as a 2D Printer, even if we try to make it work faster, it still need a lot of time to print the parts, sometimes an hour or more.
So, if you need to print a large object, then may be you can not power off your computer during the whole night.
Now with the Alivemaker LANDR, you can connect the 3D printer to your local area network. You can control it than by each PC, Mac, Smart Phone or Tablet in your local network. (If you want to use the Alivemaker Hovercraft with WiFi, you need to install a USB Wifi adapter on it, because the raspberry pi board does not have a WiFi module).

 
The appearance of the Alivemaker Hovercraft 3D printing server may chang before we ship it. Because we just want to make the Hovercraft look like a real Hovercraft.
With the 3D printing server, you just need to upload the STL or G-code file onto the server, finish a few settings and it will work. Than you could turn off your PC or Mac, or use your Phone to make a call to your friends or use you tablet to watch some movies. You just need to keep the 3D printing server powered on during the time the LANDR is working.
 
The Ink (i.e. ABS/PLA plastic): 
The Alivemaker LANDr uses 3mm ABS or PLA plastic as its "ink". Every Alivemaker LANDr which is backed on Indiegogo will come with one bag of plastic, each bag will contain 500g of plastic. 

Highlight:
 
*Alivemaker LANDr is accessible to anyone.
*Printing server in the local area network.
*Precise and high detail printing.
*Grand printing area / 200mm x 200mm x 150mm
*Fresh look, professional
*Sturdy structure, high quality parts
*Low – cost & Easy-to-use
*Great advanced printer (accessible to all user if you just heard about 3D printing

 

 
For our dear backer, we also have custom special:
such as the Alivemaker Custom USB-Flash card
 

 
Beside, we also provide Alivemaker custom T- shirts for our backers. Every T-shirt will have " Alivemaker Pioneer" printed on it. This will be limited and we hope it will be an honor for the backers. "We are so Proud of you".
 

 
Red
Here's a tip we just forget to inform before
All of the perks were including shipping fees to worldwide, but not including the tax which it may occured.
 
 
Why Indiegogo?
We've been working on our hardware and software applications for over a year. We're very proud of the work we've done so far, but we need one more push to get it into production. Through Indiegogo you're ORDERING the Alivemaker LANDr . With your support, we will be able to bring the  Alivemaker LANDr 3D printer worldwide and carry on developing more useful, smart and affordable desktop 3D printers. While we're super close to entering production, your contribution will help fund:
 

Tooling and manufacturing setup.
Our first production run.
the development of some iOS and Android applications for 3D Printing Controll or 3D Scanning.
 

Besides, we still want to improve the Alivemaker LANDr:
So the final LANDr you get may be a little bit different from the LANDr you see here.
For example:1.We are working tightly together with lots of manufacturing partners and we may be able to change all the 3D printed parts into polyamides or ABS plastic injection, this would improve the reliability and durability. What you have seen in the video and photos is our prototype LANDr. We have melt down and reborn the LANDr for thousands times to perfect our design. (We believe it is one of the most useful aspects of 3D printers to test the design and rework it if needed).2.We may have to adjust the final appearance before the LANDr ships. But this will be just a little adjustment, not a big change. We would like to improve the quality of LANDr, and we also want to make it easy and fast to produce so our backers will get the Alivemaker LANDr fast.3.In the near future, we would like to make speciall IOS or Andriod Apps for Alivemaker, such as some software for 3D scanning, 3D Printing Controll, or Sharing. But this kind of software will not be finished in a short period. We will try to speed it up. ^_^4. We've staggered the rewards into several manageable batches so that we can meet our delivery targets on-time. However, Testing and Certification must be finished before the Alivemaker LANDr can be shipped. We've been careful to design and assemble the printer to make it more safe and reliable, but there is always a risk of delay while the product undergoes final testing and certification.
Last BUT not Least
For now, any news or update would be posted on these two website:

 www.indiegogo.com

www.alivemaker.com
If you like us, you could us the Indiegogo share tools to share our campaign on your facebook or twitter.
 And also, we are very happy to get you e-mail and woud reply you soon.
Thanks for watching
From Alivemaker

story:
Hi Indiegogos,

My name is Breck and I make public domain software.

Recently I got fed up with the way Americans are forced to do taxes, and decided to do something about it.

This is the CopyPasteTaxes project, and I am confident it can change the way Americans do taxes and make the system work better for everyone*.

But I'm not going to do this unless other people think it's a good idea and believe in it too.

So that's why I'm launching this IndieGogo. If you believe in this and want to make it happen, please support this project.

There will be no perks or gimmicks. Just a public domain application that you can use for your taxes, as soon as this year. Of course, you will have my gratititude and the gratitude of your fellows Americans, because if we do this thing this is gonna rock.

-Breck

* Well, almost everyone. This may make certain tax industry lobbysists who don't want things to get better worse off.

story:
Goal Journal

The Journal is very simple to use. It consists of the following tools:

Goal setting template:

This tool allows you to lay out all the steps to achieving your goals.

How to fill in the goal setting template:

Now that we have laid the route to our goal, we need to act day by day to achieve the goal. To this end, we create to-do lists for the day.

To-do lists for the day. Page tabs:

To move closer to your goal each day, it is very important to write down the to-do list for the day on stickers (76*76). This will considerably save you working space in the Journal. The sticker with a to-do list can be removed from the journal and carried along with you to remember to perform all the tasks scheduled. The to-do list for the day allows you to deal with specific tasks and eliminates the need to engage in all things at once. The to-do list for tomorrow involves planning for the day ahead. To easily find a page with a to-do list for today (tomorrow), you can paste the sticker in the form of an arrow pointing towards the center of the goal image as a target.

Stock-taking table:

The very simple table for taking stock of work done for the day is filled in based on the to-do list for the day. There are 2 columns to fill in. The table is designed for three months of stock taking. If more than three months are required to achieve your goals, you can use the correction tape.

Barrier-overcoming table:

If your movement towards the goal has slowed down or even stopped, you need to pay attention to the barriers preventing you from reaching your goal and their causes. It is important to find the right cause of the obstacles and eliminate its effect.

Solution-finding table:

Lack of accurate information and doubt may impede achievement of your goal. On the other hand, availability of accurate information and confidence in the decisions taken can accelerate achievement of your goal. The Goal Journal contains a table that enables you to find answers to questions and solutions with the help of well-planned actions.

To-do list:

This list can contain non-urgent tasks, which, for one reason or the other, you don’t want to put into the to-do list for today (tomorrow). The list can also accommodate tasks from the to-do list for today, whose execution may be postponed. We recommend that all interesting ideas on how to achieve a goal should be recorded here as soon as they emerge in your head so that you don’t forget them later.

Pages for notes:

The Journal contains pages for writing notes. Here you can write all the information relevant to the goal: phone numbers, addresses and other useful notes.

List of goals achieved:

There is a table at the end of the Journal. It is used to keep a list of goals achieved. The table is a kind of wall of fame, where your achievements are recorded. It’s always pleasant to open this list and look at your victories.


   Goaljournal@gmail.com

story:
Spring [spring] 

noun: an inspiring suggestion or challenge moderately to epicly outside the receiver's comfort zone

verb: to be released from a constrained position from the action of a spring

Why Spring Board?

Spring Board is the new social app for iPhone that flips the script on the bucket list. Forget death as a motivator, Spring Board is about living now!

Rooted in a philosophy that emphasizes experience over achievement, Spring Board is about engaging in things that resonate with you. No master plan; no resolutions; no things you want to do before you die.

Spring Board is about being vital - now.

How it works

Connect: When you launch Spring Board, you first invite close friends and family to be your “buds”. These are people that know you well, will push you out of your comfort zone, offer unique perspectives and ideas, and be excited to celebrate your big and small moments along the way.

Inspire: Your buds send you suggestions (“springs”) for specific things they’d love to see you do or experience. Their job is to expand your thinking. Your job is to be open. When a spring resonates with you (no matter how little or big!), you post it to your Spring Board. You can post your own springs as well, as you never know when inspiration will strike.

Engage: Visit your Spring Board often. Although you may not take action on a spring right away, the seed has been planted. You update your Spring Board when you “tap” any of your springs. Need a boost? Your buds are there to encourage and support you. When a spring has sprung, you celebrate!

Grow: As you receive springs, there can be a tendency towards resistance. Don’t worry about taking action on all of your springs right away; in time you will see that the springs, like seeds, start to work all on their own! As you move into the unknown, you will discover unexpected things about yourself that will amaze you. The point is that you’re perpetually, actively engaged in things that resonate with you. There is no goal, no end, no destination, but continuous renewal and a journey sure to unfold in unexpected ways.

And, just as important as it is to tend to your own Spring Board, posting springs on your buds’ boards is just as meaningful! Connecting with your buds and giving back renews the cycle.

Spring Board is not a bucket list.

With Spring Board:

There is no bucket. The bucket can symbolize death, and bring fear into the process. The goals on a bucket list also tend to put fulfillment in the future, not the present.

There is no goal. Setting goals can imply that success is only achieved by accomplishing the goal exactly as set forth. Goals are rigid, and don’t account for flexibility and wonderful tangents.

What Fuels You?

What gets you, excites you, nourishes you — what resonates with you? This is the core of Spring Board — making a habit of engaging in things that resonate with you.

The philosophy behind Spring Board is summed up in this: “The vitality of your life does not depend on how much you achieve, but in how often you engage in things that resonate with you.”  — My father-in-law, Ted Case (10,000 Year Thinking®)

Ready to try it out?  

Here's a 30-second exercise to get you started...

My Story

My name is Chris, and I'm the creative director behind Spring Board. A year-and-a-half ago, I was sitting around with some friends and family when one of us said she wanted to do something "big" in the year ahead. She had recently divorced, and was ready for some changes. She wanted to do something big for herself, but didn't quite know what to do or where to begin.

My father-in-law told her to get a pen and paper, and looked at the rest of us: "Let's brainstorm some ‘big things’ for her to do." We all jumped on board and started offering suggestions of things we thought would be fun, adventurous, challenging, transformative — and her only job was to stay open and write everything down. Within 20 minutes she had a surprising list of almost 50 things — from take a yoga class, to go on an international adventure, to buy an expensive pair of jeans, go on a date, take salsa lessons, and follow a new blog.

The creative juices flowing, it wasn't long before we all wanted a turn. We spent time brainstorming for each other, and finished inspired and motivated for the year ahead.

Over the next several months, something amazing happened — the lists we had created slowly began to seep into our lives, without effort. Not only was I inspired by what was happening for me, but watching my friends and family be transformed was just as exhilarating. My sister-in-law did start yoga... then she went on her first date, and then she went to China. My wife, Abby, quit her job, started her own business, made a new friend, and ran a 5K... As for me, I ran a half-marathon (having never run before in my life!), composed music for an iPad app, wrote a song for my 3-year old son, and started working on the big one — the creation of my first app. I began to realize that brainstorming a list with my closest friends and family planted a seed in my consciousness, and the items that resonated with me found their way into my life on their own accord. By writing them down, an awareness was cultivated that allowed me to jump on opportunities as they naturally arose. 

After that, without fail, everyone we told about this resonance brainstorm asked us to do one for them. Before long, we had people joining improv comedy classes, getting energy healings, drinking daily green smoothies, trying new sports, and — my personal favorite — at the suggestion of doing a "polar bear dip", my own mother jumped into the Atlantic Ocean at midnight on her 60th birthday — in the middle of December!

From this experience, I’ve learned that tapping into what resonates with me is the #1 way to bring an energetic passion to everything I do. And just as important, to determine what is not worth doing. Engaging in resonance provides a horizon to follow, and shines light on the beauty of the journey. It reveals adventure everywhere you look. 

As Ted says, "The dynamics of creative energy imply that when you change your world, you change everyone else's as well."

The Spring Board Team

Spring Board’s team is made up of husband and wife pair Chris and Abby Fitzgerald. He is a tech geek, Berklee trained film composer and the creative mind behind Spring Board. She is an MBA marketing guru with her own consulting business, a decade of admissions experience, and a passion for entrepreneurship.

The philosophy behind Spring Board stems from Ted Case's 10,000 YEAR Thinking® modality. A thought leader in creative conciousness, Ted has decades of experience working with entreprenuers and individuals in the dynamics of human potential and effective change. (Ted is the wise father-in-law from the story above.) Follow Ted on Twitter @10KYT.

I need your help

I fully believe that this app can make real and sustainable change in people's lives. I want people to get inspired, do inspiring things, inspire others, and basically have kick-ass stories to tell. All the time. To get this app off the ground will require an independent, grass-roots effort led by YOU. Get behind this app, and you'll already have one cool story to tell!

It's crucial that the app have top-notch design and development, with an organic user experience, and cutting-edge social network connectability. This can be done with $25,000. Indiegogo and processing fees, taxes and rewards will come to around $10,000, thus $35,000 total.

To be straight up with all of you potential backers,

I love this app idea, and want to see it succeed. I've realized (and this is sort of what Spring Board is all about) that while risks should be taken into account, focusing on them too much causes paralyzation on a project. I'm excited to see how far I can take Spring Board. It will be fun, and I would love it if you would join me to get this app made!

story:
The Nullbits Story

Nullbits was started by 3 engineers in Boulder, Colorado that have a passion for gaming and extremely high-quality computer accessories. We came up with the DB1 Pro because we couldn't find the hardware we were looking for. It simply didn't exist at the level we knew was possible.  So we decided to go and create it. 

  • The DB1 Pro has 4 fully customizable macro keys
  • Easy to program and use for any purpose
  • Built in audio enhancement & 16-bit USB DAC
  • Custom RGB

We wanted an easily programmable macro keyboard, that can be used by anyone. We did all the software, so you don't have to. And the DB1 Pro really is what we wanted to create for ourselves. 

Once you start using it, it's hard to go on without it.

Our Goal

Small batch hardware with custom designed parts is very expensive in low quantity.

  • Our minimum goal of $16,000 is based on having enough orders pre-filled that we can make our first large order on parts
  • This will cut the costs to us and make the DB1 Pro accessible to everyone 
  • Above the initial goal, the rest of the funding will go to additional order fulfillment and what is left over will go towards holding an inventory that we can sell on our site directly
  • We intend on creating more products in the future. This campaign makes that dream a reality for us

Assembled in the USA

Every DB1 Pro is hand-assembled, inspected, and tested in the USA. The aluminum case is made in Colorado. Other parts will be sourced from around the world with the highest quality being our top priority. If it isn't perfect, we don't put it inside a DB1.

Potential Roadblocks

Our main hurdle in getting Nullbits off the ground is simply getting enough pre-orders in so we can do a volume order from our parts suppliers. The extremely high cost of small batch orders just isn't feasible and scalable. 

This is our primary goal with this campaign. In addition, we really want to get our company off the ground so we can create more amazing, high-quality products in the future. Believe us, we have a lot planned!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't help out by preordering a DB1 Pro, please consider:

  • Sharing our campaign on your social media or with friends and family
  • Buying some stickers ($10) to support our company, and get some cool swag in the process!

Custom RGB

We wanted an easily programmable macro keyboard, that can be used by anyone. We did all the software, so you don't have to. And the DB1 Pro really is what we wanted to create for ourselves. 
Once you start using it, it's hard to go on without it.

Our Goal
Small batch hardware with custom designed parts is very expensive in low quantity.

Our minimum goal of $16,000 is based on having enough orders pre-filled that we can make our first large order on parts
This will cut the costs to us and make the DB1 Pro accessible to everyone 
Above the initial goal, the rest of the funding will go to additional order fulfillment and what is left over will go towards holding an inventory that we can sell on our site directly
We intend on creating more products in the future. This campaign makes that dream a reality for us


Assembled in the USA
Every DB1 Pro is hand-assembled, inspected, and tested in the USA. The aluminum case is made in Colorado. Other parts will be sourced from around the world with the highest quality being our top priority. If it isn't perfect, we don't put it inside a DB1.

Potential Roadblocks
Our main hurdle in getting Nullbits off the ground is simply getting enough pre-orders in so we can do a volume order from our parts suppliers. The extremely high cost of small batch orders just isn't feasible and scalable. 
This is our primary goal with this campaign. In addition, we really want to get our company off the ground so we can create more amazing, high-quality products in the future. Believe us, we have a lot planned!

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't help out by preordering a DB1 Pro, please consider:

Sharing our campaign on your social media or with friends and family
Buying some stickers ($10) to support our company, and get some cool swag in the process!

story:
Who am I ?

Hello,

my name is Christian, 22 years old and I'm an electricity student from Berlin. I had an idea few months ago while riding my bike.

I always like listen to music while I ride bike and there is nothing worse than an empty MP3 Player after just starting my tour. So I began trying to find a solution for my problem.

 

And then I've developped the de.light bicycle lamp.

 

How does my lamp work ?

The functionality of my de.light lamp is based on a regular bicycle lamp. Only that this one has an integrated USB-port which makes it very easy to recharge mobile devices such as smartphones or MP3-Player.

Once the 6V dynamo is enabled you just need to pedal and the device will get charged.

What's the goal ?

I hope that my idea will help a lot of people who never want to be dependent on a socket anymore just like me. 

For now the goal is collecting the needed amount of money to produce a batch. 

Another way to help?

If you can´t donate but still think that my project is pretty cool then share or post it in your social networks or tell your friends. That would be really great as well.

I'm grateful for any help and support :)

story:
Cook’et is the world‘s first interactive, internet connected device designed to assist you in the preparation of meals, pastries or beverages. It combines industrial sensing and personal computing technologies making cook’et a really smart cooking companion.

Design

Cook'et anatomy

What can cook'et do?

Currently cook’et is in the development stage, thus its functions and capabilities presented here are not definitive since there will be additions as the project unfolds.

There are four parts in the main menu of cook'et: smart scale, cooking companion, recipe book and advisor. You can choose one of them to proceed your meal preparation.

Smart scale

How many kitchen utensils do you have to measure volume or weight? How many times have you said: “ I can’t make this recipe because I don’t have the right scale for it?” or  “This French recipe looks so delicious, but how can I convert centiliters to ounces?”

Such difficulties will no longer exist with cook’et’s smart scale. Just select the ingredient and place it on the cook’et. It displays the weight and volume at the same time. Touch the screen and choose the measurement units if you need to convert anything. 


Cooking companion

Cook’et cooking companion is the most advanced function performed by this device. It’s the world’s first interactive cooking video tutorial.


You prepare your dish step by step, following cook’et’s  directions. The video explains exactly what you have to do and when you have to do it. It stops each time when you have to add an ingredient. It then tells you whether or not  you have added the appropriate amount.


Recipe book

What country’s cuisine will you sample tonight? What is your favorite Italian dish? Just cook it!

Access a wide choice of recipes proposed by cook’et. The powerful filters help you to find the dish you want. Cook’et translates recipes from around the world thus offering the user the possibility of tasting a wide variety of cuisines.  Please note that the recipe book database will constantly be expanding.


Cooking advisor

“What will I cook tonight?”  Probably this is a question that you have asked yourself many times.  Tell cook’et what ingredients you have and it will tell you what you can make.  Cook’et has a ready answer based on what ingredients you have at hand. There are guest coming for dinner?  Cook’et can suggest some dishes suitable for the occasion according to the criteria you choose. 


How does cook'et work?

The project consists of two parts: development of the customer device and creation of the data center, both of which will be connected via internet. The cook’et database stores recipes, videos and food data. Access to the database is possible only via the cook’et device. The manipulation of data is made through applications installed in cook’et.


Our aim is to continuously enrich the database with new recipes, consult with top chefs and restaurants, create new functions, and make the device smarter so it will better meet the client’s needs. We hope that cook’et will become  a useful and modern kitchen tool.

Perks

We would like your help in continuing to develop cook’et and to begin production.  We are open to all suggestions regarding new functions or changes in design. The estimated project development schedule is attached. You’ll be the first to receive your cook’et!

story:
Our plan is to develop into a democratic, worker-managed company that rides bicycles to provide convenience and luxury to the community at large.

This organization will erase countless miles driven by cars and adds hours to the span of time for relaxation that Houstonians will get to experience.  Thusly, the development of such a posh level of service is invaluable.  The efficient transport of consumables by bicycle is the most effective way to add sustainability to our surroundings.

By June 1, we would like to furnish to the public a mobile app and improve the infrastructure of Clutch Delivery.

Funds raised will provide the following:

Graphic Design of flyers, shirts and jerseys

Printing of promo material to distribute to make it all worth it

Mobile app development and hosting fees

A batch of reward shirts for Clutch supporters

A batch of cycling jerseys to get riders through summer months

A 100L waterproof, lockable trailer and Clutch paint job

 

Risks and challenges

Our challenge is the efficient use of our valuable off time.  To us, each of those minutes equates to 12 minutes saved futuristically.  We have already begun the process of digitizing the lists of items for 150 spots around Neartown Houston and would like to see the support of our community with this effort. Please follow our progress and join us in bringing to Houston the future of shopping and eating.

Any questions that you may have may be directed to our e-mail address:ClutchDelivery713@gmail.com

story:
Smart pen holder 

A combination between practicality and fine craftsmanship, this elegant writing set will bring a touch of style to any environment. 

Finesse is designed to interact with the user in an intuitive way. Move the pen towards the structure and the magnetic field pulls the pen into its final position, self-aligned and perfectly straight. 


We placed great emphasis on the quality and surface finish. The structure contains no plastic or rubber, instead all components are crafted from high quality metals to endure the test of time. Aiming for a minimalist design, we created a pen holder with four simple parts: structure, base, main magnet and guide magnet.


Nickel vs chrome

Both of them look good and very similar. So which one?

Chrome plating is overly expensive and would only add costs to the final product. We found that Nickel is a more suitable option and with its slight golden tint, gives an elegant warm look to the pen holder. Furthermore, after the entire structure goes through the professional polishing process, the result is a surface quality with a smooth mirrored effect, nearly identical to chrome plating.  





Design and magnetism

A key element of Finesse is the magnetic flow. Because the magnetism cannot be seen with the naked eye, we had to try several techniques in order to visualize the magnetism around the structure. Our research led us to the use of ferrofluid - an oiled based liquid featuring nanoscale ferromagnetic particles that react in the presence of a strong magnetic field, such a rare-earth magnets.

This allowed us to better understand the magnetic behavior. After making some modifications to the shape and magnetism of the structure, we found a design that forces the pen to vertically self-align from any point of origin.



Funds

All of the funds raised will go towards the first production round. 

The slim, high-strenghth design of the pen holders structure is complex and cannot be manufactured through conventional milling techniques. 

Therefore a die-cast mold must be produced, where liquid steel can be injected. Because of the high cost of the mold, we must meet a minimum order quantity. The rest of the funds raised will go towards post-processing, polishing, electro-plating, laser engraving and shipping.


Rewards

All perks include free shipping to US, Canada and Europe. The gift sets come in a wooden box and worldwide shipping is included.


65 $ - Business set  


68 $ - Premium set   


75 $ - Silver set 


80 $ - Silver gift                                          (limited to 100) 


85 $ - Gold set


90 $ - Gold gift                                            (limited to 100)


250 $ - Collector edition                           (limited to 300)


Time frame

The funding campaign ends on June 22nd. If successful, we will start the manufacturing process the next day. We estimate that the first batch will be ready for shipping by mid-August.

The shipping process has the following priority:

  • owners of the "Early bird-Premium set", "Silver gift" and "Gold gift" will have first shipping priority
  • contributors order (the fair way):  first come first serve.


Team overview

We are a group of young engineers and architects based in Northern Denmark, with previous experience working on projects for Audi and Maserati interior design. We primarly work with the design and manufacturing of mechanical systems or free-form structures.

Last but not least, we are passionate about innovative projects which bring science, simplicity and beauty to everyday needs.

story:
Background

"Engine Guard" is a project whose object is the design and production of a Noninvasive Automatic Electronic System for: Cars, Trucks, and many other types of Vehicles, like agricultural tractors, etc. 

Its function is to continuously monitor and protect internal combustion engines which are cooled by a fluid coolant.

1. Engine Guard will save vehicle owners a lot of money. The owners of cars, vans, trucks, etc. can save between 75% - 85% by avoiding catastrophic failures due to excessively high engine temperatures or engine coolant leaks!

2. Engine Guard will drastically reduce atmospheric pollution from car engines!

3. Pay less for driving licenses and driving taxes by demonstrating to the authorities that your vehicle did not enter busy road areas during the rush-hour time periods!

4. Engine Guard includes a GPS and GSM 2-way communications electronic system and connection to the Internet, opening the possibility of social net and many other net possibilities.

5. The Engine Guard system is very easy to install, and can easily be installed by the vehicle's owner themselves! It takes much less than 1 hour of work to install!

The "Engine Guard" system continuously monitors the engine's temperature, as well as the level of cooling fluid ("the coolant") in the cooling system and warns of problems by giving the driver an audio-visual warning and via the internet and text message, before the problem occur. The system is intended for all engines that are cooled by a cooling fluid ("the coolant").

The EG's green function - will give a warning for unsuitably low engine temperature! The green function will enable vehicle owners to increase the efficiency of their vehicle (low temperature in the engine means high soot buildup in the injectors), in order to extend the lifespan of the engine, and contribute to a greener environment. The Green Function is mostly important in cold countries like Europe, USA, Canada, Russia, Japan, etc.

Research and studies made by EPA (Environmental Protection Agency) in the US show that car trips of 8 km have a higher rate of pollution when starting from a “cold start”, e.g., NOx – 30% more, CO - 60% more and VOC – 45% more!

If a failure in the cooling system of the car does not let the car come to the optimal working temperature, the catalytic converter will not work correctly and will NOT filter the toxic and harmful gases which, in this case, will constantly go into the atmosphere.

A suitable Internet Social Network using a GPS (Global Positioning System) and Cellular Net will Monitor the vehicle's position and potentially help the driver get money refunds from the authorities if they do not enter certain metropolitan zones during rush hours! Of course, for reasons of privacy, a driver may disable the GPS tracking function and use it manually as needed!

The Engine Guard product is suitable for cars, trucks, earthwork vehicles, all-terrain vehicles (ATVs), agricultural tractors and machinery, and industrial electrical generators greater than 20 KW.

The market

This is a first to market, very unique offering! There is currently no Noninvasive product similar to Engine Guard anywhere in the world!

Main characteristics:

* Automatic operation – the product comes into operation immediately upon starting the vehicle. It then carries out a self-test to make certain the sensors are functioning properly – the temperature sensor and the level of cooling fluid sensor.

* Warning of a fault in the system – warns when a fault has been located during the self-test stage, or during driving time and it’s shown by specific icons with different colors on a color touch screen as well as by an audible alarm in each case. Furthermore, the color screen has also two alphanumeric rows were the fault is indicated to the driver in the Language chosen during the installation of the product.

* Constant monitoring – the temperature and level of cooling fluid in the engine's cooling system are monitored during the whole time of the engine's operation.

In addition, every time the engine starts, The Green Function will examine whether the engine reaches optimal working temperature condition in within 15 - 30 minutes. The Green Function will constantly examine whether the engine temperature is lower than the recommended working temperature. Should the engine work at a colder temperature than that recommended, then the engine consumes more fuel than usual, its wear, soot and tear is greater and the air pollution coming from the engine is much higher.

* Warnings of engine faults using GSM (two way communications) infrastructure and Global Positioning System (GPS) – at any stage during the operation of the engine, should one and/or two of the parameters monitored be found to be deviating from the safe working range, the system will activate an audio-visual and alphanumeric warning to the driver and to predetermined telephone numbers and will report on the type of fault and location of the vehicle through the GSM/ GPS system!

* Keeping a log – the system keeps the time and date as well as the type of fault of the warnings and records it in the system's memory.

* The system will be designed for giving high reliability (min. 10 years MTBF) to avoid giving false warnings.

* Automatic discontinuation – the operation of the "Engine Guard" system is discontinued upon switching-off the engine.

* Easy installation – the electronics control and display unit communicates in 2-way com with the sensor unit via the +/- power cables of the vehicle. The units are installed by securing them mechanically in their place and then connecting them to the +/- power cables, that’s all that it’s needed!

The Company and its owner

The owner and promoter of the Venture, Dr. Gordon, has a bachelor's degree and a Ph.D. in physics from the Technion – Israel Institute of Technology in Haifa, and a Master's degree in electrical and electronic engineering from the Tel Aviv University. He has more than 30 years of experience in research and industry, both in universities in Israel and abroad, including the University of Southern Denmark, in the city of Odense, and Tokyo University, Japan.

In the field of industry, Dr. Jaime Gordon is an expert in managing projects in the development of electronic systems for the aviation market and for the commercial market and quality assurance in the Engineering Department of Elbit Computers Haifa, in the Israel Aircraft Industries and additional clients.

Dr. Gordon is the owner of El-Sol Technologies Ltd., whose main operation in the field of micro analysis, Electron Microscopy and materials testing.

In addition, Dr. Gordon is a lecturer at the College of Engineering in Jerusalem, and teaches a course on the subject of "Vacuum Technology, Gas Flow and Plasma" for engineering students in the Advance Materials Department.

The Engine Guard project will help vehicle owners to save the money they have invested in their cars, trucks and to avoid expensive engine repairs. The Green Function will improve the lowering of atmospheric pollution due to engine exhausts. Also, the internet automatic communications will improve to save human life when accidents occur. 

Dear contributor and funder, your contribution will help to finish the design and the start of manufacturing of the Engine Guard product, start sales and introduce the product into the worldwide markets.

We need 200,000.- USD to make the first series of units of this product and pay the engineers, technicians and art designers, etc.


Please contact me if you have any questions I will be glad to answer.

I am grateful and thank you in advance for your kind support.

I will keep you informed on the advancement of the Engine Guard Project.

Kind regards, Jaime Gordon /Ph.D. Physics

Electron Microscopy and materials testing.
In addition, Dr. Gordon is a
lecturer at the College of Engineering in Jerusalem, and teaches a course on
the subject of "Vacuum Technology, Gas Flow and Plasma" for
engineering students in the Advance Materials Department.
The
Engine Guard project will help vehicle owners to save the money they have
invested in their cars, trucks and to avoid expensive engine repairs. The Green
Function will improve the lowering of atmospheric pollution due to engine
exhausts. Also, the internet automatic communications will improve to save
human life when accidents occur. 
Dear contributor and funder, your
contribution will help to finish the design and the start of manufacturing of
the Engine Guard product, start sales and introduce the product into the
worldwide markets.
We need 200,000.- USD to make the
first series of units of this product and pay the engineers, technicians and
art designers, etc.

Please contact me if you have any
questions I will be glad to answer.
I am grateful and thank you in
advance for your kind support.
I will keep you informed on the
advancement of the Engine Guard Project.
Kind regards, Jaime Gordon /Ph.D.
Physics

story:
In order to start production, we are asking for contributors to place their orders. This will enable us to initiate our ﬁrst batch of stock production right away and we will be able to bring Soul Power to you sooner and fulfill orders from April 2020.

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in April 2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.
*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.
- backers will be responsible of all shipping and import related costs

 

            

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.
