story:
Exit Strategy Planner: A powerful daily planner to help you plan your escape from unfulfillment to pursue the career or business of your dreams.

HOW IT ALL STARTED

 

 

The idea to create the Exit Strategy Planner came shortly after I decided to make an exit plan to leave the practice of law for good.

 

By way of background, all my life, I thought my dream was to become a lawyer but after my first semester of law school, I realized that becoming a lawyer wasn't my dream after all. I found practicing law unfulfilling and not a good fit for me. However, due to my fears of the unknown, fears of being perceived as a "failure," and fears of not being able to pay off my student loans, I completed law school and began practicing law in New York City and New Jersey.

 

Unfortunately, I felt "trapped" in my career and began experiencing depression and anxiety. I realized I needed to make an exit plan and get out. I also learned a huge lesson: it's OKAY to start over.

 

After I decided that I would leave law for good, it didn’t take very long before I knew exactly what I wanted to do next. I wanted to create a tool that could help others, like me, escape unfulfillment to pursue their career or business dreams.

 

So I started doing research to understand how someone discovers work that adds meaning and fulfillment to their life. I also spent time studying how successful people increase their productivity and maximize their day to be more intentional with their time.

 

After reading tons of books and listening to Ted-Talks from world-leading experts on these subjects, I learned that finding the right path requires deep self-evaluation, research, and gaining experience doing the thing you are interested in, so your next career or business pursuits are based on actual knowledge and experience, and not based on assumptions, biases, and expectations.

 

The goal of the Exit Strategy Planner has always been simple: to create a tool that gives you clarity, confidence, and accountability as you take massive action toward your goals and dreams.

 

SHARE THIS PROJECT & GET A FREE PDF!

Here's how this works: I want to spread the word about the Exit Strategy Planner with as many people as I can so I can help more people escape unfulfillment.  In order to get your free PDF, click the icons in the top right hand corner of this web page (see picture below)  or at the bottom RIGHT of the pink button if on your mobile phone and share this campaign with others. Tag my page @mapplanners or take a screenshot of your shared post. Then shoot me an email  (hi@mapco.site) with your screen shot attached (if you haven't tagged the page) letting me know that you did. I will then send you the PDF! (Please allow 24-48 hours due to anticipated influx of emails).

 

Thank you. I really appreciate your support! 

 

TAKE A LOOK INSIDE YOUR PLANNER: 

All the good stuff

 

IT ALSO INCLUDES:

  • "Discovery" section where you'll discover what excites you and brings you the most fulfillment
  • "Explore" section where you'll uncover career and business opportunities that will feed your daily hunger for fulfillment.
  • Dream Fund tracker so you can save for your grand exit
  • "Plan" section where you'll turn your big dream into manageable action steps 
  • "Massive Action Section" where you will be fed daily encouragement, reminders, must-needed weekly reflection, and much much more as you take massive action over the next 90 days to make your dreams a reality! 
  • 2020-2021 Calendar
  • Monthly Overview
  • 30 pages of free space in the back to save all your great ideas and insights
  • A back pocket to store notes and miscellaneous
  • Weekly Reflection questions to reflect and analyze the

 

 

REWARDS:

 

QUALITY

Have no fear. Your Exit Strategy Planner will be of the highest quality. With a soft cover touch, ivory white paper at a paper weight of 120gsm, you'll never have to worry about your pen's ink bleeding through the paper or your planner getting bent out of shape.

 

DELIVERY 

While the planners are expected to arrive December 2020, my goal is to get the planners into your hands as soon as possible. That means it could come as early as November 2020 but should not arrive no later than December 2020.  I will regularly send updates about the status of your planner so you are fully informed about when you can expect to receive your planner. 

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Manufacturing a high-quality planner like this is a big undertaking that involves a lot of scheduling, prep time and extremely high attention to detail. I'll be working with a few manufacturers for the different parts of the planner to ensure all parts are arranged properly, from getting the planners bound with the perfect stitching to the "Mark it" card materials to the packaging materials. 

 

My challenge includes ensuring each and every Exit Strategy Planner is finished to the quality of workmanship I am promising to backers and delivered to your door in the time we specified. Once the planners are manufactured and we have them delivered to the fulfillment center, I will ship them to my backers across the world.

 

THANK YOU!

Thank you for backing this campaign!

Sincerely, 

Jessica Reid, Creator of Exit Strategy Planner

story:
"It's going to be produced; we help to produce it with less environmental impact, safer & for up to 50% less energy consumption"

For decades Ammonia has been used for rapid cooling in brewing, soft drink, food-processing, dairy and plastics industries. There are many problems associated with Ammonia based cooling systems. Issues such as fire and gas leak inhalation risk to employees, plant and the surrounding area. Also, traditional ammonia cooling systems are not scalable resulting in inefficient electrical load usage. 

Galery Industrial North America has a game changer for the traditional cooling industries with AMMONIA FREE COOLING SOLUTIONS. With this new technology, GREEN COOLING SYSTEM (GCS), customers realize substantial on-going savings due dramatic decrease in electric usage (up to 50% savings annually). 

Additionally, customers will benefit from HEAT RECOVERY technology for incremental savings. Due to the elimination of ammonia, it is vastly safer for the environment and the community.

As a part of Galery Industrial N.A.'s effort to minimize our carbon footprint, we have elected to recognize our backers electronically vs. printed and mailed. We believe everything we can do to avoid waste is best for the environment. This is the driving force behind our mission to deliver safer, less expensive industrial cooling options with our Green Cooling System.

Please visit our website www.galeryna.com

Galery Industrial N.A.'s Focus & Direction

Galery Industrial N.A. is a company that is bringing a revolutionary new cooling technology to the brewing, soft drink, food-processing, dairy and plastics industries. Our Green Cooling System (GCS) avoids the pitfalls of the commonly used ammonia. An example with ammonia, it can be overkill for what many customers actually require, it is expensive to run, install and maintain. Galery’s GREEN COOLING SYSTEM is a more efficient and economical system for the customer. Galery Industrial offers a streamlined COMPLETE SYSTEM which meets all needed efficiency.

With this new proven technology companies will be able to afford other capital improvements and be able to expand their workforce all of which will lead to better efficiency and ultimately deliver their products to the market with less environmental harm and a larger safer workforce. These industries are bringing their products everyday all across North America. With the technology that Galery Industry N.A. is introducing, the industries can continue to do so while improving the environment, their work forces and bottom lines.

Now that the system has been engineered and technology is proven; funding raised here will be utilized to increase brand awareness via trade-shows and marketing efforts as well as continued legal expertise, labor and communications.

Energy Savings and Safety

Energy Savings- One of the primary benefits of Galery’s GREEN COOLING SYSTEM (GCS) is the dramatic energy savings. The system is designed specifically to the customers specifications, meeting every requirement. The GREEN COOLING SYSTEM results in improved KW per TN, netting increased bottom lines on the balance sheet. Galery Industrial N.A. can also utilize heat generated within the facility and use that heat to lower energy usage creating further savings. With Galery’s GCS, customers will improve their plants efficiency while saving money every month.

Recent Ammonia News Incidents: http://www.galeryna.com/links.html

Safety- Ammonia is the most commonly used agent to cool in a variety of industries and has been for a long time. Galery Industrial N.A. is bringing to these customers a cutting edge complete system that is AMMONIA FREE. Since the system is AMMONIA FREE it avoids some of the dangers ammonia has: 

* Ammonia leaks – causing danger to employees, plant & products 

* Fire or explosion 

* Contamination within product 

These types of expensive and time consuming problems will not be an issue with Galery Industrial N.A.’s Green Cooling System.

ROI and Turn-Key

Return On Investment- Everyone who manages a business today is looking for a competitive advantage and improved bottom lines. Galery Industrial N.A.’s complete cooling system can do both for you. Our Green Cooling System uses it’s surroundings to maximize savings leading to high efficiency and most ROI’s are within the 18 – 24 month range. We use the heat from the plant and in the colder climates the outdoor air temperatures to reduce costs. The design of each customers system improves how well the plant operates and avoids costly downtime, keeping production lines running at their peak while generating income & profits.


Turn-Key System- A primary advantage of working with Galery Industrial N.A. is that we provide a turnkey project that includes: 

* Complete design & engineering per your specifications 

* Complete install 

* 24/7 maintenance support 

* Will sell off the old ammonia equipment with those dollars going to the customer to offset new system investment.  

In addition to these points our Green Cooling System is state of the art and will keep the facility running at its best. The Control Panel allows control of the system from the centrally located Touch Screen, computer, tablet or smartphone.

Please visit our website www.galeryna.com

Galery Industrial N.A. 

Management Team

George Gaspar - Principal - 22 years experience working on business development in the service, manufacturing and O&G industries through out the Midwest, Florida & Colorado to mention a few. Familiar with project management, supply chain management as well as environmental sustainability.

Terry Casey - Principal - 29 years experience within the beverage industry working in the beer, non-alcoholic beverage, water and support/supply products categories. Has National & International contacts & relationships. Years of experience growing companies into stable and successful entities.

___________________________________________________________________________
Thank you for taking the time to learn more about what we’re doing to improve the commercial refrigeration business by removing the ammonia from cooling systems while making for a safer work place. If you were kind enough to “back” us we very much appreciate that. J If this wasn’t exactly your cup of tea maybe you know someone in one of the industries we work in, or know someone that may have an interest in our Green Cooling System please let them know and have them look us up. The power of word of mouth will help us reach our goal so we can make a difference while saving energy and improving working conditions along the way. Thanks again – Terry & George

story:
Beeblo is a precision machined desk toy that creates a hypnotic wobbling effect. Move it and witness the harmonious dance of gravity and beauty. Beeblo helps us to slow things down, be more mindful, present and overall more aware in our daily life.

   Its unique shape invites you to transform it from standing art piece into mesmerizing kinetic toy.

   Beeblo is perfect tool for creators, makers, thinkers, and anyone who wants to release their inner creativity and imagination.  Keep focus, relieve stress or simply relax during working hours or brainstorming sessions.  

DESIGN

  • FUNCTION

The bead serves to move the gravity point up and down thus you can control the speed of wobbling motion. The higher the bead is located, the slower and less stable Beeblo moves, like wheat spikes on the wind.

  • AESTHETICS

   Perfect combination of organic shapes, natural materials, and physics. Multiple Beeblo standed at different angles looks like an eye-catching abstract sculpture on the desk. 

  • INSPIRATION

   Imagination and planning about the future has brought humanity to its current level. These intellectual processes require a clear mind. Before we moved away from nature, we were more peaceful in our mind and less stressful. In today's city life sometimes we might need some techniques to reach this peace like doing meditation, yoga, listening music or taking a nap. 

   Our goal was  to design a product we can use anytime on our desk that achieves similar relaxing effect like we are watching natures relaxing motions which we are already familiar with.

   Inspired by nature's relaxing dynamics to make it act like nature does. Floating clouds, falling leaves, movements of wheat spikes, flickering flames. Watching all of these unique motions makes you relax.

   Dieter Rams known as living legend of design.  May god give him a long life.

PERFECT GIFT

   Beeblo is a  great and original gift that creates a "wow" effect every time you interact with it.  We designed Beeblo with attention to the smallest detail and used durable materials to make it last a lifetime. 

MATERIALS

    Beeblo available  in five different colors which is natural appearances of choosen woods. Every type of wood we used making of Beeblo has it's own characteristic pattern and color. There is no any paint has been applied, but natural bee wax on surface for protecting wood from any moisture and revealing true color and pattern of woods.

   Geniune leather layer with embossed BEEBLO logo used on the base prevents the surface from scretching.

   The base part allows the Beeblo stands at the desired position on the desk.

RELEASE STRESS & REVEAL CREATIVITY

   Combination of the bead's location and the various forces applied on it offer the possibility of movement in infinite variations. This makes Beeblo a solid desk toy that you would want to use again and again. 

MAKING OF BEEBLO

   After months of researching process we have achieved the best size, and chosen the premium quality materials to make BEEBLO ergonomic, eye-catching and last a lifetime.

 

ABOUT US

   Apparatus Product Design Studio is an award-winning product design and innovation consultancy passionate about creating extraordinary experiences between people and products. 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

   Beeblo is our latest project and we have been passed the hardest part. The product is ready to produce and waiting for it's new owners.

story:
What Happens When the Initial Goal (€15 K) is Met:

Within 7 days of the end of the campaign we will:

  • upload the source code to a public repository on Github. The Github public repository will remain public indefinitely.
  • follow OCA Conventions for software development to the best of our ability.
  • release our portion of the source code under the AGPLv3 license for Odoo 8.0
  • 3rd party source code (example: Bootstrap, Angular JS) use open source licenses such as the Apache, MIT, and Mozilla licenses.

What Will I Be Able to Do With the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App?

The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is very powerful software for Odoo 8 allowing users to take full advantage of all Odoo 8 features and functionality in a fully responsive mobile and web user interface! 

Any app or module written and working with the Odoo 8 web client user interface (also know as the "backend") will automatically be displayed and usable in an attractive, fully responsive, mobile, and web user interface.

On any device (desktop, laptop, tablet, and smartphone), you will be able to easily create, edit, duplicate, or delete any information your Odoo user account has access to. All features available in the traditional web client user interface, will be available with the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App.

Using mobile devices with Odoo 8 will enable everyone using Odoo 8 to be more productive. Imagine just a few of the possibilities:

  • Mobile executives and management can view company wide information and make important business decisions while traveling.
  • Mobile sales personnel can add/update customer information, send a quotation or invoice, or view product information anywhere the potential customer is at.
  • Mobile warehouse user can receive, move, or deliver products as it happens. They do not have to take notes and update a tradition computer workstation at a different location in the building.
  • Mobile manufacturing area users can update status of the manufacturing order and record manufacturing information during the process without having to use a tradition computer workstation.
  • Mobile healthcare professionals can capture patient information at the point of care when the information is readily available. 
  • Mobile accountants can fully analyze financial information and provide recommendations to executives and management anywhere.
  • Basically, if you have a mobile device and a network connection to your Odoo 8 database, the sky is the limit!

Installation is Easy. 

1 click install. Just like any other Odoo app, and your Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is ready for all users. 

Separate From the Odoo "website" Modules

The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is separate from and does not depend on the Odoo "website" app or modules . Installation WILL NOT make any changes to any Odoo 8 "website" app or module. The look and feel of the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is separate from Odoo "website" apps and modules. Themes and changes to the look and feel of the Odoo "website" apps and modules, WILL NOT make changes to the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App.
The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App only changes the look and feel of the web client or "backend" user interface.

Odoo Partners, Odoo Implementation Companies, and Software Engineers:

You will be able to easily write new and update your current Odoo apps to better take advantage of the mobile productivity of your customers. The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App will be a core component to extending the life and adding untold functionality to your current and future Odoo 8 implementations. Just imagine all of the possibilities a true mobile interface enables for your software and your customers!

Screenshots:

Customer Form Edit Mobile (Vertical):


Opportunity Graph Mobile (Vertical):

Sales Orders List Tablet (Horizontal)

Project Task Edit Desktop



Stretch Goal Detailed Descriptions:

€22 K

We will make every effort to get the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App accepted into the the Odoo Community Association as a new project. We will form a OCA Project Team. All developers of this project will join the Odoo Community Association for 2016 ( €50 each)

€27 K

We will add  Right - to - Left (RTL) features for RTL languages and allow the end users to select RTL or LTR for their individual user interface. ITpedia Solutions will purchase an OCA Bronze Sponsor (€ 1000).

€35 K

We will add features to enable end users to change the colors of the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App user interface. We will add 5 color combinations as a choice for end users to select. ITpedia Solutions will purchase an OCA Silver Sponsor (€ 2000).

€50 K

We will create an Android mobile app compatible with the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App. The Android mobile app will be released under the GPLv3 license.

€60 K

We will create an iOS mobile app compatible with the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App. The iOS mobile app will be released under the GPLv3 license.

€70 K

We will create an Windows Phone app compatible with the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App. The Windows Phone mobile app will be released under the GPLv3 license.

€100 K

We will upgrade the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App to be compatible with Odoo 9 Community Edition.  The upgraded Odoo 9 CE Mobile Responsive App will be released under the AGPLv3 license.  ITpedia Solutions will purchase an OCA Gold Sponsor (€ 5000).

Frequently Asked Questions

Why Focus on Odoo 8?

We targeted Odoo 8 first because we know there is a large base of installed users of Odoo 8.0 globally.  The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App will immediately improve all installations of Odoo 8 and positively impact the greatest number of companies, organizations, and end users who are currently using Odoo.


Why Are You Making The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App Available for Free Online?

The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is designed for and depends on other apps and modules in Odoo 8. We are required to release the source code under the AGPLv3 license.

In the global Odoo Community, there are some viewpoints that are very critical of the recent license and business plan changes of Odoo SA. Some have made the decision to avoid Odoo 9 and to stay with Odoo 8 in order to fully benefit from the AGPLv3 license of Odoo 8. The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App will bring a fresh update for these Odoo 8 users, enabling them to continue to use AGPLv3 software in a mobile environment without any license issues.

There are some regions of the world and nations where companies and organizations do not have the financial resources to be able upgrade to Odoo 9. Releasing the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App in a free to download, public, Github repository opens this revolutionary user interface to everyone and not just a select few who can afford it. The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App will allow these users to continue using Odoo 8 and all of the power the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App until Odoo 9 becomes an option. We encourage everyone to donate. Even if it is a small amount, every little bit helps!

How Is The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App Different Than Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition?

The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is similar to Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition because both offer a mobile responsive user interface for the Odoo user. 
However, the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is NOT a replacement for Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition. In addition to a mobile responsive user interface, Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition has many high quality features that are not available in Odoo 8.. 
If you are interested in Odoo 9 Enterprise Edition, please contact ITpedia Solutions, LLC at info@itpediasolutions.com. ITpedia Solutions, LLC is an official Odoo partner and can offer Odoo 9 Enterprise Edition for significant savings over Odoo 9 Online. 
 

We ask that everyone donate as much as possible to support the nearly 500 hours of work we have devoted to the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App. Thank you very much for your support! We sincerely hope The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App benefits the greatest number of people!

There are some regions of the world and nations where companies and organizations do not have the financial resources to be able upgrade to Odoo 9. Releasing the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App in a free to download, public, Github repository opens this revolutionary user interface to everyone and not just a select few who can afford it. The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App will allow these users to continue using Odoo 8 and all of the power the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App until Odoo 9 becomes an option. We encourage everyone to donate. Even if it is a small amount, every little bit helps!

How Is The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App Different Than Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition?
The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is similar to Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition because both offer a mobile responsive user interface for the Odoo user. 
However, the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App is NOT a replacement for Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition. In addition to a mobile responsive user interface, Odoo 9 Online or Enterprise Edition has many high quality features that are not available in Odoo 8.. 
If you are interested in Odoo 9 Enterprise Edition, please contact ITpedia Solutions, LLC at info@itpediasolutions.com. ITpedia Solutions, LLC is an official Odoo partner and can offer Odoo 9 Enterprise Edition for significant savings over Odoo 9 Online.  We ask that everyone donate as much as possible to support the nearly 500 hours of work we have devoted to the Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App. Thank you very much for your support! We sincerely hope The Odoo 8 Mobile Responsive App benefits the greatest number of people!

story:
We've moved to Kickstarter! 

You can visit our campaign  HERE:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/desklabmonitor/desklab-ultralight-portable-4k-touchscreen-monitor/

 

As many of our backers have seen, we had a LOT of issues with Indiegogo's payment gateway. Unfortunately this meant that we had HUNDREDS of visitors that tried to back our campaign get an error again and again. Unfortunately Indiegogo was not able to provide a suitable solution. We had spent a considerable amount of marketing for this launch and were disappointed to let our pre-order customers down. 

 

We've refunded all customers their pledges (bringing us down from $20k+ in pledges in the first few days to $0) and will be sending early backers instructions on how to get a loyalty discount on our Kickstarter campaign!

 

Fortunately, we were quickly approved by Kickstarter and have launched there, where we are fully funded and guaranteed to ship as well!

 

 

 

 

If you have any questions - please message us at team@desklabmonitor.com!

Unfortunately this meant that we had HUNDREDS of visitors that tried to back our campaign get an error again and again. Unfortunately Indiegogo was not able to provide a suitable solution. We had spent a considerable amount of marketing for this launch and were disappointed to let our pre-order customers down.  We've refunded all customers their pledges (bringing us down from $20k+ in pledges in the first few days to $0) and will be sending early backers instructions on how to get a loyalty discount on our Kickstarter campaign! Fortunately, we were quickly approved by Kickstarter and have launched there, where we are fully funded and guaranteed to ship as well!    If you have any questions - please message us at team@desklabmonitor.com!

story:
Let’s flash back to 2015.

David Demery was hobbled by a work-related injury but he still wanted to go out and play catch with his son. The thing was, 16-year-old Darien had a strong arm. Perhaps a little too strong. Eventually, Pops had to put down his glove and cut short the practice session. With his limited mobility and sore wrist, Demery thought to himself, ‘I’m done catching all these baseballs. And I’m sure as heck not going to run around and pick them all up.’

Light bulb. So the idea for the Cutoff Man was born.

Demery brought his concept to John Stirton, who helped with the development and design of the Cutoff Man. With the input and endorsement of 12-year MLB veteran Bip Roberts, the Cutoff Man is ready to help you get the most out of the daily grind, whether it’s baseball or softball.

The Cutoff Man by TeamMate Sports LLC helps make your practices more efficient than ever before. The lightweight frame houses a durable net that can handle all the throws from your infielders, outfielders, catchers and pitchers, before funneling the ball to a bucket at the base. Want to move it to another spot on the field? Easy, just lift it up by the handles and wheel it wherever you want to keep working. Fill up the bucket? Swap it out with an empty one. Boom.

With the Cutoff Man, you spend less time on logistics and more time teaching. Jobs that used to take two or three coaches only need one, helping you maximize your practice time and optimize your staff.

Currently used by the Triple-A affiliates of the San Francisco Giants (Sacramento River Cats) and the New York Mets (Las Vegas 51s), the Cutoff Man is valuable tool at all levels. From Little League to high school to college, the Cutoff Man helps players get more reps in less time.

What We Need & What You Get

We have a come a long way since that fateful afternoon between father and son. But we still need your help to spread awareness and revolutionize the way we work on the diamond. By supporting the Cutoff Man, our Indiegogo contributors will help to realize these changes and be able to participate in this quest for improving players and the game.

We have a discount on our net, the big-ticket item. However, we have our own buckets (with logo), as well as baseballs and baseball cards.

story:
The Ultimate Thin Client

Here is the ultimate Lapdock, crowdfunding starts at $100.

The Lapdock is a stable $100 Lapdock that can survive years of heavy usage, while users can upgrade the CPU, Memory, Connectivity, and other features by simply upgrading their Smartphone (which many people do every year or two anyway), or to be powered by an internal or external USB Type-C Stick (which has a fully functional PCB with CPU, Memory, etc but everything from Data, to Power and to Display running through the USB Type-C Port) or powered by a Development Board that feature some latest processor, memory, connectivity, ports and etc.

With at least $100K in orders. we can ship the Lapdock worldwide. If we don't reach that minimum goal, all backers will be refunded and thus you don't pay anything so don't worry.

The Lapdock currently works with Samsung Galaxy S8, S8+, Note 8, S9, S9+, Note 9, any other Samsung device that has Samsung Dex support. It also works fine with Huawei Mate 10, Mate 10 Pro, P20, Mate 20, Mate 20 Pro, Mate 20 X and any other device with Huawei's PC Mode. It also works with Smartisan TNT based phones and BQ phones (that we will be trying to source BQ X2 Acquarius phones running OXI Desktop UI see http://getoxi.com).

While Samsung and Huawei provide some great PC Mode Smartphones and Tablets already, we feel that the market is in need of some much cheaper PC Mode enabled Smartphones, Sticks, Development Boards and other devices, so we also aim to bring and to those cheaper options with this crowdfunding campaign such as the options linked here below.

The AmLogic S905X2 powered Type-C Stick runs Android (hopefully with OXI Desktop User Interface Mode). Which can be used with the Lapdock internally or externally.

The Qualcomm Snapdragon 820 based USB Type-C Stick is also being promoted here for a powerful Type-C Stick that can use the open source Freedreno GPU driver for powerful and advanced Linux support. If Qualcomm and the supplier can provide Snapdragon 845/855 or even 8cx based USB Type-C Sticks, we will endeavor to also provide and to promote those on the market.

If any of these USB Type-C Stick projects don't get enough funding nor enough interest (probably that at least 1000 orders would be required to convince the supplier to design and to make them), or if we have any trouble in getting them made, don't worry any Type-C Stick orders will be fully refunded.

Starting at $110 we provide the Rock960 RK3399 Development Board with 4GB of RAM (in partnership with http://vamrs.com) which can run either Android with OXI Desktop User Interface for PC Mode, or it can also run among several distributions of Linux such as Debian or Ubuntu.

The Impact

We aim to revolutionize the PC and Laptop market. To change the way ARM Powered Smartphones, Sticks and Development Boards can be used for serious productivity throughout the world.

Stretch goals are following:

- The more orders there may be, the higher quality displays, keyboard, mouse pad and the higher quality batteries for longest possible battery length can we sourced.

- The more orders there may be, the higher complexity the main Lapdock PCB will have. Certain stretch goals in mind can be a switch and a Wi-Fi module on the PCB to enable Miracast wireless Lapdock mode, engineering to easily power any external development board, an HDMI input port directly on the side or on the back of the Lapdock mold (to not require that HDMI input to USB Type-C Display port adapter), more USB3 bandwidth host ports, a full size SD card slot with also high bandwidth supported, an intergrated Gigabit Ethernet port would also be great to include.

- The more orders there may be, we would endeavor to distribute the Lapdocks through European and US based warehousing logistics which would enable us to reduce the shipping price. In exchange some bonus accessories might be included for those who placed early orders with the higher shipping price. Consider the currently high shipping price takes into account DHL based shipping from China to the whole world, considering the Lapdock ships with a built-in Lithium-Ion battery which is harder and more expensive to ship by air.

- The more successful the Lapdock orders might be, would enable us to push for more and better USB Type-C Sticks to be available, and we would even also be able to push the industry to bring more and better Smartphones that have stronger and better PC Modes supported in them. Possibly we could be launching some approx $200 Smartphones running off MediaTek chipsets or Qualcomm chipsets with good performance but affordable PC Mode supported. To help push the whole industry to adopt PC Mode functionality over the USB Type-C port as the industry standard for every new smartphone from the most entry level to high end.

- In the future, once Lapdocks are very popular, I can imagine that one could be made with a Pixel Qi display, or with a CLEARink display or with even an E Ink display, to enable 50+ hour battery length on such a Lapdock, with sunlight readability, perhaps also that Lapdocks can come with a touchscreen display too (as with the Lapscreen project) for people who want to be using a Tablet like device also in productivity mode.

- If the Lapdock project becomes very popular, we will approach http://Shadow.tech to see if they would like to provide a free month's trial of their amazing cloud PC service for every new Lapdock user so users can be running apps and games on their Lapdock over the cloud that require very high performance. We expect Shadow to have excellent Android and Linux client apps supported with good stable keyboard and mouse inputs by the time the Lapdock starts shipping.

- If too few users request a specific color for the Lapdock for it to be justified to make it in that color, then backers of that color will be asked if they don't mind receiving the Lapdock in another more popular color.

Risks & Challenges

We cannot provide as high quality as big brands like Lenovo or HP. They make great laptop keyboards, but we aim to be good enough for most demanding users to be quite satisfied with the quality. We work hard to provide a decent display, keyboard and mouse pad that we hope users will be happy using extensively.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread this campaign on your blogs, twitter, facebook and more.

There is soon going to be a support forum where people enthusiastic about this project also can discuss about feature requests for the Lapdock project at http://Lapdock.net

story:
Seen on: Bless This Stuff, Design Milk, Tuvie, Yanko Design, Everyday Carry, Shejipi, Heldth, Trend Hunter, Verygoods. Thank you so much!


If simple is your style then these tools are for you! 

Wrench Aesthetics is an ultra-minimal take on the wrench system. Ideal for daily use around the house, the simplistic kit includes a multitude of different sizes. 

The hexagonal shape of the bolt is visually connected with the metric size of each wrench, shown with Latin numerals: 10 = X, 11 = XI, 12 = XII, 13 = XIII, 14 = XIV, 15 = XV. 

They’re easy to take anywhere and everywhere you might need to do a quick fix! They also make a great gift.

We like tools. We've simplified the shape of the typical wrench and improved the ergonomics of the body by increasing the width and thickness of the material. The size is versatile, making each piece nice to hold in one's hand, with a lovely weight and proportion. Each piece can be kept in one's pocket, backpack, bag.

With your support, we would like to have enough orders to cover the whole manufacturing process as described below. We'd like to share these tools with you. We are ready.


Specifications 

Solid 304 2B 5mm stainless steel unibody with laser engraved numerals, more details below. Dimensions are shown in mm: 120 x 30 x 5 mm. The set has 6 wrenches: 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 15 mm. 
Please click here for higher resolution pictures.




Process

  • material selection: solid 304 2B 5mm stainless steel
  • CNC laser cutting
  • vibratory finishing
  • laser engraving
  • quality checking
  • packaging

Schedule

  • Indiegogo campaign: December, 2015 - end of February, 2016
  • pre-production preparation: 2 weeks
  • production: 4 weeks
  • shipping: end of march, 2016

The whole manufacturing process will take place in Europe/ Romania/ Bucharest and the products will be shipped worldwide by EMS. Please be advised that EMS shipping takes about 15 working days.

Please note: The fee does NOT include your local applicable taxes. Please check with your local customs regarding the fees.


Who

The multi-disciplinary team is coordinated by Ionut Croitoru (founder of schneider sarto design) architect with 11 years of expertise in design & project management, working with multinational clients in commercial architecture.
There's also Sorin (CNC laser cutting artist), Andrei (passionate about metal works and finishing techniques) and dedicated laser engravers.

This is where schneider sarto started as a design studio back in 2014, where engineering and aesthetics are being mixed to create daily products.

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing a product is a challenging endeavour. Everything will be manufactured from scratch. We have handpicked suppliers for each operation (CNC laser cutting, vibratory finishing, laser engraving and packaging). We are constantly looking for talented suppliers to do things even better. Since it's all about supplier coordination, some potential challenges might occur, due to unforeseen situations or delays. But we will strive to avoid this, based on previous complex design & project management expertise.

The whole process will be crystal clear, you will be immediately informed, if necessary.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our wrenches, please spread the news. Thank you!


Credits

Photography & video: Cosmin Gogu
Music: Karpov not Kasparov

story:
"Bye bye scheduling chaos – Hello Calou!” 

The Calou is an Android-based digital Wall Calendar with e-Paper display. It automatically synchronizes with smart phones per Wi-Fi using the Google or iCloud Calendar. The Calou combines the advantages of a classic wall calendar made of paper with those of an electronic calendar, read on....

___________

Get your Calou!





(Der Text dieser Kampagne auf Deutsch)

What is a Calou?

The Calou is a digital wall calendar based on Android functions with e-Paper display – and with that the first ever smart calendar!

It can be synchronized via Wi-Fi with an iPhone or Android smart phone and sets up all of your dates and appointments in a unified and clear manner. It’s a digital wall calendar featuring an Internet connection.



Jump to:

  • Design | Calendar
  • Frequently asked questions
  • Technical Specifications
  • * Get your Calou! *

Smart Calendar for iPhone & Google

The Calou is the world's first digital wall calendar for both iPhone and Android! It supports both calendar systems simultaneously and is mounted on the wall just like a normal paper-based wall calendar.

And that’s exactly how it functions too: All of your dates and appointments are clearly presented next to each other in columns. Every device is represented by a column.




Back to the top of the page
_____

Automatically up-to-date

The days of writing down appointments in a calendar are a thing of the past! Be automatically up-to-date!

In addition to their electronic iPhone or Google calendars, many smart phone users have a paper calendar hanging on the wall at home. In everyday use, this means that all dates and appointments have to be entered per hand in writing and then checked every now and again, if not daily.


Thanks to the Calou, there’s no more crossing out or erasing things! The device automatically synchronizes itself with all possible digital calendars and smart phones, and then shows the calendar contents in a central manner and location. It’s simple and lucid, regardless of whether you use an iPhone/Android, a tablet PC or a computer. The registered calendar accounts are called up per Wi-Fi by the Calou, which then displays all of the dates and appointment entries bundled up together on its e-Paper display.


Back to the top of the page



iCloud and Google side-by-side

Every device or, said differently, every digital calendar account has an individual column, as is the case in a traditional wall calendar. As such, every user has his or her column in which his or her dates and appointments are entered.
For just about the first time ever, Apple iCloud or Google Calendar Accounts can be viewed and processed or worked on at the same time.
All calendar accounts will remain completely separate and independent of each other. No calendar has to be released or shared. Only the respective calendar/account owner knows his or her own password.
Every calendar account in the Calou device is technically its own autonomous entity and the unwanted use by a third party can be individually protected with an additional password.

Information headquarters

The Calou is attached to the wall much like your typical paper calendar. With that, you’ll always have all your appointments available at a mere glance. The Calou is also a magnetic board to which you can attach paper notes, post cards, or whatever else you would like.

The encasement is made completely of wood and fits perfectly in the selected environment. This allows the Calou to become THE information headquarters at home where all things come together. 


Back to the top of the page
_____

e-Paper display and touch screen

The Calou is operated simply and intuitively by hand via its touch screen. Appointments or changes can be done spontaneously and per hand directly on the Calou. There’s no searching around your smart phone, no uploading your computer, no need to log in – the Calou is always on and your appointments are permanently visible.

The display looks like electronic paper, much like the type found in an eBook reader. It uses so little electricity that you can ultimately use the device for weeks without recharging the rechargeable battery or putting in another load of batteries.

As such, no fixed electricity connection is necessary. The Calou runs on typical AA (mignon) batteries that are placed in a compartment on the backside of the device. If the batteries or rechargeable batteries are empty, simply turn around the device and switch them out per hand.

The Calou disposes of a micro-USB 2.0 connection for data and the electricity supply. It can also be continually connected to a power source via the USB connection, if you don’t want to operate it with batteries.

Android

Android 4.4 is the operating system that runs on the Calou. The Android platform grants you access to the Google Play Store and all of the apps that can be selected there! As such, you can actually call up your e-mail, listen to music or Internet radio via the internal speakers, surf the net per browser, and install other useful apps such as Dropbox, Evernote, and co.

Your own apps

On the Calou’s Android platform, you can run and operate your own self-developed apps. You can develop special apps for your Calou and make it even better.




Also see the Technical Specifications



Back to the top of the page




The Design

The Calou is round  and made of wood. Thanks to its minimalistic design, it perfectly and easily fits in its local environment, even giving the setting sublime accent.The front side features a varnished metal surface: It can be used for post cards or post-it notes that can be hung by small magnets.


In a wooden garment: The encasement is made of Multiplex.

Back to the top of the page


The Calendar

The Calou masters a number of different calendar presentations in order to always provide an optimal overview of things. There’s a task bar on the lower edge of the screen for switching between options. In addition, you can always directly press on the date of a day or on the week number in order to directly switch to the desired period of time or date.

Monthly overview: The most typical function of the Calou is the monthly view presented in a column format with the complete overview of all dates, appointments, and users on one side.










Weekly overview: If you want an overview of the current week, you switch to the weekly overview.













3 Days: For even more details, you can call up the following three days entirely onto the screen.














Daily overview: An overview of an entire day. The first line lists all of the full day dates. By clicking on a cell in a calendar column, you directly receive a short overview of the selected day without switching over to the daily view.

 Priority: A specialty feature of the Calou is the priority function. In the monthly overview, two dates per day are displayed together with a symbol that indicates how many additional dates or appointments are left in a specific day. With the priority selection box in the daily view section and in the new appointment dialogue, you can determine which two appointments should directly receive priority and “stand ahead” in the monthly viewpoint. 



Between the years –
The Yearly Overview: In order to be able to jump quickly between far-removed time intervals in the calendar, there’s the yearly overview. Here you can directly click on a day, a calendar week or a month and the display jumps to the selected point in time.










Hide the columns:
By clicking on the name above the column, you can push the columns together to get more space and a better overview. As such, you can ‘hide’ all columns except for one to get a better sole overview of whatever it is you’d like to focus on. One more click back and the columns open up again.
 Selecting days or weeks: In order to switch back and forth between the various viewpoints and appointments as quickly as possible, you can always click directly on one day or one calendar week. Then you switch the presentation directly to the daily or weekly overview.



By clicking on a cell in a calendar column, you directly receive a short overview of the selected day without switching over to the daily view.







A new date: A new date can be directly entered in the Calou by clicking on a daily box or on the "New" key in the task bar.

Very recognizable in the picture on the right is the priority selection box, which is used to determine whether the date/appointment should be presented directly in the monthly view.








Back to the top of the page


Technical Specifications

  • Dimensions 320x320x30mm (Ø320)
  • Color white

  • Weight ~2.000g
  • CPU Cortex-A9 1G Hz Freescale i.MX6 solo lite
  • RAM 512M LPDDR2
  • OS Android 4.4
  • Screen 9.7″ e-Ink pearl display, 85hz, V220
  • Resolution 1200×825
  • Gray scales 16 level gray scale
  • Touch Capacitive Touch Screen
  • WI-FI, 802.11b/g + Bluetooth 4.0

  • Battery last up to two weeks
  • Language English, German
  • Operative Temp. 0°C- 50°C
  • Approval and certificates: CE, ROHS, TELEC, VCCI, pse

THE CROWDFUNDING PROCEDURE: 

There is a fixed, determined runtime and a target amount that has to be reached. The Crowdfunding campaign is first considered a success if we reach the target amount within a runtime of 30 days. The target amount has been set to the minimal amount necessary for a payable series production.

The Crowdfunding platform Indiegogo will collect all of your payments centrally. We ourselves do not initially receive any money. If enough supporters come together within 30 days and we achieve or exceed the target amount, the campaign will be deemed a success. In this case, we’ll be given your payments at the end of the campaign minus the Indiegogo and PayPal fees. The series production can begin and the Calou will be on its way!

If we can’t get enough supporters together and we don’t reach our target goal within 30 days, the campaign will automatically be reversed by Indiegogo. You’ll automatically get the full payments you made returned back to your PayPal account. In this case, we’d not be able to place the Calou into series production. 


Things that can help us

  • Spread the word: Inform as many people as possible. Only when enough supporters join in the cause will we be able to build the Calou.
  • Even a small donation will help: Each and every one of us can add to the cause with a donation of our own choice and this will bring us closer to success.
  • Do you want a Calou? Don’t bother waiting, just get it now! If you wait, we’re going to fail and then there won’t be any Calous to buy later in the store.
  • Don’t wait to see how the campaign develops: If we don’t achieve our goal, you’ll automatically get your money back. An early participation is not a disadvantage. Just the opposite! Campaigns that start off strongly grab more attention and interested parties, and the chances for success increase.

What won’t help
  • “I’ll wait a bit and get it later in the store”. We won’t make it with this attitude and then the Calou won’t be available in a store later.
  • “Let the others do it. I don’t like to do much posting or advertising”. We can only do this together with our combined efforts. We don’t have any advertising or marketing budget. If the information isn’t passed along, shared and posted by every individual, we won’t stand a chance.
  • “I’ll wait and see how things go. Then I’ll join later”: There is no disadvantage to being along for the ride right from the get go. Should we fail in our endeavor, you’ll get your money back anyway. A weak start will make it very difficult to have any success.


THE STEPS TO COME: 

See our current project timeline (jpg) located on our website (or click on the picture below).



Planned project schedule/Masterplan:
One month preparation, five months for R&D and get the CE/Rohs certificate, one month for production and one month for shippment.

  • Industrial Design (ID): May
  • Mechanical Design (MD): May - July
  • Tooling: July - September
  • Hardware & Production, Engineering Verification Test (EVT): May - July
  • Hardware, Design Verification Test (DVT): July - August
  • Hardware, Process Verification Test (PVT): August - September
  • Golden Sample, mid of September
  • Certification CE & Rohs, September
  • Production (one month)
  • Shipping / delivery (one month)
  • Delivery in December 2015


Back to the top of the page


FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:




Do I need a Google account in order to be able to use the Calou?

No. You only need a calendar account to be able to use the Calou. This can then either be an iCloud account or a Google account. A Google account is free of charge and can be set up at any time online.

Do I need an iPhone in order to use the Calou?

No, the Calou works with both iCloud and Google. An iPhone isn’t absolutely necessary. A Google account is fully sufficient.

Will my iPhone calendar be displayed directly?

Yes, simply enter your Apple ID into the Calou and then the iCloud calendar in your iPhone is automatically displayed.

Do I have to share my calendar so that it can be shown in the Calou?

No, every calendar account is independent and works autonomously.

What languages are supported?

The Calou currently supports English and German. Additional languages will be offered soon.

What operational system does Calou function on?

Android 4.4

Do I have access to the Google PlayStore?

Yes

How many calendar columns in total can the Calou display?

How many calendar accounts can be administrated?

How many calendar accounts can be displayed simultaneously?

The Calou can administrate an almost unlimited amount of calendar accounts. However, due to the size of the display, a maximum of 4 columns can be displayed at one time.

Is it possible to have several Google calendars displayed in one calendar column?

What do the columns look like when you administrate several calendars with Google calendar?

Are shared Google calendars displayed in the respective column?

Can you choose which Google sub-calendar or shared calendar is displayed and which isn‘t?

Yes, all shared calendars and sub-calendars can be displayed in one column. The user can select whether only the main calendar or even all other calendars are displayed. All shared calendars and sub-calendars can be blended in or out at once. A selective choice of the individual sub-calendars is not currently possible.

Can you also use the calendar horizontally (landscape)?

At the moment, the Calou only works in a vertical format (portrait). As part of the coming, charge-free software updates, a horizontal/landscape format presentation is also planned.

Does the Calou also support CalDav, Microsoft Exchange, and the Live Calendar from Microsoft?

At the current time, the Calou only supports Google Calendar and Apple iCloud calendar accounts. For the delivery of the first series models after the Crowdfunding is however there is a software update planed with CalDAV, Exchange, and Live Support.

In what colors can I get the Calou?

At the current time, we only deliver the den Calou in the color white.

Are other designs and encasement forms planned?

Not at the current moment.

Can you get the Calou with a larger display?

Larger displays are unfortunately not available on the market for series production at the current moment.

How can you enter something by hand? Is a pen/stylus required?

The Calou is operated by the touch of a finger. A pen/stylus is not necessary.

Does the Calou require an electrical connection?

No, the Calou runs with 4 AA (mignon) batteries or rechargeable batteries, but can be continually connected to a general household electricity socket via a USB cable.

Data security: Is my data and information safe in the Calou?

The Calou only shows data and information that you have already entered in your Cloud – Google or iCloud. Other external databases are not made use of. Your Google or iCloud appointments are only stored in your Calou. We have not access to your data or information.

How long does the Calou run with one load of batteries?

Battery consumption very much depends on the usage and frequency of the synchronization. At a rate of two synchronizations per day with only but a few entries/display alterations, a set of batteries can last for roughly 10-14 days

Where can I get replacement storage batteries?

The Calou functions with common AA (mignon) batteries that are available in every supermarket.

Will there be software updates?

We are planning on regularly releasing online updates so that you can update your device directly online.

Why can’t I just buy the Calou in a store or web-shop?

We haven't yet started with series production. As such, the Calou can only be pre-ordered exclusively via this Crowdfunding campaign.



Back to the top of the page

POSSIBLE  RISKS & CHALLENGES - THINGS TO BEAR IN MIND

We have been working for no less than two years in developing and perfecting this product, however there will always be improvements and innovations. We hope many will include aspects of your feedback. By pledging to support this innovation, you are doing so with the understanding that you are making this new product happen - allowing cutting edge technology to be realized.

MANUFACTURING: We are working closely with an experienced manufacturer who has been able to produce state of the art electronic devices at a high level of quality, so we have already resolved some of the manufacturing challenges. However in order to be able to produce on a larger scale, we will require increased tooling and production equipment. This could lead to a bit of delay.

FULFILMENT: Despite our best planning efforts, there may be factors that we cannot control such as equipment malfunctions, transportation disturbances or supplier delays. While we hope that your support at Indiegogo will enable us to begin production on a commercial scale, we have no idea as to whether it will be 'business as usual' for us or an overwhelming demand. If more people than we anticipate would like to get their hands on a Calou, we may have to upscale the production. We will endeavour to produce the product quickly.

PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Extensive testing of the latest prototype has taken place throughout recent months and we think we have a product that is market-ready. However, adjustments may be made along the way (as we can’t think of everything in advance). This will result in a better product, but may delay production or shipment in some cases.

The Calou-Team, Hannes Dziggel

story_txt:
"Bye bye scheduling chaos – Hello Calou!” 

The Calou is an Android-based digital Wall Calendar with e-Paper display. It automatically synchronizes with smart phones per Wi-Fi using the Google or iCloud Calendar. The Calou combines the advantages of a classic wall calendar made of paper with 
those of an electronic calendar, read on....
 ___________ 
 Get your Calou!  















(Der Text dieser Kampagne auf Deutsch)


What is a Calou?
The Calou is a digital wall calendar based on Android functions with e-Paper display – and with that the first ever smart calendar!It can be synchronized via Wi-Fi with an iPhone or Android smart phone and sets up all of your dates and appointments in a unified and clear manner. It’s a digital wall calendar featuring an Internet connection.



Jump to:


Design | Calendar


Frequently asked questions 
Technical Specifications
* Get your Calou! * 



Smart Calendar for iPhone & Google
The Calou is the world's first digital wall calendar for both iPhone and Android! It supports both calendar systems simultaneously and is mounted on the wall just like a normal paper-based wall calendar.And that’s exactly how it functions too: All of your dates and appointments are clearly presented next to each other in columns. Every device is represented by a column.


Back to the top of the page
_____
Automatically up-to-date




The days of writing down appointments in a calendar are a thing of the past! Be automatically up-to-date!In addition to their electronic iPhone or Google calendars, many smart phone users have a paper calendar hanging on the wall at home. In everyday use, this means that all dates and appointments have to be entered per hand in writing and then checked every now and again, if not daily.


Thanks to the Calou, there’s no more crossing out or erasing things! The device automatically synchronizes itself with all possible digital calendars and smart phones, and then shows the calendar contents in a central manner and location. It’s simple and lucid, regardless of whether you use an iPhone/Android, a tablet PC or a computer. The registered calendar accounts are called up per Wi-Fi by the Calou, which then displays all of the dates and appointment entries bundled up together on its e-Paper display.

Back to the top of the page




iCloud and Google side-by-side 
Every device or, said differently, every digital calendar account has an individual column, as is the case in a traditional wall calendar. As such, every user has his or her column in which his or her dates and appointments are entered.For just about the first time ever, Apple iCloud or Google Calendar Accounts can be viewed and processed or worked on at the same time.All calendar accounts will remain completely separate and independent of each other. No calendar has to be released or shared. Only the respective calendar/account owner knows his or her own password.Every calendar account in the Calou device is technically its own autonomous entity and the unwanted use by a third party can be individually protected with an additional password.
Information headquarters

The Calou is attached to the wall much like your typical paper calendar. With that, you’ll always have all your appointments available at a mere glance. The Calou is also a magnetic board to which you can attach paper notes, post cards, or whatever else you would like.

The encasement is made completely of wood and fits perfectly in the selected environment. This allows the Calou to become THE information headquarters at home where all things come together. 

Back to the top of the page
_____

e-Paper display and touch screen

The Calou is operated simply and intuitively by hand via its touch screen. Appointments or changes can be done spontaneously and per hand directly on the Calou. There’s no searching around your smart phone, no uploading your computer, no need to log in – the Calou is always on and your appointments are permanently visible.The display looks like electronic paper, much like the type found in an eBook reader. It uses so little electricity that you can ultimately use the device for weeks without recharging the rechargeable battery or putting in another load of batteries.



As such, no fixed electricity connection is necessary. The Calou runs on typical AA (mignon) batteries that are placed in a compartment on the backside of the device. If the batteries or rechargeable batteries are empty, simply turn around the device and switch them out per hand.The Calou disposes of a micro-USB 2.0 connection for data and the electricity supply. It can also be continually connected to a power source via the USB connection, if you don’t want to operate it with batteries.

Android



Android 4.4 is the operating system that runs on the Calou. The Android platform grants you access to the Google Play Store and all of the apps that can be selected there! As such, you can actually call up your e-mail, listen to music or Internet radio via the internal speakers, surf the net per browser, and install other useful apps such as Dropbox, Evernote, and co.Your own apps

On the Calou’s Android platform, you can run and operate your own self-developed apps. You can develop special apps for your Calou and make it even better.





Also see the Technical Specifications


Back to the top of the page





The Design

The Calou is round  and made of wood. Thanks to its minimalistic design, it perfectly and easily fits in its local environment, even giving the setting sublime accent.The front side features a varnished metal surface: It can be used for post cards or post-it notes that can be hung by small magnets.



In a wooden garment: The encasement is made of Multiplex.
Back to the top of the page




The Calendar 
The Calou masters a number of different calendar presentations in order to always provide an optimal overview of things. There’s a task bar on the lower edge of the screen for switching between options. In addition, you can always directly press on the date of a day or on the week number in order to directly switch to the desired period of time or date.




Monthly overview: The most typical function of the Calou is the monthly view presented in a column format with the complete overview of all dates, appointments, and users on one side.












Weekly overview: If you want an overview of the current week, you switch to the weekly overview.














3 Days: For even more details, you can call up the following three days entirely onto the screen.















Daily overview: An overview of an entire day. The first line lists all of the full day dates.


By clicking on a cell in a calendar column, you directly receive a short
 overview of the selected day without switching over to the daily view. Priority: A specialty feature of the Calou is the priority function. In the monthly overview, two dates per day are displayed together with a symbol that indicates how many additional dates or appointments are left in a specific day. With the priority selection box in the daily view section and in the new appointment dialogue, you can determine which two appointments should directly receive priority and “stand ahead” in the monthly viewpoint. 




Between the years – The Yearly Overview: In order to be able to jump quickly between far-removed time intervals in the calendar, there’s the yearly overview. Here you can directly click on a day, a calendar week or a month and the display jumps to the selected point in time.












Hide the columns: By clicking on the name above the column, you can push the columns together to get more space and a better overview. As such, you can ‘hide’ all columns except for one to get a better sole overview of whatever it is you’d like to focus on. One more click back and the columns open up again.

 Selecting days or weeks: In order to switch back and forth between the various viewpoints and appointments as quickly as possible, you can always click directly on one day or one calendar week. Then you switch the presentation directly to the daily or weekly overview.




By clicking on a cell in a calendar column, you directly receive a short overview of the selected day without switching over to the daily view.







A new date: A new date can be directly entered in the Calou by clicking on a daily box or on the "New" key in the task bar.

What won’t help

 “I’ll wait a bit and get it later in the store”. We won’t make it with this attitude and then the Calou won’t be available in a store later.
 “Let the others do it. I don’t like to do much posting or advertising”. We can only do this together with our combined efforts. We don’t have any advertising or marketing budget. If the information isn’t passed along, shared and posted by every individual, we won’t stand a chance.
 “I’ll wait and see how things go. Then I’ll join later”: There is no disadvantage to being along for the ride right from the get go. Should we fail in our endeavor, you’ll get your money back anyway. A weak start will make it very difficult to have any success.




THE STEPS TO COME: See our current project timeline (jpg) located on our website (or click on the picture below).







Planned project schedule/Masterplan: 
One month preparation, five months for R&D and get the CE/Rohs certificate, one month for production and one month for shippment.



 Industrial Design (ID): May 
 Mechanical Design (MD): May - July 
 Tooling: July - September 
 Hardware & Production, Engineering Verification Test (EVT): May - July 
 Hardware, Design Verification Test (DVT): July - August 
 Hardware, Process Verification Test (PVT): August - September 
 Golden Sample, mid of September 
 Certification CE & Rohs, September 
 Production (one month) 
 Shipping / delivery (one month) 
 Delivery in December 2015 



Back to the top of the page





FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS:  



Do I need a Google account in order to be able to use the Calou?
No. You only need a calendar account to be able to use the Calou. This can then either be an iCloud account or a Google account. A Google account is free of charge and can be set up at any time online.
Do I need an iPhone in order to use the Calou?
No, the Calou works with both iCloud and Google. An iPhone isn’t absolutely necessary. A Google account is fully sufficient.
Will my iPhone calendar be displayed directly?
Yes, simply enter your Apple ID into the Calou and then the iCloud calendar in your iPhone is automatically displayed.
Do I have to share my calendar so that it can be shown in the Calou?
No, every calendar account is independent and works autonomously.
What languages are supported?
The Calou currently supports English and German. Additional languages will be offered soon.
What operational system does Calou function on?
Android 4.4
Do I have access to the Google PlayStore?
Yes
 How many calendar columns in total can the Calou display?  
 How many calendar accounts can be administrated? 
 How many calendar accounts can be displayed simultaneously? 
 The Calou can administrate an almost unlimited amount of calendar accounts. However, due to the size of the display, a maximum of 4 columns can be displayed at one time.
 Is it possible to have several Google calendars displayed in one calendar column?
 What do the columns look like when you administrate several calendars with Google calendar?
 Are shared Google calendars displayed in the respective column? 
 Can you choose which Google sub-calendar or shared calendar is displayed and which isn‘t?
 Yes, all shared calendars and sub-calendars can be displayed in one column. The user can select whether only the main calendar or even all other calendars are displayed. All shared calendars and sub-calendars can be blended in or out at once. A selective choice of the individual sub-calendars is not currently possible.
 Can you also use the calendar horizontally (landscape)? 
 At the moment, the Calou only works in a vertical format (portrait). As part of the coming, charge-free software updates, a horizontal/landscape format presentation is also planned.
 Does the Calou also support CalDav, Microsoft Exchange, and the Live Calendar from Microsoft?
 At the current time, the Calou only supports Google Calendar and Apple iCloud calendar accounts. For the delivery of the first series models after the Crowdfunding is however there is a software update planed with CalDAV, Exchange, and Live Support.
 In what colors can I get the Calou?
 At the current time, we only deliver the den Calou in the color white.
 Are other designs and encasement forms planned?
 Not at the current moment.
 Can you get the Calou with a larger display?
 Larger displays are unfortunately not available on the market for series production at the current moment.
 How can you enter something by hand? Is a pen/stylus required? 
 The Calou is operated by the touch of a finger. A pen/stylus is not necessary.
Does the Calou require an electrical connection?
No, the Calou runs with 4 AA (mignon) batteries or rechargeable batteries, but can be continually connected to a general household electricity socket via a USB cable.
Data security: Is my data and information safe in the Calou?
The Calou only shows data and information that you have already entered in your Cloud – Google or iCloud. Other external databases are not made use of. Your Google or iCloud appointments are only stored in your Calou. We have not access to your data or information.
How long does the Calou run with one load of batteries?
Battery consumption very much depends on the usage and frequency of the synchronization. At a rate of two synchronizations per day with only but a few entries/display alterations, a set of batteries can last for roughly 10-14 days
Where can I get replacement storage batteries?
The Calou functions with common AA (mignon) batteries that are available in every supermarket.
Will there be software updates?
We are planning on regularly releasing online updates so that you can update your device directly online.
Why can’t I just buy the Calou in a store or web-shop?
We haven't yet started with series production. As such, the Calou can only be pre-ordered exclusively via this Crowdfunding campaign.



Back to the top of the page



POSSIBLE  RISKS & CHALLENGES - THINGS TO BEAR IN MIND
We have been working for no less than two years in developing and perfecting this product, however there will always be improvements and innovations. We hope many will include aspects of your feedback. By pledging to support this innovation, you are doing so with the understanding that you are making this new product happen - allowing cutting edge technology to be realized.
MANUFACTURING: We are working closely with an experienced manufacturer who has been able to produce state of the art electronic devices at a high level of quality, so we have already resolved some of the manufacturing challenges. However in order to be able to produce on a larger scale, we will require increased tooling and production equipment. This could lead to a bit of delay. 
FULFILMENT: Despite our best planning efforts, there may be factors that we cannot control such as equipment malfunctions, transportation disturbances or supplier delays. While we hope that your support at Indiegogo will enable us to begin production on a commercial scale, we have no idea as to whether it will be 'business as usual' for us or an overwhelming demand. If more people than we anticipate would like to get their hands on a Calou, we may have to upscale the production. We will endeavour to produce the product quickly.
PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS: Extensive testing of the latest prototype has taken place throughout recent months and we think we have a product that is market-ready. However, adjustments may be made along the way (as we can’t think of everything in advance). This will result in a better product, but may delay production or shipment in some cases.
---
Disclaimer"Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to our best efforts. There are no guarantees." PayPal requires that the disclaimer above be displayed on the page....Please note: We are extremely confident that we will be able to deliver to all of you. Thank you so much for your amazing support and contributions!

The Calou-Team, Hannes Dziggel






CONTACT:  
In case of any technical questions with respect to this website or regarding the  payment process, please contact Indiegogo directly via support@indiegogo.com
Should you have any questions about the Calou feel free to send us a message via info@mycalou.com 


To learn more about the Calou please visit our website! www.mycalou.com 



Back to the top of the page




 The Mission




Back to the top of the page

story:
Being mobile has taken a whole new meaning these days. If we’ve come so far in the technology side, why are we still stuck sitting at a desk to get things accomplished? This is why we developed a mobile desk for productivity, one that’s made to work directly with the technology you already use. Introducing the LapPad, a highly functional mobile workstation that’s going to make you love takin’ care of business. Anywhere (yeah, literally anywhere).

The LapPad is made from strong, durable Canadian sourced Poplar and has been designed with comfort and ergonomics in mind. It has a built-in carrying handle, enough space for up to a 17-inch laptop and not one, but TWO docks so you can do your work (update your Facebook) from your tablet AND use your smartphone to check out the cutie who liked your Instagram of the bagel you just ate. AT THE SAME TIME. Hey, you’re busy as long as you feel busy, right? Right. 

As you know, (despite how friendly their name sounds) laptops emit heat when you’re using them. Like, the equivalent heat of a small sun, or a dying star. And unless you want to look like you just grilled a bunch of chicken on your drumsticks, you’re going to want something that dissipates heat. Because the LapPad is made from a well-finished ¾’’ Poplar sheet, it not only reduces heat but also absorbs it, leaving you with cool legs and a solid workstation to get things done on.

The LapPad team has literally been using this workstation throughout the entire Indiegogo campaign setup, and we still don’t have any laptop logos burned into our thighs (we are getting hangry thinking about all that grilled chicken, though).

Last but not least, POWER! You may simply call them ‘holes’, but we in the Marketing department call them ‘’routed power supply pass-throughs’’. Regardless of which, they’re important! In each dock slot, we’ve opened up the bottom so that all tablets and smartphones can be charged at the same time while being used on the LapPad. 

We’ve also integrated a mousepad in case you get a trackpad finger cramp, and can be made to order with left-hand or right-hand mousepad options. (Please note, trackpad finger cramp may not necessarily be the correct medical term, we are NOT physicians). 

User experience is important to us, so we’ve done our best to design the LapPad with user experience in mind. Send us your thoughts, questions, (praises?) in the Comments section of our campaign. We’d love to hear from you!

​
