story:
It has always been my destiny to bond together with TRPG (Tabletop Role Playing Games).  When I was young, I was immersed in Greek myths, fascinated by their meanings, and eager to control my destiny like the heroes I read about. TRPG games provide an opportunity to escape and explore. Our imagination can shape other worlds there, guided by chance and the roll of the dice.

United by the love of the game, our young team joined forces and created this mythical collection - InfiniDice. These unique designs express our imagination and passion for TPRG. These heavy, intricately carved metal dice feel substantial in your hand and represent the artistic pursuit of balance, brilliant color, and a more powerful gaming experience.

Join us to elevate your game and tell your stories with greater imagination.

 

 

InfiniDice is made up of 6 series of dice specially designed for all TRPG players. Each series symbolizes a legendary mythical story, yielding the power of ancient mythical gods to help you become the master of your games.

 

  • The Dark Fortress - InfiniDice Tower

Tired of those direct dice towers that quickly drop and dispense the dice in an oddly unsatisfied way? The transparent Dark Fortress is designed with a unique spiral staircase to increase the tumbling of the dice. All the while, the player's fate is being determined as the dice make their way down from the mystery medieval castle.

 

The sound of dice bouncing and rolling adds a special atmosphere to any RPG. The circular steps of The Dark Fortress make every roll of the dice full of surprises.

 

The rampart of the dark fortress continues the mystery medieval castle style with a detachable design for easy storage and organizing.

 

  • Vintage Brass Dice Case

This polished brass storage case with a magnetic latch and black memory foam complements the vintage metal design aesthetic of the dice. With it, you are fully armed and ready to battle at all times.

 

 

  •  InfiniDice Pouch: Leather & Velvet 
  • InfiniDice Canvas Tote Bag​

Besides the sets you have pledged, the basic black pocketable pouch will be provided to every backer.

 

 

 

Brendan: "The craftsmanship on these beauties is amazing."
story_txt:
It has always been my destiny to bond together with TRPG (Tabletop Role Playing Games).  When I was young, I was immersed in Greek myths, fascinated by their meanings, and eager to control my destiny like the heroes I read about. TRPG games provide an opportunity to escape and explore. Our imagination can shape other worlds there, guided by chance and the roll of the dice.
United by the love of the game, our young team joined forces and created this mythical collection - InfiniDice. These unique designs express our imagination and passion for TPRG. These heavy, intricately carved metal dice feel substantial in your hand and represent the artistic pursuit of balance, brilliant color, and a more powerful gaming experience.
Join us to elevate your game and tell your stories with greater imagination.
 

 

 
InfiniDice is made up of 6 series of dice specially designed for all TRPG players. Each series symbolizes a legendary mythical story, yielding the power of ancient mythical gods to help you become the master of your games.
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
The Dark Fortress - InfiniDice Tower
Tired of those direct dice towers that quickly drop and dispense the dice in an oddly unsatisfied way? The transparent Dark Fortress is designed with a unique spiral staircase to increase the tumbling of the dice. All the while, the player's fate is being determined as the dice make their way down from the mystery medieval castle.
 

 
The sound of dice bouncing and rolling adds a special atmosphere to any RPG. The circular steps of The Dark Fortress make every roll of the dice full of surprises.
 

 
The rampart of the dark fortress continues the mystery medieval castle style with a detachable design for easy storage and organizing.
 

 
Vintage Brass Dice Case
This polished brass storage case with a magnetic latch and black memory foam complements the vintage metal design aesthetic of the dice. With it, you are fully armed and ready to battle at all times.
 

 
 InfiniDice Pouch: Leather & Velvet 


 

InfiniDice Canvas Tote Bag​
 

 

 
Besides the sets you have pledged, the basic black pocketable pouch will be provided to every backer.
 

 

 


 


 


 










 

 



 

 
Brendan: "The craftsmanship on these beauties is amazing."

story:
SquareOne® is a gaming console that melds traditional board games and video games, combining the best of what physical and digital gaming has to offer. The gameplay experience is both interactive and immersive, providing you with a platform to combine many of your board games into one console.

 

 

 

 

The best part of playing board games is having fun together. Games give is a powerful way
to build connections with other people. As we have learned during the months of the pandemic, humans have an intrinsic need to share fun moments with the people we care about.

 

 

Wizama has created a new universe of gaming to give us new ways to form bonds between families and friends. SquareOne® unites people, whether around a single table or playing virtually with friends from around the world.

So let's play together again!



 

 

 

DESIGNERS

SquareOne offers new gaming possibilities. We are already working actively with several famous game designers, and we are very proud of their support.

 

 

PUBLISHERS & STUDIOS

 

 



 

 

PLAYER REVIEWS DURING CES 2020

 

 

PLAYER TESTING DURING PARIS GAMES WEEK 2019

 



 

 

 

With SquareOne®, the cards, pawns, dice and other connected objects are the game controllers that you will manipulate to interact with your games. This creates an exciting and constantly evolving gaming experience.

 

 

CARDS

Simply place the card on the side of the console: it is immediately recognized, comes to life on the screen and defines what your next turn will be.

 

 

PAWNS

Bring your character to life by touching, moving and/or rotating your pawn on the screen. Your figure's movements are detected in real-time.

 

 

DICE

You will be delighted to learn that SquareOne® comes with the world’s first connected dice track, which will enable you to feel the dice rolling in your hand just like any other board game. 

Whether you roll a 6-sided or 10-sided die, the dice track detects your result, sends it to
the console, and instantly displays all your resulting options on the screen.

 

 

CUSTOM GAME BOARD

The SquareOne® board can be customized for each game you play on it. The outer frame will play an integral role in this customization, allowing you to interact with the cards or place your pawns according to the rules and mechanisms of the current game.


 

 

 

 

 

What if your figures came to life? What if your moves generated sound and visual effects on the board?

SquareOne® promises a new world of gaming through an interactive and
immersive game play experience. It is inspired by traditional board games while also infusing the perfect amount of the video game experience. Let the visual animations
and sound immersion of video games merge with the physical interactions of board
games.

Your board games will never be the same again.

 

 


 

 

We know you and your expectations as a player. We met you in Paris (Paris Game Week), Vegas (CES), Essen (Spiel Messe) and Cannes (FIJ).

We are all gamers and enthusiasts at Wizama. SquareOne® is our tech gem, aiming to deliver unique gaming experiences. Our innovation is implemented for gaming, serving the game and nothing but the game.

 

SAVE & RESUME LATER: Start a game, pause, and start again later. No need to remember the location of your figures, SquareOne® saves the position of all objects.

INTERACTIVE IN-GAME RULEBOOKS: Not familiar with the game? No problem. Everything is explained through tutorials and dynamic explanations in multiple languages.

 

MULTIPLE LANGUAGES: You can play with anyone, anywhere – even players who speak a different language. The console shows the text in the language selected by the players.

PLAY WITH REMOTE FRIENDS: No matter the distance between you and your favorite gaming partners, you will be able to play together remotely.

 

SOUND & MUSIC: To become completely immersed, the SquareOne® includes high quality audio speakers for sound and music while you play.

SOCIAL SHARING: Take a screenshot and share your best moments to other players on social media.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You will have the opportunity to play classic, well-known games with features that re-imagine the gaming experience. There will also be original creations thanks to our very own studio as

well as through key partnerships with existing studios and publishers. Finally, we will
offer a dedicated platform for games developers in 2021 to allow them to create their greatest and craziest ideas on SquareOne®.

 

 

 

 

Included Games packs

The “SquareOne® Standard Edition”will include a 8 games pack.

If you choose the “SquareOne® Asmodee Dice Edition”, you will receive 2 more Asmodee games and 5 more dice games with your console.

These game packs allow you to discover the SquareOne®, its stunning features, all of its different game modes, and above all else, its promise of a combined physical and digital experience...while having fun like never before. SquareOne® will bring together
your children, parents, friends, and those around you from day one.

The DICE GAMES PACK includes Yahtzee, Chicago, Shut the box, Pig dice game, Martinetti.

The STARTER GAMES PACK also includes 

  • 6 classic games such as Air Hockey, Snake & ladders, Checkers, Backgammon, Ludo, Dodgeball
  • 1 original game by Wizama Studio: Chromacy

 

  •  Ramses by Ravensburger  

 

Included in the Asmodee Dice Edition:

  • Ticket to Ride by Asmodee

 

  • A Game of Throne: The Board Game by Asmodee

 

 

 

2021 Line-up catalog

Here is sampling of our future catalog of games, all of which will be available for pre-order during 2021, before your SquareOne® ships, so you can  play them right when you receive your console. You will be informed of the pre-order date as soon as the ordering platform is available.

 

 

 

 

 



 


 

 

 

 


 



 

 

 


 

 


 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 





 

 

 

 





 

 

 
 

 




 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 



 

 

 

 

 

DICE EDITION UNBOXING VIDEO

 

 

 

 

Anyone can make a game on SquareOne®: every console is a dev kit. There is no need to purchase a license or an expensive SDK. Because SquareOne® is based on an Android stack, any game developer can easily publish their game on SquareOne®. The possibilities are limitless, and we are very proud that every console can be a game playground for your ideas.

A developer platform will be available around March 2021 to give access to a free SDK, online documentation, a console simulator, a forum, and access to our support team.

But if you want to be among the first - and be sure to have your games available on the store on day one - you should pledge for the Developer Kit Pledge. 

This pledge allows you to receive a SquareOne® and a Dice track several months before anyone else, to have access to the future developer platform during beta phase, and to a premium support level for 12 months to help you to develop your ideas. Don't miss this great opportunity.

 

 

 

 




 


 

 

E.M.B. [French] 

 

SHUT UP & SIT DOWN [English] 

 

LUDOVOX [English]

 

LUDOVOX [French]

 

HUNTER & CRON [German]

 

 
 

 


 

 

 

 

 

Three years ago, a team who together admired many things - technology, video games, board games, art, shows and moments of conviviality - took up a challenge. Wizama was born, the contraction of Wizard and Ama, two different languages to signify Magic and Home.​

Profiles specialized in electronics, user experience, design, software and video game development, business, coming from companies like Technicolor, Thales, Apple, Ubisoft, Tencent, Xbox, Ankama, Libellud, have joined forces to give birth to SquareOne®.

 

Several board games authors, as well as video game companies, got involved in the adventure, and we thank each of them all for their confidence and support during the development process. ​

Over the years, we have designed multiple iterations of the prototype and developed several games to test the potential of the gaming experience at conventions such as the FIJ in Cannes, the Gamescom in Cologne, etc. Player feedback has helped us design the best possible experience.

 

We also tested several aspects of our platform at the biggest electronics conventions, and we were extremely pleased to receive major awards that validated our choices in terms of Product Design, User Experience Design, and Electronics.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

And now, we’re excited to offer this brand new experience to players all over the world. We can’t wait to see SquareOne® on your table and be a source of social sharing and happiness. It will be our best possible reward as players.​

Join our community to receive exclusive preview information and stay tuned for game release announcements!

 



 

 

 

REFUND GUARANTEE ​

If, for any reason, we are unable to produce the SquareOne®, we will provide a full refund to every backer. ​

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

Every great project has its challenges, especially those that include the combination of software, hardware, and hundreds of pieces of plastic, paper, etc. We understand the importance of bringing a high-quality product to every home. For us, compromising quality or safety is unacceptable.

Our team members' past experiences have served us well in both industry knowledge and product development. Our prototype is in its final stage, the manufacturing process is already settled. Most of Wizama's in-house games, as well as our partners' games, are in an advanced stage of development (many are already finalized).

We have attended a dozen gaming conventions so that players could try the SquareOne® and some of our games. They gave us the motivation to be here today. We try our best to stay close to our community through comments, private messages and our Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/wizamaplay/). We really take your feedback into account, and love interacting with our community.

This is the first time that we will have a 100% delivery operation, so we have considered additional planning time after the project is funded to ensure the most efficient shipping solution. We estimate a delivery date of February 2022. This is the required time to finalize the manufacturing process, produce all necessary SquareOne® consoles, and ship them to you. It’s also the time needed for our partners to finalize all the games and experiences that will be available at the launch. We also included a safety margin, in case we come across any unforeseen circumstances. It is in our best interests to get the SquareOne® to our backers as soon as possible, and we will do our best to avoid any delay.

story:
Smash the Galactic Patriarchy!

Hold the power in your hand with these highly detailed, ready to print-and-play tabletop miniatures!

THE TIME IS NOW!

     We know that tabletop gaming fans are moving toward figures that can be made at home due to both the novelty and more importantly: the cost effectiveness.  With only a modest materials cost, and a one time fee, you can make figures as needed on demand.

     In this exciting new age which you can find your favorite tabletop games on the internet and 3D print custom models you want to play with; you can truly let your imagination fly!

 

In the pretty distant abysmal future, gender warfare is the only reality.

     Maidens of Iron are endlessly searching the wastelands to seek and destroy the last remnants of Malekind.  Relentless in their pursuit, it's only a matter of time before they accomplish their nefarious task.  The Fembot Legions will not be denied by bothersome male privilege anymore.

 

     Command or battle these fem-mechanical demasculators as they smash the Galactic Patriarchy!

 

Adventure awaits -- HUZZAH!

     These nightmares don't just stalk the battlefields of the pretty distant abysmal future.  They just might be the very challenge awaiting adventurers, heroes, villains, and those who run on the edge or in the shadows.

 

Spice up your game!

      Who wants to be a thimble when they can monopolize the playing field with a Fembot death machine.  Strike fear into your opponents with a fun, humorous, intimidating, and unique playing piece.  No need to be too Sorry when you're bringing this much fun to the table.

 

What's on the menu?

     With a comprehensive selection process, we make it easy to pick the model(s) you want. If you want more models just pick an addon.
 

PERKS

All rewards are in the form of *.obj file format. These are high resolution models to get the most out of your printer.

 

  • EVERYTHING! - Just as it says, it is every model that we have available for this campaign. It's currently over $100 in value!

  • Issue one standard trooper - Take your pick of any one of the Fembot Troopers.

  • Send more Troops! - Pick 2 Fembot Troopers and add them to your game!

  • Strike from the Shadows! - Choose one model from the Fembot Wraiths to strike down your enemies!

  • Unleash the Shadows! - Grab 2 Fembot Wraith models to have your opponent truly fear the dark!

  • Lair of the Spider Queen - Get both Spider-Destroyers and crush the evil forces of The Arachnarri Hegemony

Add Ons

  • Reinforcements - Add a Fembot Trooper to your order!

  • Take an extra Shadow - Add a Fembot Wraith to your order!

 

Check out these amazing gifs of the available models!

Fembot Trooper 01

Fembot Trooper 02

Fembot Trooper 03

Fembot Trooper 04

Fembot Trooper 05

 

Fembot Trooper 06

 

Fembot Trooper Leader I

 

Fembot Trooper Leader II

[image coming soon]

Fembot Wraith 01

Fembot Wraith 02

Fembot Wraith 03

Fembot Wraith 04
 

Fembot Wraith 05

Fembot Wraith06

 

Wraith Leader

Spider-Destroyer

Spider-Destroyer II

Why Risk anything?

      Risk is best left to being just a board game and not something you should experience as a project backer.

     All models available are already completed!

     It's that simple.

    We mercilessly made our 3D modeler finish each uniquely posed and highly detailed figure before they were allowed to see the light of day.  They have also been made painfully aware that nowhere is safe from our customer's needs.

 

The Beginning-ing!

     Our team of perfectly incompetently competent Creators want to bring a TON of fun to your tabletop.  We have designs on bringing you more and more exciting and diverse figures, boxed games, and more! Did I mention "more"?

     Unfortunately our production team is hopelessly addicted to food and shelter.  Some of them have even *shudder* procreated.  Those things wrought upon us by said breeding are sadly hooked on food and shelter as well.

     The monies must be made.

     It is our hope that this unique, silly, and downright fun series of figures will warrant a modicum of profits.

 

STRETCH GOALS

$1000

 

Fembot Wraith

[Image Coming Soon]

 

More? You want more?

 

      Join us on the Braincage YouTube channel for exciting new content from our team bringing you the next wave in modern multimedia entertainment. Our YouTube channel features interviews with indie Creators and Developers of video games, comic books, tabletop gaming and more! Subscribe to receive exclusive updates and participate in free giveaways!*

     Follow us on social media to find out just how bad our opinions stink!

 

 

 

*No purchase necessary. Not available where prohibited by law.

 Wraith LeaderSpider-DestroyerSpider-Destroyer IIWhy Risk anything?      Risk is best left to being just a board game and not something you should experience as a project backer.     All models available are already completed!     It's that simple.    We mercilessly made our 3D modeler finish each uniquely posed and highly detailed figure before they were allowed to see the light of day.  They have also been made painfully aware that nowhere is safe from our customer's needs. The Beginning-ing!     Our team of perfectly incompetently competent Creators want to bring a TON of fun to your tabletop.  We have designs on bringing you more and more exciting and diverse figures, boxed games, and more! Did I mention "more"?     Unfortunately our production team is hopelessly addicted to food and shelter.  Some of them have even *shudder* procreated.  Those things wrought upon us by said breeding are sadly hooked on food and shelter as well.     The monies must be made.     It is our hope that this unique, silly, and downright fun series of figures will warrant a modicum of profits. STRETCH GOALS$1000 Fembot Wraith[Image Coming Soon] More? You want more?       Join us on the Braincage YouTube channel for exciting new content from our team bringing you the next wave in modern multimedia entertainment. Our YouTube channel features interviews with indie Creators and Developers of video games, comic books, tabletop gaming and more! Subscribe to receive exclusive updates and participate in free giveaways!*     Follow us on social media to find out just how bad our opinions stink!   *No purchase necessary. Not available where prohibited by law.

story:
Scars of Baladorne is a fast paced, one-on-one, tabletop wargame. Build up your army, plan your attack and execute your strategy. The beautiful lands of Baladorne are the backdrop to the continuing war, and we need your help to bring the world to life! For your support we offer a range of rewards such as digital and physical copies of the art and concepts, as well as your name immortalised in the hall of heroes.

 

 

With your support we can hire a professional 3D modeller to produce high quality miniatures for each unit type in the game, and also help us to tell the story of Scars of Baladorne through the battle board and further concept arts.

We are very active on social media and our discord channel where we are always open to feedback! If you want to get more involved in the development of the game try out our  free Tabletop Simulator version of the game and come say hello! (more information below)

 

                                 

 

So far we have some beautiful concept arts for the game, and IllGottenGames have been kind enough for us to use their 3D models for the prototype miniature models. With your support we hope to bring these concept drawings to life on the tabletop!

 

Help us bring to life the soldiers of Baladorne!

 

 

At this point in time Scars of Baladorne is a complete game with no major changes planned. This includes a plethora of unique utility cards, game altering Captain cards, and a unique health tracking system.

 

Scars of Baladorne brings a unique, quick to play-hard to master variation on the war gaming genre. With it’s easy 5 minute set up you can get into battle quicker than ever! 

 

 

The models for Scars of Baladorne have gone through many iterations to get where they are now. From simple tokens, basic 3D modelled symbols, and now full miniatures, the most memorable feature of the game are it’s soldiers! With this in mind, we want the miniatures to stand out and really make you feel like you are the commander of your own army.

 

Rewards

 

To show our thanks and appreciation, we have multiple tiers of rewards with something for everyone! This is your chance to immortalise your name in the great hall of heroes, which will be displayed in the rulebook once the game is complete, forever remembering those who helped in our greatest time of need.We are also offering both digital and physical copies of the concept arts, with pictures for you to display!

 

 

 

There is even a limited number of full prototypes available, providing the most up to date sneak-peak at the game before it’s full release.

 

 

Tiers

Here's a quick look at the different reward tiers we have to offer.

 

                                                                     

         Meet the Team

 

Dan


Dan’s story: Hi, I’m Dan… board games have always been a part of my life ever since I was a kid and all throughout my younger years I was fascinated with game design, wargames and strategy.
I grew up with classic games such as Warcraft 3 and Age of Empires but had a secret love of Risk and Munchkin. Since then I’ve filled my time by creating and testing new things such as D&D adventures, fantasy music for tabletop games and now Scars of Baladorne.

 

 

Dom

Dom’s story: My board game journey started when I landed on earth from krypton… wait wrong story… My board game journey actually began when I had just started Uni, up until that point I thought Board games meant day long games (more like arguments) of “Monopoly” or “Snakes and ladders". Then a friend introduced me to “Love Letter” and “Ticket to Ride” one night and a few years later the rest is history!

 

 

 

Bazz

Bazz’s story: Strategy games such as Total war and Civilisation have been my favourite types of games basically my whole life however I wasn't introduced to the wonder of board games until later in life. I can happily say now that I've been a fan of both for years and Scars of Baladorne hooked me as a concept from the start and has grown into one of my favourite games. I'm also an avid maker which has come in handy building prototypes and 3D printing game pieces. 

 


Luke

Luke’s story: I have always been an avid gamer and socialite where delving into the world of board games happened very naturally for me. I love playing social deduction games in large groups such as One Night Ultimate Werewolf, BANG! And Secret Hitler (Although everyone knows I’m a terrible liar!). I spent a lot of my younger years playing made up card games with my friends at school, so the next logical step was to try to make a board game!

 

 

Caltrop Games Timeline

 

 

Risks and challenges


With COVID-19 there is more uncertainty than normal. Government regulations or illness may bring delays when shipping rewards.

To mitigate the manufacturing risk, we have from multiple different vendors and are willing to go with a more expensive vendor if it means delivering the models and pictures to you on time.

While backing us does provide you with images and the rights to use them for your personal use, Caltrop Games retains all commercial use rights. All files, characters, images, and art associated with Scars of Baladorne (collectively the “Game”) are deemed to be licensed to you by Caltrop games, for your personal, non-commercial home use only. Caltrop does not transfer either the title or the intellectual property rights and retains full and complete title to the Game as well as all intellectual property rights therein. You may not sell, license, redistribute or reproduce any part of the Game. All trademarks and logos are owned by Caltrop games, and you may not copy or use them for commercial use. Permitted non-commercial uses include the creation of posters and stickers based on the images associated with the Game.
Caltrop games has a special understanding with the creator at Ill Gotten Games to use the models shown for promotional means, however these models will not be featured in the final product. We have loved using these models as a placeholder in our game so far, if you are interested in these models or other creative works we highly recommend you check out http://www.illgottengames.net/

story:
A Brief Introduction

Greetings, all! My name is Mike Yow and I'm a professional actor, tour guide, teacher author, and of course, an independent game designer! My little publishing company, as it were, is Fire In The Head Productions and we produce the small, but mighty, Savage Kingdoms tabletop roleplaying (for the past 6.5 years, in fact). We're currently in the 3rd edition of the game, the core rulebook having been crowd-funded via Indiegogo about a year ago! The Savage Kingdoms RPG focuses on a narrative storytelling-based gaming, all set within a dark and gritty sword-and-sorcery styled setting. The Savage East, the current project in question, is the second book in the SK III game line and features the eastern and southern continents of the known world (and its many seas and isle-continents). Think the Hyborian Age of Conan meets Game of Thrones.

Why We Need Your Help

Fire In The Head Productions, the producers of Savage Kingdoms, is a very small indie company - mostly just one person - and therefore doesn't quite have access to the resources associated with larger publishing and game design firms. As such, we have used crowd-funding in the past to help raise money for printing, art design, and distribution and are hoping to successfully go that route again here with this project, The Savage East.

What You Get In Return

Your financial contributions to this project will help us afford layout, design, artwork, and distribution of The Savage East expansion book, all quite expensive endeavors when done right. In return, contributors will receive perks and rewards dependent upon the level of contribution given. Our goal of $1,500 is pretty low, the bare minimum to do what we need to do to make the book happen. If we fall short of that goal, we'll simply save that money for future - and smaller - Fire In The Head and/or Savage Kingdoms projects. 

The Impact Made

With the resurgence of Dungeons & Dragons and tabletop gaming in general, we feel that our project is important to the gaming hobby and game design industry. To wit, people want more tabletop RPG options and Savage Kingdoms delivers on a lot of those wants, offering more variety, streamlined character creation, an easy action-resolution system (just 1d20 needed!), a vast and detailed setting, a slight alternative to the usual "high fantasy" systems, and more. Thus, if we can raise the funds for The Savage East book, the SK III line gets further extended and even more enriched. And gamers deserve such things!

Our Track Record

We've quite a fortunate track record, succeeding in all six of our past fund-raising projects! However, this past go-round cut it a bit close - likely due to potential pandemic-inducing financial concerns - so we're hoping that our dedication to our projects, complimented with our excellent track record, will bring us well above our goal. In fact, the more we exceed our modest $1,500 goal, the more art we can get commissioned to better produce and even more amazing aesthetic for the book! 

Risks & Challenges

As with all crowd-funding projects, there is some risk involved. Contributors are making a leap of faith, as it were, in hopes that the project they have monetarily assisted gets made and that they receive whatever perks where promised them. Conversely, project-makers are hoping that Mother Nature doesn't interfere and slow down - or even negate - the hard work we've put into our particular projects. It should be noted, as stated above, that Fire In The Head Productions has never defaulted on a project yet and that our contributors have, to our knowledge, received all the promised perks (and, in some cases, were even given additional perks). If, for whatever reason, we are falling behind time-wise on our promised perks, we will assuredly make posts or send emails to that point, as to make everyone involved aware of the situation. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We live in strange times indeed and sometimes not everyone can afford to contribute financially to a crowd-funding project. We totally get it. If you are in such a state but still desire to help us out, we'd love for you to spread word of this humble project. There are some Indiegogo tools on this very site that might assist you (and us) to that end. Monetarily or otherwise, we very much appreciate all our contributors, backers, advertisers, cheerleaders, and fans! =)

story:
The all-in-one swing exerciser Sita-X with motion sensor

Enjoy playing game/practice on world-famous golf courses (8) in your home or office. Players may challenge other golfers in a tournament by playing online. Also, after practicing or playing the game, there is a function that can identify problems of the swing through the motion analyzer!

 

 

 

Coaching yourself on how to improve your swing can be difficult and/or impossible if you don’t have the right data. The integrated 9-axis sensor that’s located in the grip of the SiTa-X collects all the data (head speed, swing path, swing tempo, face angle, distance, and launch angle) you need to improve your golf swings. Practice and review with SiTa-X!

​

A precise and detailed analysis is available through the 9-axis sensor that collects data on the swing motions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

STOP wasting money on expensive equipment!

All this can cost more than $1000 and you still won’t know how to improve your golf swing.

 

 

 

 

Simple and yet perfect analyzer

No extra equipment to purchase nor worry about attaching and detaching pieces. All you need is the Sita-X and the app to improve your golf skills.

 

​

 

​

 

​

 

​

 

 

 

Hear the impact

The IMPACT ZONE helps perfect your swing. As the head enters the impact zone, you’ll hear the sound of a club hitting the ball. Using that sound, you’ll be able to develop a rhythm and tempo that matches when the head hits the ball.

 

Enjoy the versatile platform

Practice on your own or play rounds with friends, all from the comfort of your own home/office.

 

Practice Realistically

SiTa-X allows you to train and play against other golfers online. Experience real-world play in single match games, multiplayer, and tournament play. You can play in the world’s most famous and difficult golf courses right from your living room/office.

 

User setting for custom mode

All environment values such as wind strength, concede setting, pin position, and limits of mulligan count can be customized through user settings. Also, the player needs to select the number of holes according to the time and circumstances (3holes, 6 holes, 9holes, and 18 holes). Experience a realistic golf course by simulating the world-famous golf course MAP with a virtual map. From the game mode, players can select one of the golf courses and select the number of players (1:1 or 2:2 play). The concept of screen golf (golf simulator) is implemented on your phone!

​

​

Entertaining Application

Various games are available with SiTa-X. Play online (single/multiple players) and challenge other golfers in tournament play on a variety of pro golf courses

 

 

 

 

Daily Training

Improve your skills by working towards define goals. An organized and systematic approach to practice helps improve core skills and techniques quickly.

 

​

 

Play Ability (PA) TEST

PA Testing provides a clear understanding of a player’s abilities. It’s the best way for players to know what types of training programs they should seek out.

The test is divided into steps that measure the player’s competency in 4 categories:

1. Distance / 2. Approach / 3. Putting / 4. Consistency

Completing PA Test lets players measure their personal skills so they can practice according to a defined program. SiTa-X intelligently creates a systematic swing training program to help players improve their swing.

 

​

 

Practice Range

In practice mode, you can practice with 14 different clubs. Choose from drivers to putters. Your swing data is automatically saved so you can check your skills with a replay at any time.

 

 

 

 

SiTa-X is the best way to introduce golf to children! Children who are new to golf can enjoy it like a game on various maps, and all family members can enjoy and practice together. Even beginner golfers can swing and improve their skills as if playing fun games with family and acquaintances through various modes at home!

 

Play online with friends and family

SiTa-X allows players to train and play against other golfers online. There is a total of 8 famous golf courses from around the world in the game, experience the excitement of playing single match games, multiplayer, and tournaments!

​

 

Analyze every move with all-in-one SiTa-X

We all know the weather is a major factor in golf, but with SiTa-X, the weather will no longer be an issue! Enjoy playing/practicing golf on the world-famous golf course in your home or office. Also, build a better golf swing with consistent practice and review.

​

 

 

During the years from 2017 to 2020, Phigolf APP products successfully raised 900,000USD through the support of 7,000 backers through global crowdfunding. AIIGOOD Co. made a tangible simulation swing exerciser with a built-in swing algorithm PCB module through a technology license agreement with Pinetworks, a developer recognized domestically and internationally. Introducing the all-in-one Sita-X with the PHI Golf APP on a swing exerciser that combines a swing motion sensor and a training rod.

 

Safe design processing with certifications

It is a product that has passed international safety standards and stability inspection standards for global export and is 100% produced in Korea.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

AIIGOOD Co. made a tangible simulation swing exerciser with a built-in swing algorithm PCB module through a technology license agreement with PHINETWORKS, a developer recognized domestically and internationally. Introducing a new built-in motion sensor [SitaX] swing exerciser that provides a pie golf APP with a swing motion sensor and a training rod in one. Golf swing exerciser with a built-in motion sensor (motion recognition), swing and putt practice, and even screen golf games are included. With just one SiTa-X golf swing exerciser, we will develop a variety of content that allows the whole family and friends to enjoy the screen golf game at home.

Introducing a new built-in motion sensor [SitaX] swing exerciser that provides a pie golf APP with a swing motion sensor and a training rod in one. Golf swing exerciser with a built-in motion sensor (motion recognition), swing and putt practice, and even screen golf games are included. With just one SiTa-X golf swing exerciser, we will develop a variety of content that allows the whole family and friends to enjoy the screen golf game at home.

story:
Lark is a game of thrill and co-creating that will ask you and your friends to share, care, and dare together.  

It's a bit like truth or dare but with a life-giving, affirming, and creativity embracing edge that just might bring you and your friends closer together (while also spurring each other on towards mischievious and hilarious antics and stories)

 "Can't say enough wonderful things about Lark. Having played an early version hundreds of times with friends it's a game that fluctuates the players between deep meaningful conversations and ridiculously creative, fun and quircky antics. From sitting and talking to jumping and laughing, it plays well with close friends or people you barely know.  

 Sometimes 10 cards take 2 hours, sometimes they take 20 minutes. I've played it with 2 people in the Boundary Waters, with 10 people on a crowded wedding dance floor, and a small group in my living room, local bar, and everywhere in between. It's never the same twice, it's thoughtful, engaging, and I'm so excited to get the official version!!" -Lloyd

We were originally going to call it “Mischief,” but we realized that the game offered more than that. We so often found ourselves grateful and touched by what fellow players had prompted and shared that we nixed that idea in favor of a broader, more benevolent - but still a bit mischievous - mix of framing and prompts.

Lark offers itself as an invitation to break free from the routines of our lives and make something of this very moment: to have a laugh, do something fun, or discover something about ourselves or a friend. 

You can and should play anywhere and it gets better the more you make it your own.

 

 

Challenge, little ones and big ones, invite us to engage in the now, to be present and grow. In a playful context, they draw us out of our ruts and into our agency. We see with new eyes how we relate to those around us, our place, ourselves, and the horizon-wide potential that is waiting at the edge of our awareness, calling us into better versions of ourselves.

Chance because no matter how much we strive, we'll never have control. It's a joy to climb aloft on the intolerably unknowable tide of life and embrace chance and whichever of the infinite possibilities of life she wants to offer us.

And yet, Lark is just a game. Like life itself do not take it too seriously. Have fun, make mischief, affirm someone.

 

One way to think of Lark is as a 'build your own game' kit for engaging your friends and your creative side. Part of the difficulty in describing Lark is the ambiguity it comes with. The ambiguity, as difficult as it makes it to market, is a feature of its charm that we wouldn't dream of discarding. The ambiguity leaves room for you and your friends to make it in your own style, to transform and recreate it in ways that suit you and bring the game to life. 

We made up the guidelines, prompts, tenets, and wild cards, you do with them and the die what you want. Use all of the components or choose just a few. 

 

Players take turns prompting each other to do or share (the challenge) based on the prompts in their hands or heads and the roll of a 12-sided die (the chance). Here's a copy of the guidebook  (don't worry the final version will be copy-edited and pretty!)

Everyone draws cards. One player, the Dealer, prompts a fellow Player or Players with a challenge inspired by his card or his imagination and then assigns the odds of it happening using the 12-sided die. If the Players accept the proposed challenge and odds, the die is cast and the play either does or does not proceed. Either way the Player who accepted the challenge becomes the new Dealer. If multiple Players are challenged by the Dealer, let the die decide who becomes the new Dealer.

Here’s an example: 

Mavis, Laura, Bob, and James are playing Lark. They agree to play their hand “cat up.”  James reads through his cards, finds one he likes, and says to Bob, “Bob, if I roll a 9 or 12 Peacock a little.”  Bob isn’t sure he heard correctly, asks for clarification. James says, “peacock a little.” Bob is still sure he doesn’t know what that means, but trusts he’ll sort it out by the time he needs to, so says “sure thing.” James rolls the die and it lands on 10. Bob gets the die without peacocking, even just a little. James puts his used card faceup in a discard pile. 

Bob turns to Mavis and Laura and says, “Mavis and Laura. If I roll a prime number you two race to become upside down.” Mavis and Laura are down to clown, but want to make a scene so suggest, “we’ll do it if you and James join if it lands on 1.”  Bob and James agree. The die is cast and it lands on 5. Mavis and Laura race to become upside down. To determine who gets the die Bob says, “Mavis if it’s odd you get it, Laura evens.”  He rolls a 3 and gives the die to Mavis.

Mavis, deciding she likes her idea more than those on her cards, says, “James if I roll an even you reenact a scene from your favorite movie without speaking.” James says, “Nah, odds are too high.” Mavis says, “alright, 3-5.” James says, “I’m game.” Before Mavis can cast the die, Laura plays the “Everyone Join In”  Wild Card and looks around for consent. Everyone agrees so Mavis casts the die and the game goes on. 

As the game goes on and you and your fellow players take the tenets to heart you will begin creating the game in your own style while inventing your own prompts. This improves the game exceedingly.


 

Lark was born out of a desire to engage in what Herman Hesse called "the inexhaustible fun of daily life." We wanted a playful way to engage each other at the edge of our comfort zones - a game that offered the opportunity to be playful and vulnerable, whichever best suited the group’s mood and location. The first game we ever played was at a distillery in Minneapolis - at least one of the prompts from that night is featured in the game we know today. We’ve since taken the idea and tried it everywhere we could.

We’ve transformed the game from an idea into a ready-to-roll adventure. It looks as good on your shelf as it does at a picnic or crushed in the brain of your backpack.

So, Lark is at least two things. It is a silly game designed to empower you and your friends to make some fun, some memories, maybe some mischief. It is also an invitation to explore in vulnerability and sincerity and to find yourself affirmed and maybe even a bit more confident and curious while engaging with your friends in a new way or shedding a new light on an old friendship.

Whether you find yourself playing in your living room, kitchen, via FaceTime , on a road trip, in the high alpine snow fields of the Rockies, a sauna, sailboat, ski yurt, Saturday afternoon hike, brewery, favorite bar, back row of a concert, front row of a concert, church, canoe trip, baptism, beach day, backyard bonfire, first date, mid-life crises, the hospital room where you just met your firstborn, or lastborn, or anywhere else you can imagine, Lark will keep good company and get better as you make it your own.

 

 

We have had a lot of fun scheming, designing, refining, playtesting, and pushing each other while making Lark. Our hope is that now that we're ready to share it the game will bring you and yours as much joy, connection, and laughter as it has us.

We’re passionate about this project because we believe that it can catalyze connection and creativity. We need connection and creativity.

Many thanks to many people:

Video backing music by Toon Released by Cudighi Records

Thanks to Moms generally and my Mom specifically. Thanks to Jamie, Julie, Ryan, Zoe,  John, Adam, Ben, Walter, Cooper, Meghan, Fat Sam, Dan, Hannah, Ella, Gwen, Sam, Paul, Dan, Olivia, Arthur, Derek, TJ, Cody, Iris, Sean, Susan, Lloyd, John, Matt, Rachel, Amanda, Maggie, Kristen, Aksel, Sarah, Dave, David, Scott, Scott, Pat

story:
With The Folio: Black Label #7, Art of the Genre introduces gamers to our newest sexy swords & sorcery duo, Imani the priestess of Bast, and Daiyu the wu-jen/ninja.  Together, these two will take our adult themed gaming to the latest uncharted area of The Nameless Realms, the Steppes of Arcania, in a brand new trilogy of adventures!

Join these two as they find even more trouble than one can imagine, and witness just what kinds of delights they utilize to defeat their amorous enemies.  The Folio: Black Label #7 should inspire any gamer who is looking to spice up their table sessions with some dark, and sometimes comical, adult role-playing situations inspired by the 'B' fantasy movies of the 1980s.

 

Who is this adventure for?: It will be based around  classic AD&D gaming mechanics, while also have 'grey' stat and  treasure blocks for 5th Edition D&D,  so it is easily playable in  BOTH formats.  It has been designed for  6-8 characters, roughly 2nd  through 4th, and will include incredible maps and artwork that will get your creative juices flowing!   Just check out some of the maps below for what will be awaiting you.

 

What does the adventure The Legend of Imani and Daiyu revolve around? Well, this will be a standard swords & sorcery based adventure that deals with our new duo exploring the ruins of an ancient southern civilization where even common folk still have the touch of magic inside them.  This adventure will detail a small outpost of humanity and the surrounding hills, where ruins can be found, in a classic low level introduction module.

Can I get all the previous Black Label content?  YES!  You can get all the previous Black Labels bundled into a single volume (128 pages), plus bonus content mini-adventures, with The Complete Black Label.  This reward can be had in both physical and PDF formats!

*TRADEMARK DISCLAIMER

"D&D" and "AD&D" are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast, LLC. Art of the Genre is not affiliated with Wizards of the Coast LLC. We make no claim to, or challenge to, such trademarks

story:
The woods are lovely, dark and deep. Filled with zombies that lurk and creep.  And miles to go before we sleep. 

Hop on board and join us for this wild ride. This Campaign includes: 

Zombies!!!: 20th Anniversary Edition

Upgrade Kit of the 20th Anniversary Edition items

Zombies!!!: Museum of Weird

Zombies!!! Promo cards

Additional add-ons for artwork, .stl files for a Jeep, clown car and space shuttle

Box Contents for Zombies!!!: 20th Anniversary Set

  • 30 Map tiles - thicker (.07")
  • 50 Event cards
  • 6 Human pawns
  • 100+ Zombie Figures in up to 16 different poses
  • 3D Hearts and bullets
  • Survivor and door tokens
  • 36 Dice Cards
  • 3D Helicopter
  • Perfect information game play option
  • Rules

Each game comes with a download card for the Zombies!!! Soundtrack from Midnight Syndicate!

Box Contents for Zombies!!!: 20th Anniversary Upgrade Kit 

  • 30 Map tiles - thicker (.07")
  • 3D Hearts and bullets
  • 36 Dice Cards
  • 3D Helicopter
  • Perfect information game play option
  •  Stretch goals for Zombies!!! 20th Anniversary Edition

CLICK HERE FOR VIDEO ABOUT 20TH ANNIVERSARY EDITION
