story:
Overview

Imagine creating a scale replica of your favorite football team or fantasy team of the past or present! With your help, we'll launch an entirely new way of making football miniatures and create a dynamic new era of Electric Football where every fan's dream can become a reality!

Hi, my name is Doug Strohm and I'm the president of Tudor Games, a tabletop football game company that has been making Electric Football® games and player miniatures for almost 75 years.

This campaign will unleash a revolutionary new product that delivers the most detailed and diverse miniature football teams we've ever produced! 

 

New technology means our Uni-Forms™ kits will give our customers what they've been asking for:  every uniform from any era of NFL football and the addition of College Football teams to our product line.

Uni-Forms are less expensive, easier, and faster to apply than painting your own teams. They're also a fraction of the cost you'd pay a custom miniature painting service. Now you can collect more teams, more players, coach more teams, and do it all in style!

Here's a quick history of Electric Football and a behind-the-scenes look at how we can overcome some challenges with your help and backing. Backers also have the opportunity to secure our first-run collectibles before general availability!

History

Once upon a time, Electric Football was a must-have holiday gift for millions of boys and girls. In the days before Madden NFL™, kids and families gathered around the board and learned the X’s and O’s of football. Today, there’s a strong following of kids and adults who love the game. Enthusiasts customize their players and boards, manage and play in local leagues, and hold national tournaments.

Tudor Games is a small, family-run business. We bought the company in 2012, and are the third owners.  I run daily operations from our offices and warehouse located just south of Seattle with my son, Wyatt, my sister, Denise, and our shipping clerk, Blanca. We are a licensee of the NFL, NCAA, Ohio State, U.S. Army, U.S. Navy, and the Kentucky Derby.

As a kid growing up in rural Ohio in the 70's, I created games in our basement using wood, ball bearings, paper and anything else I could get my hands on. In the 90's I patented a mechanical baseball game and brought it to market with Denise's help.

As a family, we were gamers long before that was even a thing. We sometimes break out the SORRY! game to see who’ll get stuck doing the dishes. Electric Football, Settlers of Catan, Code Words, and 7 Wonders are family favorites. 

Wyatt prepares to throw a pass at Gencon.   Photo credit: Indianapolis Star

Electric Football delights young children with hands-on fun and captivates coaches of all ages who compete in organized solitaire (coaching both offense and defense) and neighborhood leagues. These coaches are a generous group, they are cheerleaders for the respect their favorite game deserves and willing to help all kids and newcomers to our hobby. 

Photo credit:  MEL Magazine

Check out this MEL Magazine story on the intense competition in the CAEFL, one of the Electric Football leagues in California.

When Electric Football happens at this level, it's incredible. It's pure football strategy and coaching and it's exciting to play and watch. Here’s a video from one of our tournaments:

Passion, friendship, and fierce competition at one of our tournament conventions!
 

Behind the Scenes...

Technology has finally caught up to customer desires! We've created a new and innovative way to give our customers the widest selection of licensed products; but this campaign is also about helping our small business move from mass production in China to local, small batch manufacturing here in the United States.

Over the years, our teams have been decorated in the U.S., Haiti, Hong Kong, and China. Currently, our teams are made in large lots in China, shipped to the U.S., and then reordered when stock runs low. This is a four-month process with high minimum order quantities for each team and style. We currently make only one home and one away style per team.

Uni-Forms vs. older production teams. Note the detailed bolts on the legs and shoulders. 

The NFL has announced that teams will have the freedom to wear a variety of uniform styles. College football has been trending in the same direction, led by schools like the Oregon Ducks and the Oklahoma State Cowboys. The NBA and MLB are doing fun and interesting things with uniforms, and the NCAA is allowing student athletes to cut their own licensing deals.

Our production process worked fairly well in the past when uniform styles rarely changed. Many in our hobby don't realize that our stock of older production figures represents years of unsold inventory.

As today’s sports leagues increasingly embrace multiple uniforms per team, we want to be able to provide the uniform choices that fans want, without the long lead times and high minimum orders our current production process demands.

Challenges

Outdated inventory: Often times our inventory of newer production figures no longer matches the current on-field uniforms. When a team changes their uniform after we've ordered, or wears multiple uniforms, you can guess the rest -- excess stock, stock outages, and unhappy customers.

Guesswork: Which teams are going to be good this year? Free agent signings? Power rankings? Winning teams sell. We have to guess/predict each team's level of success months before the season starts to make sure we have the right products available.

For example, we ordered Patriots when Tom Brady was quarterback. When Brady signed with the Buccaneers, we sold out of the Bucs and have plenty of Patriots in stock. The Bucs go on to win the Super Bowl, and we can't make them in time. In fact, we've been sold out of the World Champs two years in a row. The Bucs in 2020 and the Chiefs in 2019. Ouch!

Details, details: Our Coaches want to put the best-looking team possible on the field, especially in tournaments and league play.  The uniforms on our figures produced in China are well-done, but missing the detail coaches and collectors want.

When setting the designs for manufacturing, we have to reduce the detail to meet the capabilities of the factory, so many key elements of the uniform such as team names, helmet detail, jersey and pant striping, socks, logos, and patches are missing or less detailed.

The result? Our customers see new and detailed uniforms on TV or in the stadium and are left wanting what we don't have and can't provide.

Bottom line:  Our customers want realism and choices, uniforms are getting more complex, and our traditional production process just won't cut it. This situation is threatening our hobby, what can we do?

Uni-Forms: Born of Blood

During the Christmas rush, it's all hands on deck at the busiest time of the year. While prepping shipments on December 8, I lost a brief fight with a box cutter. Nothing major, I got a bandage from our first aid kit. 

As I wrapped the transparent adhesive around the bend of my finger, it hit me... could our football players be wrapped with an adhesive film like this?

Finally, we had a lead on how we could solve our production problems. We first tried tattoo film, a thin and transparent material that protects new ink on your skin. It conformed to the figures well, but the print quality was unacceptable. We continued to search for the right stuff.

Some films were too thick, some too thin, some too sticky, and some not sticky enough. Then, in a Goldilocks moment, we found a printable film that was just right. We jumped in with both feet and embraced the Uni-Forms project. My wife, Christine, came up with the name. We immediately started mapping the surfaces of our miniatures to create patterns for them.

Patterns, labels, highlights, and shading shown for the Backer figure and several NFL teams.

Uni-Forms are made with a 50-micron self-adhesive film that’s thinner than a human hair. The pre-cut film panels expertly conform to 3D-molded football figures delivering amazingly realistic results without the time, expense, and skill required in custom painting. Shading and highlights give the figures depth and realism. We've also included uniform numbers in three different sizes for the front, back, and shoulders.

If you're a tabletop gaming enthusiast, you know how fun and engaging it can be to create your own figures! We discovered that wrapping the figures using this new film is fun and rewarding. You develop a certain attachment to the players you've made!

Images from the instructions showing steps involved in making Uni-Forms players. 

Over the past five months, we've been working hard behind the scenes on the designs for the first 64 home and away NFL uniforms. I'm happy to report they are finished and have been approved by the NFL. 

Each of the 5 film sheets are 3"x 3" in size with pre-cut patterns ready to lift out and apply.

  • Sheet A = Identifies the team, home/away, years in use, and either primary, alternate, Color Rush (NFL), or classic style. Film patterns to outfit 2 included Backer figures and some of the jersey back numbers.
  • Sheet B = Film patterns to outfit 2 Sprinter figures, the remainder of the jersey back numbers, and some of the jersey front numbers. 
  • Sheet C = Film patterns to outfit 2 Runner figures, plus the remainder of the jersey front numbers.
  • Sheet D = Film patterns to outfit 3 Lineman figures.
  • Sheet E = Film patterns to outfit 2 All Purpose figures, plus all shoulder numbers.

 

Primary home film sheets on top and away film sheets under them for all 32 NFL teams.
 

Impact

With your backing, we can give every customer the choices they want! We're excited to provide a wide selection of authentic uniforms for every team! We have already completed the Cincinnati Bengals 2021 uniforms, and are looking forward to the Buccaneers “creamsicle” uniforms, the classic Seahawks, and the vintage Patriots in red jerseys with their Pat Patriot logo, to name a few!

With Uni-Forms we can create, list, and categorize all the uniform designs the world of football has to offer--past, present, and future. Uni-Forms can be made for any football club -- professional, college, and even high school teams. For the NFL, we'll release not only the “primary” uniforms for each team, but their alternate, Color Rush, classic, and vintage styles as well.

With your help, we'll create an incredible selection of teams from all eras to collect, customize, and coach. We'll also be able to license and develop a large number of NCAA college football teams.

Bears, Broncos, Bengals, and Bills in primary home and away styles with their Uni-Forms on!

You'll also be helping us move production home to the U.S. where we can make dynamic new products available in days, not months. We'll be able to solve the challenges cited earlier - keeping more items in stock, adding to our selection with hundreds of Uni-Forms styles, adding college football, and better serving our customers by being able to say YES! more often.

This is a big deal for us -- and for the hobby -- so we hope you'll pre-order on IndieGoGo so that we can buy materials, equipment, and packaging ahead of our launch.

If you like miniatures and football, or you’re already a fan of the hobby, your backing and support will give us the necessary capital to bring this project into the end zone and usher in an exciting new era of Electric Football!

Risks

Our track record of performance over the last 9 years and our experience with tudorgames.com and our retailer partners should give you confidence that we can manage the logistics to ship your Perks. Also, officially licensed products are your guarantee of quality and authenticity.

If you're a Tudor Games customer, thanks for visiting our IndieGoGo campaign. We need your support to reach our goals! Please help us by pre-ordering Uni-Forms Perks on this site!

We do right by our customers and we keep our promises. We believe in transparency and proactive communications. We will respond in a timely manner to all comments and we’ll communicate often so you’ll always know where things stand. We're not very far from release. The concept is proven and the results are remarkable. We need your help!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t be a Backer, but you're interested in what we’re doing, we’d love to hear from you! If you can share our campaign with friends or family members who you think may be interested, that would be amazing too! Thank you.
story_txt:
OverviewImagine creating a scale replica of your favorite football team or fantasy team of the past or present! With your help, we'll launch an entirely new way of making football miniatures and create a dynamic new era of Electric Football where every fan's dream can become a reality!Hi, my name is Doug Strohm and I'm the president of Tudor Games, a tabletop football game company that has been making Electric Football® games and player miniatures for almost 75 years.This campaign will unleash a revolutionary new product that delivers the most detailed and diverse miniature football teams we've ever produced! 

 
New technology means our Uni-Forms™ kits will give our customers what they've been asking for:  every uniform from any era of NFL football and the addition of College Football teams to our product line.
Uni-Forms are less expensive, easier, and faster to apply than painting your own teams. They're also a fraction of the cost you'd pay a custom miniature painting service. Now you can collect more teams, more players, coach more teams, and do it all in style!Here's a quick history of Electric Football and a behind-the-scenes look at how we can overcome some challenges with your help and backing. Backers also have the opportunity to secure our first-run collectibles before general availability!HistoryOnce upon a time, Electric Football was a must-have holiday gift for millions of boys and girls. In the days before Madden NFL™, kids and families gathered around the board and learned the X’s and O’s of football. Today, there’s a strong following of kids and adults who love the game. Enthusiasts customize their players and boards, manage and play in local leagues, and hold national tournaments.Tudor Games is a small, family-run business. We bought the company in 2012, and are the third owners.  I run daily operations from our offices and warehouse located just south of Seattle with my son, Wyatt, my sister, Denise, and our shipping clerk, Blanca. We are a licensee of the NFL, NCAA, Ohio State, U.S. Army, U.S. Navy, and the Kentucky Derby.As a kid growing up in rural Ohio in the 70's, I created games in our basement using wood, ball bearings, paper and anything else I could get my hands on. In the 90's I patented a mechanical baseball game and brought it to market with Denise's help.As a family, we were gamers long before that was even a thing. We sometimes break out the SORRY! game to see who’ll get stuck doing the dishes. Electric Football, Settlers of Catan, Code Words, and 7 Wonders are family favorites. Wyatt prepares to throw a pass at Gencon.   Photo credit: Indianapolis StarElectric Football delights young children with hands-on fun and captivates coaches of all ages who compete in organized solitaire (coaching both offense and defense) and neighborhood leagues. These coaches are a generous group, they are cheerleaders for the respect their favorite game deserves and willing to help all kids and newcomers to our hobby. Photo credit:  MEL MagazineCheck out this MEL Magazine story on the intense competition in the CAEFL, one of the Electric Football leagues in California.When Electric Football happens at this level, it's incredible. It's pure football strategy and coaching and it's exciting to play and watch. Here’s a video from one of our tournaments:

Passion, friendship, and fierce competition at one of our tournament conventions!

 
Behind the Scenes...
Technology has finally caught up to customer desires! We've created a new and innovative way to give our customers the widest selection of licensed products; but this campaign is also about helping our small business move from mass production in China to local, small batch manufacturing here in the United States.Over the years, our teams have been decorated in the U.S., Haiti, Hong Kong, and China. Currently, our teams are made in large lots in China, shipped to the U.S., and then reordered when stock runs low. This is a four-month process with high minimum order quantities for each team and style. We currently make only one home and one away style per team.Uni-Forms vs. older production teams. Note the detailed bolts on the legs and shoulders. The NFL has announced that teams will have the freedom to wear a variety of uniform styles. College football has been trending in the same direction, led by schools like the Oregon Ducks and the Oklahoma State Cowboys. The NBA and MLB are doing fun and interesting things with uniforms, and the NCAA is allowing student athletes to cut their own licensing deals.Our production process worked fairly well in the past when uniform styles rarely changed. Many in our hobby don't realize that our stock of older production figures represents years of unsold inventory.As today’s sports leagues increasingly embrace multiple uniforms per team, we want to be able to provide the uniform choices that fans want, without the long lead times and high minimum orders our current production process demands.ChallengesOutdated inventory: Often times our inventory of newer production figures no longer matches the current on-field uniforms. When a team changes their uniform after we've ordered, or wears multiple uniforms, you can guess the rest -- excess stock, stock outages, and unhappy customers.Guesswork: Which teams are going to be good this year? Free agent signings? Power rankings? Winning teams sell. We have to guess/predict each team's level of success months before the season starts to make sure we have the right products available.For example, we ordered Patriots when Tom Brady was quarterback. When Brady signed with the Buccaneers, we sold out of the Bucs and have plenty of Patriots in stock. The Bucs go on to win the Super Bowl, and we can't make them in time. In fact, we've been sold out of the World Champs two years in a row. The Bucs in 2020 and the Chiefs in 2019. Ouch!Details, details: Our Coaches want to put the best-looking team possible on the field, especially in tournaments and league play.  The uniforms on our figures produced in China are well-done, but missing the detail coaches and collectors want.When setting the designs for manufacturing, we have to reduce the detail to meet the capabilities of the factory, so many key elements of the uniform such as team names, helmet detail, jersey and pant striping, socks, logos, and patches are missing or less detailed.The result? Our customers see new and detailed uniforms on TV or in the stadium and are left wanting what we don't have and can't provide.Bottom line:  Our customers want realism and choices, uniforms are getting more complex, and our traditional production process just won't cut it. This situation is threatening our hobby, what can we do?Uni-Forms: Born of BloodDuring the Christmas rush, it's all hands on deck at the busiest time of the year. While prepping shipments on December 8, I lost a brief fight with a box cutter. Nothing major, I got a bandage from our first aid kit. As I wrapped the transparent adhesive around the bend of my finger, it hit me... could our football players be wrapped with an adhesive film like this?Finally, we had a lead on how we could solve our production problems. We first tried tattoo film, a thin and transparent material that protects new ink on your skin. It conformed to the figures well, but the print quality was unacceptable. We continued to search for the right stuff.Some films were too thick, some too thin, some too sticky, and some not sticky enough. Then, in a Goldilocks moment, we found a printable film that was just right. We jumped in with both feet and embraced the Uni-Forms project. My wife, Christine, came up with the name. We immediately started mapping the surfaces of our miniatures to create patterns for them.Patterns, labels, highlights, and shading shown for the Backer figure and several NFL teams.Uni-Forms are made with a 50-micron self-adhesive film that’s thinner than a human hair. The pre-cut film panels expertly conform to 3D-molded football figures delivering amazingly realistic results without the time, expense, and skill required in custom painting. Shading and highlights give the figures depth and realism. We've also included uniform numbers in three different sizes for the front, back, and shoulders.If you're a tabletop gaming enthusiast, you know how fun and engaging it can be to create your own figures! We discovered that wrapping the figures using this new film is fun and rewarding. You develop a certain attachment to the players you've made!Images from the instructions showing steps involved in making Uni-Forms players. Over the past five months, we've been working hard behind the scenes on the designs for the first 64 home and away NFL uniforms. I'm happy to report they are finished and have been approved by the NFL. Each of the 5 film sheets are 3"x 3" in size with pre-cut patterns ready to lift out and apply.
Sheet A = Identifies the team, home/away, years in use, and either primary, alternate, Color Rush (NFL), or classic style. Film patterns to outfit 2 included Backer figures and some of the jersey back numbers.
Sheet B = Film patterns to outfit 2 Sprinter figures, the remainder of the jersey back numbers, and some of the jersey front numbers. 
Sheet C = Film patterns to outfit 2 Runner figures, plus the remainder of the jersey front numbers.
Sheet D = Film patterns to outfit 3 Lineman figures.
Sheet E = Film patterns to outfit 2 All Purpose figures, plus all shoulder numbers.
 

Primary home film sheets on top and away film sheets under them for all 32 NFL teams.
 
ImpactWith your backing, we can give every customer the choices they want! We're excited to provide a wide selection of authentic uniforms for every team! We have already completed the Cincinnati Bengals 2021 uniforms, and are looking forward to the Buccaneers “creamsicle” uniforms, the classic Seahawks, and the vintage Patriots in red jerseys with their Pat Patriot logo, to name a few!With Uni-Forms we can create, list, and categorize all the uniform designs the world of football has to offer--past, present, and future. Uni-Forms can be made for any football club -- professional, college, and even high school teams. For the NFL, we'll release not only the “primary” uniforms for each team, but their alternate, Color Rush, classic, and vintage styles as well.With your help, we'll create an incredible selection of teams from all eras to collect, customize, and coach. We'll also be able to license and develop a large number of NCAA college football teams.Bears, Broncos, Bengals, and Bills in primary home and away styles with their Uni-Forms on!You'll also be helping us move production home to the U.S. where we can make dynamic new products available in days, not months. We'll be able to solve the challenges cited earlier - keeping more items in stock, adding to our selection with hundreds of Uni-Forms styles, adding college football, and better serving our customers by being able to say YES! more often.This is a big deal for us -- and for the hobby -- so we hope you'll pre-order on IndieGoGo so that we can buy materials, equipment, and packaging ahead of our launch.If you like miniatures and football, or you’re already a fan of the hobby, your backing and support will give us the necessary capital to bring this project into the end zone and usher in an exciting new era of Electric Football!Risks
Our track record of performance over the last 9 years and our experience with tudorgames.com and our retailer partners should give you confidence that we can manage the logistics to ship your Perks. Also, officially licensed products are your guarantee of quality and authenticity.
If you're a Tudor Games customer, thanks for visiting our IndieGoGo campaign. We need your support to reach our goals! Please help us by pre-ordering Uni-Forms Perks on this site!
We do right by our customers and we keep our promises. We believe in transparency and proactive communications. We will respond in a timely manner to all comments and we’ll communicate often so you’ll always know where things stand. We're not very far from release. The concept is proven and the results are remarkable. We need your help!
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t be a Backer, but you're interested in what we’re doing, we’d love to hear from you! If you can share our campaign with friends or family members who you think may be interested, that would be amazing too! Thank you.

story:
Since producing 500 copies of MEGAcquire in 2012, I have had continual requests for more games. Therefore I have decided to try it again. MEGAcquire proved to be a fantastic game and in some corners of the world, it is difficult to get avid players of MEGAcquire to play the game of ACQUIRE again.

Below is a video that explains how to play MEGAcquire. Here are also two links to videos on YouTube that show actual game play of MEGAcquire complete with instructional and strategy tips. The game was filmed in two halves. Here is the first half and here is the second half of the game.

 

Here is a link to the MEGAcquire GOLD Game Components Page on the Acquisition Games Website and here is a link to the MEGAcquire GOLD Rules Booklet Page.

MEGAcquire GOLD is my next step in continuing the quest to expand Sid Sackson's magnificent ideas and get them onto as many gaming tables as possible. You can secure a new challenge based on an old, favorite, and familiar game for the price of $65 plus shipping to your location after production is complete. Not a cheap cardboard rendition of an icon, on which the pieces slide across the board, but a tough durable plastic edition with an expanded board and hexagon shaped tiles. Double the possibilities, double the fun, and an outcome undecided until the end.

We have made a few minor changes from the production run of MEGAcquire and this next production run of MEGAcquire GOLD. The money has been changed to prepaid debit cards and the denominations have been raised to 1, 5, 10, & 50 million. Who will become the first billionaire in MEGAcquire GOLD? The rule booklet has a new cover and included in the booklet is a sample game narration to help first time players and a Stock Price Extension Chart that is used to help calculate payouts when companies are bought out and at the end of the game. We have also enlarged the tile holders and redesigned the box insert for better storage. The company markers are being made in three different shapes to better designate the difference in their starting price value and to give them a 3D effect. The playing tiles will be gold. So as the board fills up during game play, it turns to gold! Most importantly, we have demanded a better process for printing the designations on the tiles. 

For more information please visit: www.acquisitiongames.com

About MEGAcquire GOLD

MEGAcquire GOLD is an exciting journey of strategy and luck, for three to six players, through the corporate world of building empires and wealth. Live in the world of fun and fortune as you maneuver to outwit your opponents. Build and merge companies while shrewdly buying, trading, and selling stocks to become the wealthiest player.

Each player builds companies by adding tiles as they increase wealth by purchasing stocks in these companies. Cash flow is obtained by selling majority and minority shares through mergers. It is not always prudent to have the most stock in the biggest company, if you can build and sell enough smaller companies to generate a large income. Many different strategies can be used to reach the pinnacle of the corporate world, but you will always need the “luck of the draw."

MEGAcquire GOLD will appeal to players of any age, who like the feeling of power that is acquired through achievement. It is recommended for ages 13 and up, but cannot be limited in age because of the early possession of business savvy that can be found in younger players. Average playing time is from 2-3 hours, but shorter time limits can be set.

MEGAcquire GOLD is a perfect learning tool to teach younger people a sense of how the world of investing works. It illustrates how investing in stocks can be very strategic but at the same time requires some luck. They learn how their wealth can grow as they build their companies and how their cash flow can increase by selling companies while subsequently using the profit to make more investments.

MEGAcquire GOLD is played on a 15" x 13" plastic board that contains 182 hexagon spaces with 182 corresponding hexagon tiles. (The hexagon shape allows six different ways to connect) For MEGAcquire GOLD, the board will be colored silver and the tiles will be colored gold. Therefore as the game progresses, it turns to gold. Each hexagon is labeled with a designation A-1 through N-13 and each tile has a corresponding designation for its' place on the board. Each player draws 12 tiles to start the game and then draws a replacement tile after each turn. The tiles are used to create and grow companies. 

While creating and growing these companies, the players buy, trade, and sell stocks in an attempt to become the wealthiest player. There are 14 different companies to choose from when building an empire, seven hotels and seven corporations. Each company has a different color Company Marker that represents the companies designation. The companies have different starting values that include low, medium, & high priced companies.

There are: Seven hotels: Luster (Red) & Teton (Yellow) are low priced, Arcadia (Dark Blue), Global (Brown), & Fanfare (Green) are medium priced, Krause (Teal) & Regal (Pink) are high priced. 

Seven corporations: Unity (Beige) & Solon (Gray) are low priced,  Watts (Purple), Helix (Orange), & Digital (Baby Blue) are medium priced, Quasar (Charcoal) & Physics (Burgundy) are high priced.

In the picture below, a playing tile is placed next to one of each size of the  Company Markers. The "small buildings," illustrated by the red "LH" marker for the Luster Hotel, are used to designate the lower priced companies. The "medium buildings," illustrated by the purple "WC" marker for the Watts Corporation, are used to designate the medium priced companies. The "large buildings," illustrated by the charcoal "QC" of the Quasar Corporation, are used to designate the high priced companies. Each marker will be colored to match the company it represents. 

There are 25 stock certificates for each company and when the supply has been purchased, there are no more stocks available unless a player trades some back to the bank when they are out of money or the stocks are returned through mergers.

For more information please visit: www.acquisitiongames.com

How To Play MEGAcquire GOLD

Players can play one tile per turn. When two hexagons are placed together they form a company. The player who places the tile that starts the company gets to chose what company they want from those that are available. The player then receives a free share of stock in that company as a founding bonus.

Players are allowed to purchase six stock certificates of any company on the board during their turns. By receiving the free share of stock, the player who starts the company always has control of keeping majority shareholder status in that company, unless they decide to purchase something else before they hold a "true majority". Since there are 25 stock certificates of each company, a true majority is attained when a player owns 13 shares. No other player can purchase more shares than the player who holds 13 shares.

Stock values increase as tiles are played on the respective companies. Information cards are provided to keep track of stock prices and shareholder bonuses. As the companies grow, larger companies merge with smaller companies. This is accomplished when a tile is played that connects two companies. The larger company always takes out the smaller company. If the companies are of equal size, before the merging tile is played, the player who plays this tile gets to decide which company will survive.

The players who hold first and second majority in the smaller company, at the time of the merger, receive bonuses. At this time, all players who hold stock in the smaller company can sell their stock for the current market value. They can also choose to keep their stock in hope that the company will open again. When a tile is played that merges more than one company, the companies are cashed out starting with the smallest company first.

Companies are considered "safe" when they reach 21 tiles. Safe means that they can't be taken over by a larger company and a safe company will remain on the board until the end of the game. Tiles that would connect two safe companies are turned over on their designated space on the board and a new tile is drawn. Companies can increase in value up to the level of 101 tiles.

Each player starts with 120M. Investing this money is based on the tiles in the players hand and the companies they can grow. When a player runs out of money they can, on their turn, trade stocks that they have purchased for other stocks that are more beneficial to their portfolio. Yet they can only trade enough stocks to purchase six stocks on a turn. Players can not trade stocks for cash.

A large amount of money can be generated by opening and selling small companies, which creates cash flow to reinvest. But conversely, a large wealth can be accumulated by holding majority in the larger companies. The winner needs the ideal mix of investing, and a little bit of luck, that provides the greatest wealth.

The Project of MEGAcquire GOLD

I made 500 units of the game MEGAcquire in 2012. Since that time, MEGAcquire has been sold in 48 different states in the U.S. plus Washington D.C. and in 18 different countries worldwide. Longtime ACQUIRE enthusiasts have been very positive and excited about the game. You can read some of their comments at: https://www.acquisitiongames.com/index.php/feedback

"You haven’t just built an expanded or larger version of Acquire, you have built the foundations of a better version of it. By moving to a hex grid, introducing alternative methods of gaining stock, and coming up with the pieces with different uses, you have already updated the rule set and game play to a more modern feel. Acquire is a great game but yours is better. This is not just a pumped up version of Acquire, nor an expansion of it, it is the rightful successor for the genre."

~ Beaverton, Oregon

Michael Spahitz of Board Game Manufacturing in Pahrump Nevada helped me to get MEGAcquire produced . His artwork and knowledge of how to get a game produced for a small time game dreamer have been extremely helpful. He has done some fantastic work making the necessary alterations to create the game of MEGAcquire GOLD.

Shipping Costs

MEGAcquire GOLD will ship by Priority Mail (2-3) days anywhere in the United States and will be charged according to your location. Each game has a shipping weight of seven pounds and my location is 98632.  I only charge the amount that the U.S. Post Office will charge for the package. No handling fees.

International customers can also go to the USPS website to calculate shipping at seven pounds per game. The two options for international shipping will be Priority Mail International and Priority Mail Express International.

Shipping will be invoiced at the end of the project when the games are at my location and ready to ship. An e-mail invoice will be sent at that time. Shipping costs will be determined by the amount of games purchased and the location of the destination. Games will be shipped when payment for shipping is received. If you have any questions, please contact us at the e-mail address below.

Thank you;

Lloyd T. Solon

Contact us at: megacquire@hotmail.com

At this time, all players who hold stock in the smaller company can sell their stock for the current market value. They can also choose to keep their stock in hope that the company will open again. When a tile is played that merges more than one company, the companies are cashed out starting with the smallest company first.Companies are considered "safe" when they reach 21 tiles. Safe means that they can't be taken over by a larger company and a safe company will remain on the board until the end of the game. Tiles that would connect two safe companies are turned over on their designated space on the board and a new tile is drawn. Companies can increase in value up to the level of 101 tiles.Each player starts with 120M. Investing this money is based on the tiles in the players hand and the companies they can grow. When a player runs out of money they can, on their turn, trade stocks that they have purchased for other stocks that are more beneficial to their portfolio. Yet they can only trade enough stocks to purchase six stocks on a turn. Players can not trade stocks for cash.A large amount of money can be generated by opening and selling small companies, which creates cash flow to reinvest. But conversely, a large wealth can be accumulated by holding majority in the larger companies. The winner needs the ideal mix of investing, and a little bit of luck, that provides the greatest wealth.The Project of MEGAcquire GOLDI made 500 units of the game MEGAcquire in 2012. Since that time, MEGAcquire has been sold in 48 different states in the U.S. plus Washington D.C. and in 18 different countries worldwide. Longtime ACQUIRE enthusiasts have been very positive and excited about the game. You can read some of their comments at: https://www.acquisitiongames.com/index.php/feedback"You haven’t just built an expanded or larger version of Acquire, you have built the foundations of a better version of it. By moving to a hex grid, introducing alternative methods of gaining stock, and coming up with the pieces with different uses, you have already updated the rule set and game play to a more modern feel. Acquire is a great game but yours is better. This is not just a pumped up version of Acquire, nor an expansion of it, it is the rightful successor for the genre."~ Beaverton, OregonMichael Spahitz of Board Game Manufacturing in Pahrump Nevada helped me to get MEGAcquire produced . His artwork and knowledge of how to get a game produced for a small time game dreamer have been extremely helpful. He has done some fantastic work making the necessary alterations to create the game of MEGAcquire GOLD.Shipping CostsMEGAcquire GOLD will ship by Priority Mail (2-3) days anywhere in the United States and will be charged according to your location. Each game has a shipping weight of seven pounds and my location is 98632.  I only charge the amount that the U.S. Post Office will charge for the package. No handling fees.International customers can also go to the USPS website to calculate shipping at seven pounds per game. The two options for international shipping will be Priority Mail International and Priority Mail Express International.Shipping will be invoiced at the end of the project when the games are at my location and ready to ship. An e-mail invoice will be sent at that time. Shipping costs will be determined by the amount of games purchased and the location of the destination. Games will be shipped when payment for shipping is received. If you have any questions, please contact us at the e-mail address below.Thank you;Lloyd T. SolonContact us at: megacquire@hotmail.com

story:
Short Summary

Evolved Tabletop Games' vision is to create cost-effective 3D modular terrain which is immersive and compatible with a variety of tabletop games.

Evolved Tabletop Games started when we were dissatisfied of our missions being limited by one or two playmats and the limited layouts they provided. We were also struggling to be immersed in the narrative when we were using flat, 2D designs to portray hills & valleys.

Our founder is a passionate tabletop gamer who plays Warhammer 40k and Dungeons & Dragons and wanted to create immersive and thematic environment which could be incorporated into the games he played. Thus, our first project was born.

This project focuses on 3D printable, highly detailed modular battlefields, which opens the possibility of any thematic narrative. The modular battlefield can even be used in your display cabinets to complement your miniatures. The best part is you can print as much or as little as you need!

These tiles can be used as is, or be painted to suit the world's that your games are set, or lands that your miniatures inhabit.

After this campaign is concluded we hope to make other themes such as cities, deserts and temples, which will be able to combine with this project's terrain and blend together.

Free Sample tile to test for yourself

 

PERK ITEMS

We have had a successful Kickstarter campaign and wanted to continue what we had with Kickstarter so if you want any more information then feel free to check out our Kickstarter page: 

www.kickstarter.com/projects/evolvedgamesstudio/3d-printable-modular-battlefield

 

Pledge Tier 1 

This perk level will give you all ground level modular tiles only.
31+ .stl files included in pledge tier 1 and all the Stretch goals that the Tier 1 got in our Kickstarter campaign.

INCLUDES:
  • All ground level (.stl) modular tiles only
  • All ground level stretch goals

Examples: A

Examples: B

Pledge Tier 2 

Short cliffs and hills for more terrain/ narrative options.
200+ .stl files included in pledge tier 2 and all the Stretch goals that the Tier 2 got in our Kickstarter campaign.

INCLUDES:

  • All of Tier 1 pledge (.stl files)
  • All of Tier 1 - stretch goals (.stl) files
  • All short cliffs and hill (.stl) files
  • All short cliffs and hill - stretch goals (.stl) files
Examples: A
Examples: B
5 unique Cliff faces

 

Pledge Tier 3

All in pledge - Everything.
220+ .stl files included in pledge tier 3 and  all the Stretch goals that the Tier 3 got in our Kickstarter campaign.

INCLUDES:

  • All of Tier 1 pledge (.stl files)
  • Tier 1 - stretch goals (.stl) files
  • All of Tier 2 Pledge (.stl) files
  • Tier 2 - stretch goals (.stl) files
  • Tier 3: Taller cliffs tiles (.stl) files
  • Tier 3 - stretch goals (.stl) files
Examples: A
Examples: B

5 unique Cliff faces

 

Trenches which are for Tier 2+3

In our original Kickstarter it was a stretch goal which was achieved and unlocked. We are very proud of these trenches and we hope you enjoy them too. 

NOTE! These trenches will be apart of both 2+3 perk (pledge 2+3) 

Border and Card holders for all perks 1, 2, 3

Another stretch goal that was achieved and is apart of all perks levels but will be sorted by the level you choose eg, you wont get 2,3 if you went for pledge 1 and if you selected perk 2 you will get 1 and 2 borders etc.

Making your dice stay on the board and your board look more professional! 

 

Dimensions

 

Stretch goals that have been unlocked!

What you get for contributing

  • All the .STL files for your chosen tier
  • Access to all our unlocked stretch goals for your chosen tier from our Kickstarter Campaign
  • Our gratitude and thanks!
  • Backer/Contributor perks eg. the first to be notified on new and upcoming products/campaigns!

 

What we get from your contribution

  • Computer up grades to create future products
  • Website hosting and domain name.
  • We want to get into physical production using resin casting (polyurethane)
    • New resin 3D printer
    • polyurethane
    • packaging

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the word
  • Follow us and recommend us on Social Media:
    • Facebook Page
    • Instagram: @evovledtabletopgames

 

 

Same as our original Kickstarters TERMS AND CONDITIONS

When you contribute to this campaign, you will receive STL files for the tiles as per your selected pledge. The pledge files will be delivered BEFORE January 20th 2021, with successful stretch goals arriving later.

 

You can print these files for your personal use, but you may not sell the printed items or distribute the digital 3D tiles commercially. We are happy for you to print tiles for your friends and club members. You can't go into business selling the tiles for profit, or publicly advertise that you print and sell the tiles.

 

Grass or paints are not included in this campaign, these are bought from a 3rd party source for display purposes.

 

It is up to you to download the files after they have been released and save them somewhere safe as the files will be accessible for up to 12 months before they removed from the cloud. You are able to reach out to us if you have any problems.

At this stage there will be no pledge manager but is subject to change.

 

Risks and challenges

This is Evolved tabletop Games first indiegogo Indemand, this will be a learning campaign and how the Indemand system works but while creating these designs we have been testing them and making sure it works straight of the printer with out to many printer settings changes.

DIGITAL CONTENT: All of the files will be broken down into individual files, so that you can choose how you want to print them, but it's up to you to get the most out of your 3D printer for the files. All of the files are going to be supplied in STL format.

The Images shown on the campaign page are just for visualisation and although they may come very close, they may not be an exact representation of the final design or printed model. Make sure you look at the printed pictures of the terrain.

We reserve the right to alter any of the models shown, at any time, before delivery, with the intent of improving the design, or efficiency of production.

There are no risks in the delivery of the files, they will be sent to you in a link using the Indiegogo Indemand system, as soon as the files are ready to send (expected before January 20th 2021). Stretch goals  from Kickstarters campaign completed after the original files have been sent out, and be delivered as quickly as possible.

Its up to you to run the STL files though your printers software and set your printers settings for what material you are using.

story:
For the True Crime/Horror Lover

This game is a culmination of the love that I have for card games, role playing games, true crime and horror. My interest in killers, of all kinds, started at a young age. I grew up just outside Philadelphia and my dad had so many stories to tell. His dealings with Angelo Bruno (head of the Philly Mob), meeting Charles Manson, to leading us to believe that my childhood home was owned by Jeffrey Dahmer's uncle. There has always been one question that I have always wanted to understand: What is the one thing that causes someone to cross the line and become a killer? Many of us fit the common classification, but never cross the line...why? So as I have dug in and really researched these horrific stories I found the passion to create this game.

It is not only a card game, but a compendium of killers that you may/may not know. This has always driven my own curiosity to learn and discover more. As we continue to create expansions and grow the list of killers included it becomes a collectible trading card game.

 

 

The Cold Hard Facts

Killers - the card game is a collectible card game currently featuring 25 unique killer cards, 25 victim cards, and 4 unique scenario cards for the base game. The Organized Crime and World of Serial Killers Expansions adds an additional 140 unique killers, 40 weapons, 20 victim and 20 scenario cards to the game.

The base game is for 2-4+ players, but will increase with expansions.

To win the game be the player that reaches 10 kills first or has the last killer standing.

We are looking to hit our funding goal of $5000 to fulfill the quality manufacturing, production of new cards, and to take care of our legal needs. This will also enable us the ability to have some games in stock so we can continue sharing the fun at some of the local expos that we will be attending (HAH, Louisville - Horrorhound, Cincinnati - Dark History Con, Chicago)

In addition to the perks that we are already offering we will have some amazing stretch goals:

  • $7,500 - Upgraded Thick Tokens (from shards to chit board)
  • $10,000 - Custom Evidence Die
  • $12,000 - Custom Long Box to hold all cards

Estimated shipping costs for Base Game, Add-ons, and Stretch Goals (up to 10lb package)

  • United States - $10 - 18 (most states) $20 - 25 (Hawaii & Alaska)
  • Rest of the World - $29 - 40 (estimated)
    • NOTE these are rough estimated and accurate costs will be calculated after the campaign judging by your actual address.
    • NOTE we DO NOT cover customs or taxes

         

             

 

The Verdict

Since we have the option of a "Flexible" campaign we will be able to fulfill any orders that come in. So if you are a backer and are generous enough to support our amazing campaign, we will have the funds to fulfill any orders that are placed and the included perks. 

                     

                     

 

Slash Your Way to the Top

                                                     
  • Shuffle & Deal 5 Killer cards to each player or choose what 5 killers you want to play with (only one of each unique killer can be used each game)
  • Shuffle Victim & Scenario Cards and place in the middle of the play area
  • Decide who will be rolling for the Police (or share the responsibility)
  • Roll to see who goes first
  • That player will draw a Victim Card
    • Victim Card: place it in middle of the play area (Killers that kill within their specialty get a bonus point for each roll)
    • Scenario Card: follow directions on card
  • Choose which killer will attempt an abduction and if it will be a charisma or brutality abduction. Roll Dice and add your charisma or brutality points. 
    • Victim will either be abducted or get away, you may leave evidence
    • If evidence is left, complete an evidence roll
  • If Victim is abducted attempt a kill. Roll dice and add brutality points.
    • Victim with either be killed or get away, you may leave evidence
    • If evidence is left, complete an evidence roll
    • If Victim is killed, place that Victim under that killer
  • Next person takes their turn
  • When all the turns are completed the Police have the chance to search for evidence or apprehend a killer who has 3 pieces of evidence against them found.
    • Searching for evidence: Dice roll minus killers intelligence points determines if evidence is found
    • Apprehending a killer: 3 evidence tokens must be found - Dice roll minus Elusive points determine if killer is apprehended. If killer is apprehended you lose all kills that killer has accrued. 
  • First player to 10 kills or the player who has the last killer standing wins.

Specialty - Charisma/Brutality/Intelligence/Elusive

 

                         

 

Be Our Lookout

We know that not everyone can contribute, however we appreciate all the support, help, and love from this amazing community. Here is how you can still help:

  • Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/killerstcg
  • Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/killerstcg/
  • Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/killerstcg
  • Share this campaign everywhere using "Share This Project"

If Victim is abducted attempt a kill. Roll dice and add brutality points.
Victim with either be killed or get away, you may leave evidence
If evidence is left, complete an evidence roll
If Victim is killed, place that Victim under that killer

Be Our Lookout
We know that not everyone can contribute, however we appreciate all the support, help, and love from this amazing community. Here is how you can still help:

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/killerstcg

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/killerstcg/

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/killerstcg

Share this campaign everywhere using "Share This Project"

story:
RUST : THE AFTERWORLD (abbreviated R:TA) is the innovative card game created by Daniele Visentin and Max Pietricola whose previous editions have been succesfully funded via Kickstarter in April 2019 and May 2021. And now it's back in this new amazing EXTENDED EDITION just for you, for a limited time only.  Also with FREE SHIPPING on almost all worldwide destinations (check shipping paragraph below).

PLEASE NOTE - this game edition is INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE. There won't be retail release and it is intended only for IGG backers. Furthermore there will be NO LATE PLEDGES nor Pledge Upgrades available (except for Shipping Upgrades) after the present campaign is ended. So: don't miss this chance, it's now or never!

 

R:TA belongs to a completely new kind of game, we call it RolePlaying Card Game (or RPCG). It's an immersive experience with RPG's elements, supercool artworks by  world-famous artists (including John Avon, Richard Kane Ferguson, Drew Tucker and Paolo Parente), innovative mechanics and a sophisticated game system about survival. And it's unbelievably fun to play!

R:TA is set in a near future, a prophetic future. A future in which the world has been devastated by a terrible Total War. And from the ashes of war a dreadful disease spread out, a plague which affects both men and machines: it is called RUST.

In this rotten, shattered AfterWorld, humanity has been decimated... and the  survivors have gathered into 4 tribes, to the four corners of the Earth, fighting each others for survival. Among  the survivors, there are some chosen ones, a few special individuals  who seem to be immune to the plague and who soon become heroes for their  peoples.

They are called: the Masters. And you, as a player, will be one of them!

The below ADD-ONS are additional and totally optional contents, but they are meant to enrich the gaming experience. Furthermore all the PROMO CARDS included in these bundles will be printed in Limited Edition, and represent a unique opportunity to boost your R:TA collection.

Among the available ADD-ONS there are some new acquaintances, as the never-before-seen INDIEGOGO exclusive Master Bundle, with many useful contents like the new Standees which makes every master's life much easier.

And below you will find also some classics like the most-beloved Wastelands Kit, which is mainly a special set of cards that allow you to enjoy a new game variant... precisely called Wastelands Mode. As a matter of fact the Wastelands Kit substantially enlarges the playground and adds tons of new adventures to the basic R:TA set, pointing out the immense potential of the game also on a boardgaming perspective and offering the players a totally new and expanded gaming experience. Furthermore the kit also adds another long-awaited feature: gameplay in SOLO MODE! You can check the WIP Quickstart Guide of the Wastelands Kit HERE.

Just add any of the ADD-ONS (or all of them) to your perk before check out!

 

A very special video in which Italian reviewer JeruS gives you an overview of the new Wastelands Kit. Check it out to discover more...

A Stretch Goal is an additional goal set for a fundraising campaign, in case the initial funding target is overcome... and we have some  pretty amazing Stretch Goals here to be unlocked, each one with terrific additional perks!

As you can see below our Stretch Goals consist mostly in brand new limited edition Premium Cards but we included also some very special surprises too, like the first official set of R:TA MASTER MINIATURES!!! If unlocked, every supporter of this campaign that will pledge for the Extended Edition or superior perk tier (and exceptionally also including veteran backers of our previous campaign who already pledged for equivalent game sets) will have the Standees of his/her Master Bundle replaced by four new and original resin minis. It's a unique and never-before-seen upgrade for the game, not to be missed...

Once again: the below items are INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE and not meant to be found anywhere else after the end of this campaign. When unlocked they are a special gift for ALL THE BACKERS that will support us pledging for most of the perk tiers (check the Perk buttons on top of this page). Don’t  let them slip out and help us spread the news: the more we are, the more we unlock!

All the unlocked Stretch Goals will be automatically added to your perks, if eligible, at no further expense. Check them all here below... and get ready for the AfterWorld!

Follow our social media pages and unlock additional goals just for being part of our Tribe. To partecipate you only need to follow our Instagram and Facebook pages linked below and contribute for at least a Perk tier before the end of this campaign. Share the news with your friends!

  • If we reach 4000 followers on Instagram: a foldable paper mini-playmat for ALL THE BACKERS, really handy especially for R:TA beginners. 
  • If we reach 1000 likes on our Facebook page we will randomly pick 10 among our backers and they will get a Limited Edition poster (A3 format) by John Avon! 

Ok, so… why should you choose R:TA in the huge sea of nowadays tabletop games?! Well, here below a few reasons that may help you decide why it's worth supporting our little incredibly-awesome independent creation!

  1. It's an extremely fast game. A match usually lasts about 15 minutes in Basic Mode (about 30 minutes with the Advanced Rules… and up to 60 minutes in Wastelands Mode), but the real edge of the game is its pace: run over your opponent withouth leaving him/her time to breathe. R:TA has been designed with the aim to simulate the passing of days and let you feel the pressure of surviving an hostile environment.
  2.  It's unlike anything you've ever tried before. And why? Because there are no turns. A completely original game system that synthesize the best RPGs and boardgames elements into one-of-a-kind survival experience in which players substantially play simultaneously.
  3.  It is easy to learn. But, at the same time, it is strategic:  and this is because the game system is intuitive and flexible... it's a game in which every choice you make is affected by need and by the choices of the other players. All the efforts of our creative team have been aimed at improving every single detail (from wording to cards layouts) in order to make the gaming experience the more immediate and enjoyable is possible. But, the more you dig into it, the more you will discover it's a game which offers endless possibilities... as we always say: easy to learn, hard to master! 
  4. It is IMMERSIVE. It's not just about sitting down and casting spells and monsters against your opponents, like you do in almost any other card game. In R:TA you can explore and conquer the world around you. You can make alliances with other survivors and recruit them. You can search for treasures or forge weapons with which to crush your enemies. It is completely immersive, since the protagonist is YOU within this rotten and decaying universe. And it's not a game in which the only goal is winning... the goal, in R:TA, is to stay alive in a hostile world. One of the big limitations of standard role-playing games is that you have to follow a story... it's like walking on a fixed track. In R:TA it's you who create the story. Your story and the history of your world, according to the choices you make, game after game. And by progressing through your own story you earn experience and status, leveling-up and learning new skills which will help you shape your doom.
  5. It's a lot of fun. There is no way we can really tell you, and anyway you would not believe it... you just have to give it a try. You can play R:TA in classic two players mode, one versus one... or with all your friends, up to 8 players in various different modes. Even in SOLO gameplay, thanks to the Wastelands Kit (check the ADD-ONS section). But the feature we really want to point out is its endless replayability. What the creators (Daniele Visentin and Max Pietricola) wanted to achieve was a game where players would never play twice the same match... and nobody expected it would have worked out so amazingly well!
  6. It's a true work of Art! We have worked hard with the best illustrators and designers out there and we put great efforts in creating suggestive lore and background for the game. The result is a really amazing experience on both the gaming and artistic side. You can check on our Instagram page almost all the cards and artworks of which R:TA is composed by following this LINK.
  7. It's an high quality and 100% eco-friendly product. This is a really important point for us... especially considering the subject matter of the game itself! Our playing cards are printed on a special 330 gr/sqm triplex paper of casino quality, assuring zero transparency, easy to shuffle and resistant to worn-out. They are soooo cool, not even comparable to the average gaming cards. BUT the high quality of the product does not prevent us from realizing a 100% eco-friendly game, with the bare minimum quantity of plastic materials and only in re-usable forms. Also, we work with factories entirely powered by photovoltaics with the most modern and sophisticated technologies of printing and packaging and we are proud to say that our game is 100% Made in Italy!
  8. It's a game we've created for you. The biggest limitation of many other card games is that they are "collectible" card games. R:TA is not, because there is no rarity of cards at all. And we will continue to expand it with new expansion sets (the first one called THE KINGDOM coming really soon) and packages for advanced players, but they will never be randomly combined. The player will always know what he/she is buying. We want people to play R:TA and have fun, we want tournaments to be run. And we are also giving life to an official championship, without all those elements that make other games so frustrating. We DO NOT want people to spend tons of  money just to build a deck that will be useless after a few months. Because we are not one of those greedy multinational companies: we are players creating a game for players.

“Year 2030. After the Total War a terrible plague came out. They called it RUST.”

In R:TA you are a Master, a very special individual who is at the head of one of the four tribes of Survivors that populate what remains of the Earth. Both you and your opponent(s) will start the game with a Stockpile of 20 resources, which is all you have to survive in the AfterWorld. Purpose of the game is to gain undisputed supremacy or reduce your opponent’s Stockpile to zero: the last of you who remains on the playground with still available resources is the winner of the match!

The above sounds cool? Go on: you can find the FREE downloadable rulesheets (for both BEGINNERS and ADVANCED players) on our official website. Click the banner here below!

In addition you can also check the How To Play video by Claudio Paola, who gives a really cool overview of the game with an entire gameplay session (check the Reviews chapter below). And don't forget to visit our INSTAGRAM and FACEBOOK  pages for having a look at tons of pictures, spoilers, decklists and much more...

There is a big community out there that is already having fun with R:TA and is waiting for you to come join the Tribe! Take a look at what reviewers say about the game...

 

 

 

 As you already know for this campaign we offer FREE STANDARD SHIPPING to almost all destinations worldwide. To the remaining ones - meaning those countries which are most distant from our shipping facilities or hardly reachable due to emergency situations - will be applied just a very minimum contribution (max. 5 euros) before finalizing the pledge, in order to support our endeavours.

All of your rewards will be shipped via Standard International method (equivalent to First-Class Mail USPS) which has proved a really good and reliable service so far, according to our previous experiences. However this shipping mode doesn't provide any kind of tracking and it is fully at backer's risk, in case of loss or damages.

If you want to be completely carefree you can always upgrade to a faster and 100% secure solution via TRACKED CARRIER. But you don't have to worry about this right now: we will collect the Shipping Upgrades after the campaign ends, using PayPal. We'll send all the backers a survey (some 3/5 months from now) asking if you are good with the Free Standard Shipping or if you want to upgrade to the Tracked one. So, you have plenty of time to decide!

In the meantime, you can have a look at the chart here below to get an idea of how much tracked shipping to your location should cost. Keep in mind these are just estimates and that accurate costs will be calculated after the campaign is ended. This is so we can be fair to all our backers as shipping is rarely one-size-fits-all, and also because we may obtain a better quote with a considerable cost reduction from our fulfillment service once we have actual numbers to show.

We are based in Italy but we partnered with international fulfillment/shipping services, so this project is EU/UK-FRIENDLY, US-FRIENDLY, CANADA-FRIENDLY and AUSTRALIA-FRIENDLY... meaning that all the backers from these locations won't have any import fee when getting the reward. In addition, we will definitely assist all our supporters from anywhere else in  the world, providing the best possible option in order to have the rewards delivered without any charge or issue. For any further question you can  contact us directly at: info@rusttheafterworld.com

We please ask all the backers living in remote places (i.e. islands,  war-zones, quarantined areas etc.) to get in touch prior to make any pledge so we can  guide you and offer a customized solution.

The game will be printed only in ENGLISH language. However the rulesheet is already availabe also in ITALIAN on our official site www.rusttheafterworld.com.

Want it translated also in other languages? Let us know, and if we reach at least 100 pledges from your country we will more than glad to work on it!

Are you an event organizer or do you run a store and want to offer your playing community official R:TA sanctioned tournaments as part of our upcoming international Championship? Get in touch with us and become our partner, we can offer special discounts on multiple pledges and extra benefits too!

What are you waiting for?! Make your players happy and join our network today!

 

Our motto is: "we are players creating a game for players"... but we are experienced professionals too. Click on the pictures here below to discover a little more about the talented men and women behind RUST : THE AFTERWORLD.

 

Check this classic video here below for an insight on how R:TA has been originally created by its authors...

The major risk for a young independent company like ours is the unforeseen. Said so, the present one is our third crowdfunding campaign (after the successful ones of April 2019 and May 2021 on Kickstarter) and we are not newbies anymore... :)

The game is already complete in all its parts. The main core of R:TA has been enjoyed by tons of backers from all over the world in the last two years, and is ready to be reprinted. Also, as you may already know, this is actually a “side campaign” (or otherwise a complementary one), meaning that the actual production process is already in an advanced stage after our previous crowdfunding campaign (check here) and all the perks of the present IGG will converge in tail of that same printing batch. In other words: risks are lowered almost to zero since the main elements of the game are already in actual production phase. And all the brand new IGG exclusive will be finalized soon as well!

The artists and collaborators we have involved in this project are talented professionals. We are all working really hard to bring you the best possible gaming experience within the date of delivery. And also the partners we have chosen to be entrusted with the printing and delivery process are international companies, so we are confident this amazing adventure will be accomplished without any issue at all.

Please note that this is not a pre-order and the final product might slightly change in the process or get delayed. But be sure we are committed to create the best possible experience for the players and every choice we make will only be aimed at improving the standard of the final product.

Help us out by sharing our campaign so we can all enjoy playing RUST : THE AFTERWORLD together!

There won't be retail release and it is intended only for IGG backers. Furthermore there will be NO LATE PLEDGES nor Pledge Upgrades available (except for Shipping Upgrades) after the present campaign is ended. So: don't miss this chance, it's now or never! R:TA belongs to a completely new kind of game, we call it RolePlaying Card Game (or RPCG). And it's unbelievably fun to play!R:TA is set in a near future, a prophetic future. A future in which the world has been devastated by a terrible Total War. And from the ashes of war a dreadful disease spread out, a plague which affects both men and machines: it is called RUST.In this rotten, shattered AfterWorld, humanity has been decimated... and the  survivors have gathered into 4 tribes, to the four corners of the Earth, fighting each others for survival. Among  the survivors, there are some chosen ones, a few special individuals  who seem to be immune to the plague and who soon become heroes for their  peoples.They are called: the Masters. And you, as a player, will be one of them!The below ADD-ONS are additional and totally optional contents, but they are meant to enrich the gaming experience. Furthermore all the PROMO CARDS included in these bundles will be printed in Limited Edition, and represent a unique opportunity to boost your R:TA collection.Among the available ADD-ONS there are some new acquaintances, as the never-before-seen INDIEGOGO exclusive Master Bundle, with many useful contents like the new Standees which makes every master's life much easier.And below you will find also some classics like the most-beloved Wastelands Kit, which is mainly a special set of cards that allow you to enjoy a new game variant... precisely called Wastelands Mode. As a matter of fact the Wastelands Kit substantially enlarges the playground and adds tons of new adventures to the basic R:TA set, pointing out the immense potential of the game also on a boardgaming perspective and offering the players a totally new and expanded gaming experience. Furthermore the kit also adds another long-awaited feature: gameplay in SOLO MODE! You can check the WIP Quickstart Guide of the Wastelands Kit HERE.Just add any of the ADD-ONS (or all of them) to your perk before check out! A very special video in which Italian reviewer JeruS gives you an overview of the new Wastelands Kit. Check it out to discover more...A Stretch Goal is an additional goal set for a fundraising campaign, in case the initial funding target is overcome... and we have some  pretty amazing Stretch Goals here to be unlocked, each one with terrific additional perks!As you can see below our Stretch Goals consist mostly in brand new limited edition Premium Cards but we included also some very special surprises too, like the first official set of R:TA MASTER MINIATURES!!! If unlocked, every supporter of this campaign that will pledge for the Extended Edition or superior perk tier (and exceptionally also including veteran backers of our previous campaign who already pledged for equivalent game sets) will have the Standees of his/her Master Bundle replaced by four new and original resin minis. When unlocked they are a special gift for ALL THE BACKERS that will support us pledging for most of the perk tiers (check the Perk buttons on top of this page). story:
Battle fearsome beasts. Parlay with pirates. Solve mysteries. Push back the apocalypse. 

The Deck of Many Quests is a tool for TTRPG Game Masters and Adventurers alike. Think Cards Against Humanity meets Dungeons & Dragons, minus the bathroom humor. We've created this deck to provide you nearly limitless inspiration for quickly and easily building your own adventures. Inside this box are over 200,000 unique quests.

The Deck of Many Quests is designed to be system-agnostic. It doesn't matter if you're playing Dungeons & Dragons, Pathfinder, Dungeon World, or any other fantasy tabletop roleplaying game—we're here to inspire you. There are no additional systems or rules to learn, so you can start creating your own adventures in no time.

So how does it work? Read on to find out!

Quest Cards are the heart of The Deck of Many Quests. There are 50 in total, detailing adventures from simple fetch quests to saving the world from the apocalypse!

It all starts with a quest card, which details the challenge you set forth upon. In the description are places for creatures and items. Draw the necessary cards to fill out your quest!

Once you have a quest in hand, draw the necessary number of Creature Cards and Item Cards to fill out its description. There are 75 of each to choose from!

Creature cards fill your quests with deadly foes, bitter rivals, and helpful allies. Will your contact be a family of gnomes or an all-powerful lich?

Item cards provide you with treasure to strive for, and tools to survive. Everything from a mundane bag of beans to the game changing Robe of the Tesseract!

Some of your results may seem nonsensical at first. Why would a cat-sized dragon be the mayor of a town, after all? In those cases, you can either draw different cards or take it as a world-building opportunity and make sense of it all!

Every card in The Deck of Many Quests has a star-rating. These ratings indicate how difficult a quest is, how much threat a creature can pose, and how rare or game-affecting an item can be. 

Feel free to separate your cards by star-rating to provide a leveled experience, or mix-and-match for interesting and unpredictable results!

No matter what fantasy tabletop roleplaying game you run, The Deck of Many Quests will be a valuable tool in your storytelling arsenal. Create unique quests and adventures on the fly, and delight your players to no end. 

It's not enough for us to tell you about the cards, and that we have 200 of them in every deck. You need to see them, too! Below is a selection of some of our favorite cards from the deck. There is one card of each kind from each star rating to give you an idea of what sorts of adventures, creatures, and items await you in this deck!

This selection of fifteen cards gives an idea of what's in store for you in the full deck!
