story:
GoDice is the “Kindle” of board games - A slick, compact and cool (physical) connected dice set, with TONS of quality content for everyone: family games, bar games, educational games, fun games, and so much more.
 

 

The data from the GoDice syncs immediately to the app. Make your moves , tap your decisions, and watch the score rise in real time. Papers, score sheets and writing are replaced with a cool digital experience! Complex RPG calculations (multiple dice and battles) are done instantly and automatically -  So you can enjoy the fun, luck, and strategic elements of the games.

 

 

GoDice transforms screens into a fun and social "board" game!  It turns screen time into quality time.  Play with your friends online, or round up a group of friends and family to get started (when screens are involved, the younger generation will gladly join the party). GoDice brings people to play TOGETHER. 


The internal sensors enable accurate orientation measurements and real-time sync with the application. By that, more advanced and complex (polyhedral) dice shapes can be configured and tracked using the same GoDice's die.

Such dice are commonly used in many board games, Role Playing Games (DnD etc.), Math games etc. Now with GoDice (and its open API), creators can "dress up" the dice, configure it, and connect to their own applications.
 


 

GoDice comes with customized designed shells of D20 and D24 (Dice with 20 and 24 faces)! These two generic shapes cover ALL common dice set.
 

 

Let your imagination run and let GoDice do the calculating. Focus on how to beat those monsters instead of trying to sum up 12+14+6+3+5+3 +...
 

 

 

GoDice is the Kindle of board games, the Tesla of Role Playing Games. It’s a bundle of tons of quality content for everyone: family games, bar games, educational games, and Role Playing Games 

The app comes, out-of-the-box, with many games as well as an open API, so you can employ GoDice for any imaginable game, or even create any game you can imagine.   

 

GoDice app includes the most popular dice games. The app is what elevates the games from an out of touch old timey idea into the 2010’s, enticing the younger generation to participate and engage

 

Yatzy is one of the most popular dice games in the world. With more than 100 million players, it's guaranteed fun time with friends and family. GoDice takes Yatzy to the next level with interactive gameplay. It even gives you tips on how to become a better player.

 

The classic poker dice game is now connected. The 5 smart dice simulate a playing-card deck (top six cards). Each player strives to get the best hand, while GoDice keeps track of your scores. May the flop be with you!

 

Farkle, also known as 5,000, 10,000, Zilch, and many more names, is a well-loved dice game. It's fun, fast-paced and utilizes math and probability skills- making it a perfect game to play with friends and family. *Only available in 6-dice packs*

 

A game once played by kings, Ludo is 1500 years old game. It's a strategy board game that will now become a Game-Night favorite for you and your kids. *Only available in 6-dice packs*  

 

 

Get information like: trend score overtime, average score, games win and losses, game time, power of your toss and number of turns 

Get tips on how to optimize your gameplay. Which dice should you keep? Which dice should you throw? What category should you choose? How can you increase your chances of winning? GoDice will help you make smarter decisions!.  

Create as many groups as you’d like, and switch between them- the GoDice app will keep track of all your different stats. Whether you play a quick game of Yatzy at your oﬃce or enjoy a game night with your family, the app will track your stats for each group at any time.      

 The GoDice silky and compact carrying case doubles as a supercapacitor charging station. It weighs only 28 grams, and supports ultra-fast charging. 10 seconds charge time = 1 hour of gameplay

The GoDice compact and versatile stand will conveniently prop up any phone or tablet (no matter the make or model) to make your game night even more enjoyable. Use the GoDice cup for easy rolling, you will quickly find out that the noise the dice make inside this cup is part of the fun and you will not be able to leave it behind…

We’re magic-obsessed problem-solvers who have been putting tiny computers inside tiny devices for quite some time.

In the last few years, we've developed, manufactured and sold a number of smart connected toys worldwide. Last year, we launched GoCube, and finished our crowdfunding campaign with over 11k happy backers and above $1.1M in funding.

 

After a successful campaign and great feedback from our backers, we've decided to take on a smaller cube: a dice.

We’ve spent the last few months testing and finalizing designs, and we’re thrilled to finally be able to share GoDice with you all :)

 

100,000,000 people play Yatzy every year, using over a billion papers a year. These are 60,000 trees that could be saved by using GoDice (and that's for Yatzy only). 60,000 TREES per year! GoDice, GoGreen!

International Backers: We will ship GoCube worldwide via trackable post. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, handling, fees and taxes applicable to your region, for more info check the FAQ

GoDice is a product of tireless engineering and tweaking by Particula, a company focuses on developing Smart Toys and products, powered by sensors, processing capabilities, ultra-low power and wireless connectivity.

 

After many long months of trying different setups, finalizing designs, and endless testing, we can not be any prouder to make GoDice available to anyone, anywhere.

 

We surprised you before with an amazing product, the GoCube, that has earned raving reviews and amazing PR worldwide. We are here to provide you with the same amazing, unforgettable experience, this time with a smaller cube, the dice.

 

 

 Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ

story:
Summary

Behold! The Fabulous Pillar-Guardians. Our glorious overlord's companions, hand crafted renderings made oiled flesh. Whether you want them to lead your army on the battlefield or you just want to own them to caress their quivering abs, this is the campaign for you. The collection consists of four, lovingly crafted miniatures in Heroic 28mm scale. Perfect as a standalone collection, but they'll also slide sensually into your existing tabletop army. 3d print files (.stl) will also be available for those who desire larger scales. The Fabulous Watchers are instantly recognizable in their 'bizarre' poses. They are all highly detailed and each come with their own unique base. They come unpainted and ready to feel the soft caress of your paintbrush. Myes. So what are you waiting for? Press that button to back this project. The avatars of the emperor's experimental phase in 520AD are ready to join your forces.

 

What you get

There are currently 4 sculpted models and more to come with further support. They will be available as physical unpainted pewter miniatures in heroic 28mm scale and as 3d printable .stl files for those who want them in larger scale. Note that the .stl files will come later, approximately one month after the miniatures have begun shipping.

 

This campaign has received the

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping

cost for single figure and full set

United States 10.15 USD,  23.40 USD

Europe 10.15 USD, 20.25 USD

Canada 13.25 USD, 15.60 USD

Everywhere else 10.90 USD, 23.40 USD

 

Risks and Challenges

This is my first crowdfunding campaign but I am confident that I'll be able to deliver on this as long as the campaign is funded.

With that being said, there are variables that I have no control over that may cause problems to occur. Whatever they may be I'll do what I can to ensure I pull through with this.

The figures will be cast and shipped from Canada and I will not have direct control over production. And shipping costs are what they are as further options weren't found, although it's beyond my control I apologize.

 

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

Your pledge gets you download access to the .stl files for all the rewards at your pledge level. and physical products if applicable. For the.stl files, access to a 3D printer (either your own or through a printing service) is needed to take advantage of the rewards. These digital files and the models you print with them are for PERSONAL USE ONLY. You may not sell models you print using our files, nor may you distribute the digital files or use any derivatives for commercial purposes. If you would like to sell printed versions of our models please contact us about an artisan or printer's licence.

story:
Welcome to Graphic Cheatsheet 2 - The Palettes! Our first project was so successful on Kickstarter Graphic Cheatsheet 1, we (@Fundamentool) decided to return with another deck! Have a look!

Our goal is to create a functional purpose within a deck of playing cards (so not just cards with a pretty face! ?), we wanted to keep the color aspect (as we think color naturally helps spark inspiration and creates a mood) and also some how integrate useful references that can be used on a daily basis, whether you are a Graphic Designer or someone who maybe look into that career pathway. At the same time we wanted to keep things simple so that anyone who picks up this deck can instantly understand its purpose (that is quite a challenging checklist!).  After testing several concepts, we ended up with The Palettes.

This time we used color palettes and combined it with useful and commonly used graphic terms, these infographic court cards will give Graphic Designers a quick and illustrative reference which they can use to share with their clients so they can quickly and easily understand these terms (this also helps get your client involved and interacting in the design process!), but most importantly, this means more time can be spent on Design! Have a look to see how we achieved this. Looking forward to seeing where this takes us, we hope to see your support! 

Features

  • Custom-Designed playing cards.
  • Custom Courts with illustrative diagrams and descriptions.
  • Custom Numbered Cards with hand selected color palettes on every card.
  • Two-Way Custom Backs which incorporates the face color palettes! (Consistency is everying!)
  • Printed in the USA by USPCC (United States Playing Card Company) with Traditional Cut.
  • Fulfilment in the USA by Murphy's Magic (Experts in shipping efficiency so you get these quicker!).

  • Shipment estimated to begin in July 2021.

The tuck box is an extension of the colored palettes from the numbered cards, the layout and design of the tuckbox is also reminiscent of the V1 tuckbox, we wanted to create a certain consistency between the two decks so visually they fit comfortably together. 

The Backs features the integration of the front color palettes which further develops into into a 2-way back design. 

The Numbered cards have been designed into integrate a set of 5 colors, with each card having a different set of color combinations. These will provide color themed inspirations for when searching for a group of colors to implement into your design. The CMYK code is provided for each color, so you can match exactly that color. Which is your favourite color card?  

The Courts have been redesigned with fun illustrative graphics to visually explain the differences between certain terminology that is commonly used in the graphic design industry. A useful descriptive explanation is also featured below the diagram to provide additional clarity and scenarios of where these can be implemented. 

The Jokers feature the two main color codes RGB and CMYK - these have a visual reference and a descriptor below (no more confusion and frantically searching the net to find an explanation, because you will have it right in front of you!).

We have selected USPCC (United States Playing Card Company) as our printing partner and Murphy's Magic as our fulfilment partner, they are both experts those industries worldwide and we have absolutely no doubts they have the capacity to execute this the post project requirements as professionally as possible.

Production (USPCC) & Fulfilment (Murphy's Magic)

- - - 

We have built strong and stable relationships with USPCC and Murphy's Magic to ensure the cards are printed at its best quality and fulfilled as quick as possible. The production and shipment of the cards can result in minor delays, but we've negotiated tight deadlines with our partners to ensure on-time delivery. Please note if you are an international backer, the shipping speed also depends on your local carrier, but we will try our best to ship out the decks ASAP. Although we are only a two-man team, we have experienced the potential delays that can happen after going through our first campaign with V1, those are all noted and we are driven to improve our service and communication to all our backers. We will always be here to answer your questions and concerns, you can either direct message us on here through Kickstarter or send us a message @Fundamentool on Instagram. Thank you for taking the time to go through this and we hope to see your support!

Sincerely,
- Dagan & Jason (@Fundamentool)

story:
Queeng Playing Cards v2.0 

 

The first ever, multi-ethnic deck of cards where men and women are equal.

 

Our Story, 

Queeng Playing​ Cards is a project that my father and I started on a family vacation 3 years ago. 

We were relaxing by playing a game of gin rummy when I turned to my dad and asked “Why is the queen card worth less than the king?” 

It was an innocent question, but when my dad couldn't come up with a good enough answer, we decided to do something about it. I created a new card system where the kings and queens are equal, but we still end up with a winner.  We swapped two jacks for lovely princesses and designed a female joker, and it was incredibly successful!

In just one year, we sold more than 50,000 decks to 15,000 backers all over the world!

 

 

You might be wondering why I am calling this "Part 2" of the story.

Well, though we got a lot of great feedback, we also heard from some supporters that our cards were not actually totally equal. I realized that a diversified representation of ethnicities wasn’t there, like it doesn't exist. This doesn’t actually represent the people of the world as we really are, and if we are going to give kids these cards to hold in their hands and play with, don't we want them to see an accurate depiction of the world?!

So here we are, at part 2! 

We went back to the drawing board and started from scratch. We wanted to make a deck that truly represents our world and celebrates our beautiful range of cultures and appearances! 

And so, I created the first ever multi-ethnic deck of cards, where, once again, men and women are equal but now with more colors and characteristics.

Queeng is an updated version of the classic deck of playing cards, but still works with ALL the original principles, so you can play ANY card game with it. 

With its attention to detail and gorgeous, hand-drawn illustrations, each deck is as special as the encouraging message it brings to the world ❤

 

What you'll get by sponsoring my project:

  • A Set of Playing Cards: 52 Playing Cards + 2 Jokers
  • New and improved illustrations with multi-ethnic face cards & jokers
  • Top casino-quality playing cards, 63 x 88 mm, round corners, 4 mm white border, printed on 300 Gr card board with CMYK ink, smooth finish + standard playing card varnish
  • Red & blue backs of cards when ordering more than 1 deck for easier sorting in multi-deck games
  • The option to choose right-handed or lefty decks (see sample card below)

  • Printing with Cartamundi, the #1 card printing company in the world!
  • Faster, more accurate shipping with Liberty Cards’ shipping services
  • For our 'serious backers,' we're offering awesome limited-edition signed decks and posters of our unique illustrations.

 

The Impact

By supporting me in making Queeng the default playing cards used around the world, you will be:

  • Teaching our children that men and women are equal
  • Showing our children that all races and ethnicities are equal
  • Supporting a kick-ass example of young entrepreneurship
  • Helping adapt a game we've known and loved for hundreds of years to our generation

 

So, how does it actually work?

 

We improved the cards, but adapted them to the old rules of the game. Since the hierarchy still matches the old cards, you can play all your favorite games with the same rules.

Monarch Cards = King Cards

 We called it Monarch, as a Monarch can be male or female.

Duchess or Duke Cards = Queen Cards

We called it Duchess or Duke so we could have both a man and a woman.

Prince or Princess Cards = Jack Cards

Jacks are now Princes and Princesses.

 

Press & Awards

2020 Winner of the People of Play TAGIE (Toy and Game International Excellence) Award

https://www.chitag.com/2020-tagies-toy-and-game-awards 

Read about us in the news!

  • Bust.com
  • Mumstrife.com
  • Forward
  • DH Net
  • The Gayly Mirror
  • Jerusalem Post
  • Hadassah Magazine

 

Testimonials:

 

Risks & Challenges

  • This is our 2nd campaign and the first one has been executed and delivered successfully, so we are confident that we can do it again!
  • The design of the cards has been finalized.
  • Prototypes have been printed and tested, as you see in the video.
  • Printing and shipping have been secured by reliable companies.
  • We expect to begin printing the cards by the end of the campaign.
  • We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product, on time. However, we are living in a new era where COVID-19 has affected shipping times both within the U.S. and internationally, and this causes shipping delays. Unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to working day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent with you.
  • Shipping does not cover import taxes and duties. You are responsible for paying the customs charge on your shipment if you live outside the U.S. 
  • We will provide you with a tracking number so you can see the journey of your package.
  • One decision  I made was that I didn't want to be front and center of our campaign. I'm pretty camera shy. So we got a great actress to play me and tell our story. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help share the important message of Queeng:

  • You can help spread the word and make some noise about our campaign across social media and by word of mouth.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to share Queeng with your family & friends!

Thank you for being a part of the Queeng family ❤️

Red & blue backs of cards when ordering more than 1 deck for easier sorting in multi-deck games
The option to choose right-handed or lefty decks (see sample card below)



Printing with Cartamundi, the #1 card printing company in the world!
Faster, more accurate shipping with Liberty Cards’ shipping services
For our 'serious backers,' we're offering awesome limited-edition signed decks and posters of our unique illustrations.

 

The Impact
By supporting me in making Queeng the default playing cards used around the world, you will be:

Teaching our children that men and women are equal
Showing our children that all races and ethnicities are equal
Supporting a kick-ass example of young entrepreneurship
Helping adapt a game we've known and loved for hundreds of years to our generation

 
So, how does it actually work?

 
We improved the cards, but adapted them to the old rules of the game. Since the hierarchy still matches the old cards, you can play all your favorite games with the same rules.

Monarch Cards = King Cards
 We called it Monarch, as a Monarch can be male or female.
Duchess or Duke Cards = Queen Cards
We called it Duchess or Duke so we could have both a man and a woman.
Prince or Princess Cards = Jack Cards
Jacks are now Princes and Princesses.
 
Press & Awards
2020 Winner of the People of Play TAGIE (Toy and Game International Excellence) Award
https://www.chitag.com/2020-tagies-toy-and-game-awards 


Read about us in the news!

Bust.com
Mumstrife.com
Forward
DH Net
The Gayly Mirror
Jerusalem Post
Hadassah Magazine

 
Testimonials:

 
Risks & Challenges

This is our 2nd campaign and the first one has been executed and delivered successfully, so we are confident that we can do it again!
The design of the cards has been finalized.
Prototypes have been printed and tested, as you see in the video.
Printing and shipping have been secured by reliable companies.
We expect to begin printing the cards by the end of the campaign.
We are confident in our ability to deliver a great product, on time. However, we are living in a new era where COVID-19 has affected shipping times both within the U.S. and internationally, and this causes shipping delays. Unforeseen events can occur in any business. In such a case, we are committed to working day and night in order to resolve any issue, and we will be 100% transparent with you.
Shipping does not cover import taxes and duties. You are responsible for paying the customs charge on your shipment if you live outside the U.S. 
We will provide you with a tracking number so you can see the journey of your package.
One decision  I made was that I didn't want to be front and center of our campaign. I'm pretty camera shy. So we got a great actress to play me and tell our story. 


Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help share the important message of Queeng:

You can help spread the word and make some noise about our campaign across social media and by word of mouth.
Use the Indiegogo share tools to share Queeng with your family & friends!

Thank you for being a part of the Queeng family ❤️

story:
Dangerous Destinations is the definitive guide to creating intriguing and dynamic destinations for storytelling and fantasy roleplaying games. Following the same model as our best selling book, 'Spectacular Settlements', Dangerous Destinations contains an easy-to-use, step by step builder system.

Start with one of twelve destination types, each of which has multiple variables that flesh out unique aspects of that destination. Next, place that destination in one of twelve environments, and continue the process of adding more and more detail. Then, discover the particular danger that exists within the destination created, including beasts, monsters, humanoids, magic, and events. Each danger has its own distinct flavor and modifiers, and each step in the process creates a more and more unique destination, even establishing plot hooks and many different motivations for quests.

Use Dangerous Destinations either as a planning tool, before your game session, or on the fly, to create unique locations for encounters, be they as simple as a troll’s den near the edge of a forest, or a vast labyrinth built deep underground by some long-forgotten culture. Our goal is to offer inspiration when creating locations within your fantasy world that are not only intriguing, but also exist regardless of interaction from the player characters. This helps to bring the world to life and enhance your storytelling.

  • 1. Destinations. A comprehensive selection of destination types including: burial grounds, camps, fortresses, headquarters, hideouts, outposts, religious sites, and many more.
  • 2. Environments. All of the standard environments found in most tabletop roleplaying games. These include: aquatic, coastal, desert, forest, jungle, mountains, plains, swamp, tundra, underground, urban, and extra-planar. 
  • 3. Dangers. From epic events, maniacal monsters, and vengeful villains, a myriad of possible dangers await your heroes.
  • 4. Antagonists. From the bandit leader to the campaign villain, this section of the book has a vast selection of antagonists.
  • 5. Pre-Generated Destinations. Need a destination now? Select from a huge variety created by our design team. Complete with overviews and exposition.

story:
Geeek Club models are like the Legos of the future: assembled using a soldering iron, printed circuit boards (PCB), specialized tools and electronic components.

Geeek Club is plugging directly into your sci fi nostalgia, and bringing kick-ass multi-legged WarMechs, and sleek Supercharged StarFighters to your Workbench! These totally unique, wildly coloured PCBS will push your thinking and test your skill. So put on your goggles, fire up your soldering iron, and turn it all the way up! Geeek Club’s CyberPunk PCB Puzzles are just waiting for you to put them together.


Our robots aren’t made with boring wood, or flimsy plastic… We’ve made our robots from with the building blocks of all robot brains: Printed Circuit Boards! These are structurally sound, but more importantly they have BUILT IN ELECTRICAL CIRCUITS AND CONNECTIONS, but without any trailing wires hanging out! Just fit the sections together, and the circuits are already complete.
 

 

 

 

Building Cyberpunk models is a fun challenge—learning the basics of electrical engineering is a bonus!

Typical electronic build kits can have 3-5 different PCBs on one panel, but our kits have 22 to 100+ pieces, ensuring you get a 100% unique product that gives you a doable challenge. Each kit contains many steps to build your finished model and there’s detailed soldering work, but you’ll learn the basics of electrical engineering, soldering skills, and how LEDs, microchips and resistors work.

Geeek Club’s Cyberpunk Models are challenging to assemble, but not so challenging that the process isn’t fun. Our detailed instruction manual has step-by-step instructions with graphical images, and we’ve published instructional videos to YouTube, so you always have a resource.

Geeek Club Cyberpunk PCB Model Kits are for ages 14+. Children should be supervised by an adult as there is a soldering component to these DIY construction kits. Please be sure to observe the proper safety precautions at all times.

story:
What is it?

In this material I provide a framework of an event and it's the responsibility of the DM to assign appropriate NPCs and locations that align with the mini adventures to integrate the stories within their world. I will format the adventures in an "ambiguous" way in order to make it easier for anyone to integrate and scale the event regardless of factors such as player level, location and even game system.

10 holiday themed horror stories will be included! Starting at only $1CAD, (Yes, one Canadian dollar.)

The Art.

I have been working together with a talented young Ohio based artist to prepare for the launch of this funding campaign.  Their talent can be viewed in the projects main image as well as in a simpler image below.  With the success on Kickstarter I've funded enough money to hire the artist for cover art and interior art.

Something about this snowman seems unsettling, no?

The Pages.

The pages of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular will be done in the same format as my previous compendium. 

Example of page layout as contained within Masque's Bite Sized Stories and Quick Encounters.

Example of page layout as contained within Masque's Bite Sized Stories and Quick Encounters.

Perks.

Settler ($1CAD) 

 A copy of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular (PDF).

Conqueror ($2CAD)

 A copy of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular (PDF).

 Your name in credits of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular.

Librarian ($7CAD)

A copy of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular (PDF).

Your name in credits of Masque's Bite Sized Stories: Holiday Spooktacular.

A copy of the standard edition of Masque's Bite Sized Stories and Quick Encounters (PDF).

story:
The origin of the Memory Game can be traced to a 12th-century Japanese game of shells called “Kai-awase” (貝合 "shell matching”).

A full kai-awase set consisted of 360 pairs of clamshells - each pair bearing the same image. The sources for these images were poetic, seasonal, literary, etc., and depicted everything from flowers to noblemen peeking into a room. The inside of a shell was first cleaned, then gilded and painted. Only the outside of the shell retained its natural look. 

The most common way of playing PAIRS is to mix all cards face down and arrange them in a grid. Players then flip two cards face up over each turn in search of a matching pair. If a player finds a pair, they get another turn. The object of the game is to find the most pairs.

PAIRS is best played by 2, 3, or 4 players and takes about 25 minutes with the full set of 90 cards (45 pairs). We suggest that the very young and those not so young start playing with fewer pairs. Warning: Team play with 6 players can get rowdy. You can also play solo to test/train your memory. 

The game is fast-paced, competitive, and requires strategic thinking. 

 

Hi. I’m one of the creators of this game and I’ve been playing Memory Card Games since the age of 5 when my family emigrated to Canada. My grandparents would send me PEXESO - sheets of matching cards which my older sister would cut into squares. I remember being good at the game despite being the youngest in the family. I remember cards featuring dog and horse breeds, castles and capitals of the world and my favourite cartoon figures. As the game was fun, learning and remembering were effortless and joyful. To this day, I still know that poodles don’t look at all like bulldogs, gazelles are not antelopes, Caracas and Calcutta are on different continents, Montevideo is the capital of Uruguay, there are lots of castles in Bohemia and my favourite horse is still the Clydesdale. Memory works in mysterious ways!

So when COVID shut down our travel business, we had to ask ourselves "What now?!". While self-isolating in our 'motorhome bubble', we spent September on a road-trip exploring the natural beauty and history of Yukon Territory and northern British Columbia and playing European Memory Card Games each evening with our daughter. In the heat of the game, one of us suggested Memory Card Games should become more available in North America as they are in Europe and Asia, where they’ve become a standard learning aid for children, an opportunity for all ages to play a quick, easy game and a popular souvenir and gift.

Since that first spark, we’ve been on fire, working full time on this project, without pay, investing our own savings, covering living expenses with COVID subsidies from our Canadian government.  So here we are, five months later, with our first game. Hurray!

WE WERE INTERVIEWED on CBC RADIO'S "ON THE COAST". Copy this link into your browser to hear the interview:  https://www.cbc.ca/listen/live-radio/1-46/clip/15828732

We’d like to thank our American friends, Scott and Morgan at JOVIAL GRAPHICS, for their patience and great design work and for guiding us through the production and printing process. Special thanks also go to Adrian at ECHOSITES Website Design, Ina and Manuel at KASHU Studio for the explainer video, and Jeannie at our printing company whose efforts to produce a quality product will be appreciated by all.

All photos featured in our game were taken by us - the founders of Pairs Unlimited.

We are avid RV travellers, hikers and passionate photographers.

The photos represent a selection of personal favourites - places we love and want to share. 

The Cards - quantity, size and quality matters:

  • 90 cards: 3x3”(76x76mm), 0.04”(1mm) thick
  • High-resolution colour photos
  • Glossy varnish on both sides
  • Location titles on each card

The Guidebook - 20 pages in colour:

  • Facts and a bit of history about each location
  • How to Play includes the dizzying “Spot the Pair”. 

The Box - simple, elegant design:

  • Sturdy 1500gsm cardboard
  • 157gsm art paper. Glossy finish
  • Telescopic lid for ease of opening
  • Worthy of any coffee table 

SHIPPING

Shipping will be charged as per actually shipping cost at the end of the campaign but will not exceed the amount quoted when you purchase a perk. As we are shipping the games from overseas and distributing from Vancouver, we are offering FREE DELIVERY if your shipping address is in Vancouver, British Columbia. For Greater Vancouver, the rest of British Columbia, the rest of Canada and any other shipping destination, please choose a regular perk so shipping costs can be added to your order. 

We offer retail prices for retails in British Columbia and the Yukon. If you are a retailer, please send an email to info@pairsunlimited.com with your store's website and contact info and we will send you a special offer!

story:
A second chance at an awesome resource!

The original Druids: Secrets of the Primal Circle Kickstarter campaign ran from July 20th to August 19th, 2021 and was successfully funded. We are offering this IndieGoGo campaign to anyone who missed out on that opportunity. Check out the original crowdfunding campaign below:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/druid-secrets/druids-secrets-of-the-primal-circle

 

Risks and challenges

All projects carry a risk; however, everything that could be done is being done to mitigate that risk. There is always the possibility of something unexpected happening. Games take time, energy, and resources to create. But our team's combined experience and commitment, we believe, will help us overcome any obstacles that might hinder the release of this book. We believe our target funding goal is sufficient to complete our vision for this product. If you're as excited about this book as we are, then join us!

But our team's combined experience and commitment, we believe, will help us overcome any obstacles that might hinder the release of this book. We believe our target funding goal is sufficient to complete our vision for this product. If you're as excited about this book as we are, then join us!

story:
Inequality-opoly is a custom property trading game that demonstrates how structural racism and sexism in America serve as impediments to accumulating wealth. In this game like in the real world, certain players based on their perceived identity enjoy privileges while others face obstacles to building wealth. 

            I am raising funds to manufacture and distribute as many games as possible throughout the country to spread awareness and advance discourse about the effects of structural racism and sexism in America, specifically how it creates and sustains wealth inequality.

            This project became a passion of mine after I recognized the need to make diversity, equity, and inclusion training more engaging and impactful. I figured it would be engaging and educational to make a property trading game that modeled the real-life effects of Sexism and Racism have on accumulating wealth. 

 This game addresses the following topics and more:

  • Inheritance
  • Race and Gender Pay Gap
  • Prison Industrial Complex
  • Mortgage Approval Rates
  • Entrepreneurship
  • Health Insurance Rates
  • Intimate Partner Violence Rates
  • Natural Disasters
  • Student Loan Debt
  • and more 

            This game does not claim to encompass or simulate the enormous complexity of Racism and Sexism in America. The game aims to focus on how Sexism and Racism effect the accumulation of wealth. The data in the game is based on recent national studies which can be found in the Inequality-opoly Index at www.inequalityopoly.com. 

Please find the game components below.

Thank you for your support!

story:
The Origin of Idea

We posted our initial designs of Rocket Science based playing cards on our Instagram Channel. The post was received very enthusiastically with tons of messages and comments. That was the point we decided to pursue with full efforts for a Deck of Playing cards on the theme of Rocket Science and SpaceX.

You can see the post here - Instagram Post

 

How the deck is organized?

The entire deck is themed on Rocket Science and SpaceX. Each Individual suits are sub-themed as follows:-

Hearts: Rocket Science Concepts

13 cards on various fundamental concepts related to Rocket Science. 3 of them shown below.

 

Clubs: Epic Orbital Rockets 

13 cards on epic orbital rockets of the world. Priority is given on the type of payload and any extra-ordinary features. 3 of them shown below.

 

Spades: Renowned Scientists and Innovators

13 cards on renowned scientists and innovators who have made significant contributions to the field of Rocket Science. 3 of them shown below.

 

Diamond: SpaceX, Falcon 9 and Falcon Heavy

13 cards dedicated to Falcon 9, Falcon Heavy and various others tested works of SpaceX. 3 of them shown below.

 

Jokers

Just in case you got friends(!) who are flat-earthers. You got one card for them! And one card for a person whom we all love a lot - Elon Musk!

 

Background

We wanted the cards' backside to share the story of the evolution of rockets. A trio of past, present and future images is what we came up with.

 

Packaging

This is what you will get in your hands -

 

Quality 

  • 100% plastic (PVC), 310 GSM, 290 microns, Premium printing.
  • Resistance to bending, tear, and water (ensuring long-term life)
  • Front side: Matte finish (textured) for good grip.
  • Backside: Semi-glossy, for an aesthetic look.

All this has been discussed with our manufacturing team and actual cards from the portfolio passed the above-mentioned specifications. Feel free to comment/message us for any suggestions or feedback or queries on the above.

Technical Specifications 

We Need Your Support

We need your support and backing to meet the minimum order quantity required for starting the production. Your continuous support in the design of cards and content has already helped in bringing this project to the current stage. On the accomplishment of the Kickstarter goal, we will be able to meet the required cost quoted by the manufacturing team and get the Rocket Deck in your hands.

Any queries - reply promised in 24 hours

Feel free to directly message us on Instagram or simply shoot an email to - spacexfalcontech [at] gmail.com. We promise you of getting your query addressed in 24 hours. Maximum. Any day of the week.

Timeline

 

Special Thanks 

We would like to take this opportunity to thank two people who connected with us on Instagram and volunteered to help us in this project - 

1. Maÿa Cantú Ledezma, a card collector, and creative artist from Mexico. She helped in deciding the technical specifications, card quality and provided nice design critique.

2. Christian Seiser, a card collector, and designer from Germany. He did extensive design review for some of the cards and helped in fine-tuning of the cards' design.

13 cards on various fundamental concepts related to Rocket Science. 3 of them shown below.

 
Clubs: Epic Orbital Rockets 
13 cards on epic orbital rockets of the world. Priority is given on the type of payload and any extra-ordinary features. 3 of them shown below.

 
Spades: Renowned Scientists and Innovators
13 cards on renowned scientists and innovators who have made significant contributions to the field of Rocket Science. 3 of them shown below.

 
Diamond: SpaceX, Falcon 9 and Falcon Heavy
13 cards dedicated to Falcon 9, Falcon Heavy and various others tested works of SpaceX. 3 of them shown below.

 
Jokers
Just in case you got friends(!) who are flat-earthers. You got one card for them! And one card for a person whom we all love a lot - Elon Musk!

 
Background
We wanted the cards' backside to share the story of the evolution of rockets. A trio of past, present and future images is what we came up with.

 
Packaging
This is what you will get in your hands -

 
Quality 

100% plastic (PVC), 310 GSM, 290 microns, Premium printing.
Resistance to bending, tear, and water (ensuring long-term life)
Front side: Matte finish (textured) for good grip.
Backside: Semi-glossy, for an aesthetic look.

All this has been discussed with our manufacturing team and actual cards from the portfolio passed the above-mentioned specifications. Feel free to comment/message us for any suggestions or feedback or queries on the above.
Technical Specifications 

We Need Your Support
We need your support and backing to meet the minimum order quantity required for starting the production. Your continuous support in the design of cards and content has already helped in bringing this project to the current stage. On the accomplishment of the Kickstarter goal, we will be able to meet the required cost quoted by the manufacturing team and get the Rocket Deck in your hands.
Any queries - reply promised in 24 hours
Feel free to directly message us on Instagram or simply shoot an email to - spacexfalcontech [at] gmail.com. We promise you of getting your query addressed in 24 hours. Maximum. Any day of the week.
Timeline

 
Special Thanks 
We would like to take this opportunity to thank two people who connected with us on Instagram and volunteered to help us in this project - 
1. Maÿa Cantú Ledezma, a card collector, and creative artist from Mexico. She helped in deciding the technical specifications, card quality and provided nice design critique.
2. Christian Seiser, a card collector, and designer from Germany. He did extensive design review for some of the cards and helped in fine-tuning of the cards' design.

story:
Inspired by the courage, strength and resilience exhibited by the students who submitted over 50,000 masks for our Million Mask Movement, we brought to life

"Ever Forward Club:
The Adventure Game"!
 

We have created something completely new and different to our community and the Card Game Space.  Combining our 15+ years of experience working with thousands of kids, we took our deep understanding of social emotional learning and turned it into a Universe that kids themselves can become part of - maybe even a character in our future expansion packs! 

More and more research points to social and emotional skills — like cooperating and helping others — as the foundation of thriving in life. Students with strong skills in these areas get along better with their peers. They’re also more likely to graduate from high school and get a full-time job.

We aim to introduce kids worldwide to the social emotional universe of the Ever Forward Club - The Adventure Game by equipping every teacher with their own deck and providing more kids the the ability to identify their feelings and express them in healthy ways. .

10 Unique roles to choose from, by the players to form the Team.  All Characters have the ability to answer challenges from the ‘Behind The Mask’ or from 'In Front Of The Mask'. 

Answering in front of the mask, face your character card downward and this means that you don’t wish to ( answer the question from a deep place)  open up. This will only earn you the lower point value of the card.

To answer from behind the mask, keep the character card facing up and go-deep with your answer truthfully answer the printed question. This will earn you the higher point value of the card.

 

Challenge Cards: 

70 cards - 5 variants of challenge cards that have varied questions on them. Each of the 5 variants correspond to a different category of questions. Each card has two point values printed on the bottom.  The lower value is the points earned by being in ‘Front of the Mask’, and the higher value is the points earned by answering the question ‘Behind the Mask’.

 

Location/Destination/ Adventure Path Cards: 

10 unique locations that represent your journey and the difficulty of the Team’s trials. Every destination card has a description and a point goal needed to pass. The points value is multiplied by the number of players in the game to determine the goal. (Example: An easy ‘Destination’ goal is 4 points X [player symbol])

Ever Forward Club: The Adventure Game isn't "just a kids game"

Yes, it is a game kids can play, but it is also 100% a game adults can play with each other.  You can play with your kids, with your significant other, with friends, and your friend's kids. Each experience will be different and fun in its own way. 

A ton of effort has been put into the gameplay design to create experiences that foster communication, understanding and teamwork as you choose whether you will answer from Behind The Mask vs In Front Of The Mask. 

  1. Shuffle and Place Cards
  2. Answer from Behind the Mask, or In Front of the Mask Earn the corresponding points: 
  3. Team Challenge
  4. Rescue Team Member
  5. Beat that destination

Rescue 5 Team Members from 5 Dangerous destinations.

10 unique roles taken on by the players to form the Team.


 

 

With over 19 years mentoring youth and 10 of those years as a math teacher educating inner city youth, Ashanti was awarded with a Fulbright Exchange Fellowship to India, a Rotary Club Cultural Ambassadorial Fellowship to Mexico and a 2010 Teacher of the Year Award from the Alameda-Contra Costa County Math Educators.

Mr. Branch is on a mission to change the way that students interact with their education and the way schools interact with students.

Our vision is to provide  1,000 Teachers and Educators who are under resourced, for FREE, our MILLION MASK MOVEMENT FRAMEWORK TRAINING  and THE ADVENTURE CARD GAME DECKS to provide a fun way that utilizes social emotional learning to foster deeper connection!

We aim to create an expansion pack with even more characters that players can relate with.

This campaign will support 400 Teachers.

We aim to keep this campaign going long after we reach our goal so we can reach 1,000 Teachers and more.

​

 

Currently in the Production Phase

Shipping scheduled to release Summer 2021
 

 

Building Character.  Transforming Lives.

 

The Ever Forward Club is a program out of Oakland California.  It was started by Ashanti Branch at Montera Middle School.

 

At the Ever Forward Club, we believe that all young men have the desire to be fully alive –– to be loved, respected, held in high regard, held to high expectations, held accountable for their actions and supported to help achieve their goals. But too many young men –– particularly underserved and at-risk young men of color –– have been forced to hide the dreams and hopes within them. They think they have it all figured out. They don’t, and it’s no secret why.

Learn more at: everforwardclub.org

story:
Chili Mafia is part of the Lemery Games Globetrotter Series. Each suitcase (game box) takes special agents to a new country, armed with the items necessary to complete an important secret mission. Collect the entire series and play your way around the globe.

We’re busy organizing future missions, and we need your help! Visit lemerygames.com for a sneak peek at our plans, and to vote on your next travel destination.

 

 

 

 

             

.            

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Our team. Chili Mafia is the first creation of Lemery Games that was successfully funded on Kickstarter, but it isn't our first entrepreneurial project. Tamas has been through the ideation, design, testing, manufacturing, sales, and delivery process before, bringing to life an international tea brand (Tassyam) with a friend. As an employer branding manager, Krisztina is creative, organized, and knows how to prioritize. Over the past 15 months, our team has followed and backed dozens of Kickstarter projects and spent endless hours reading about how to build a successful Kickstarter campaign, so we know what it is like to be a backer, too.

Shipping. While we believe we’ve thought of detail to make this campaign happen, we are only human, and expect minor flaws could occur. Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic and current worldwide freight and VAT compliance difficulties, the final cost and time to deliver the game to each backer may change. However, we have consulted with more than 20 fulfilment companies around the world to estimate a shipping cost that is as accurate as possible. If and when things change, we promise we'll do our best to correct and mitigate any changes with a great sense of urgency.

Refund. We charge a 25% fee for every refund requested. This covers the platform fee + payment gateway fee + currency conversion fee which we have to incur.

Making the best game possible. We sent out 50+ prototypes to curious fans and content creators to collect feedback on materials, gameplay, layouts, and designs. We’ve been through more than 300 playtests, and we’ve had our rulebook written and proofread by a professional in the field. We are confident that Chili Mafia is a game anyone would cherish opening and playing for the first time, and for years to come.

Taking care of backers. Our no. 1 priority is the Community we are building. We are more than thankful to each and every supporter of Chili Mafia. Without you, Lemery Games would not exist! And we know that. We believe it is together, that we can make the highest quality games! Therefore, ff you have any comments, suggestions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to message us directly!

Thank you for believing in Lemery Games!

story:
Un mensaje de las co-fundadoras

Esta campaña cerró el día 26 de Marzo, 2021; la misma, en su mayor parte, mostró nuestro primer sueño -- la colección SuperLatinas. Al momento de cierre, estábamos en proceso de colección de autorización de uso de imágenes, y explorando alianzas con fundaciones que tienen nuestros mismos objetivos, todo esto previo a la manufactura y comercialización de la colección. Además, iniciábamos el proceso de diseño de otras piezas de nuestra colección permanente, que celebra Latinoamérica desde una perspectiva más integral y amplia. Para conocer más de la actualidad de Dutidú, LLC visite nuestro website www.dutidu.com o encuéntrenos en las redes sociales como @dutiduoficial. 

Gracias de corazón a todos los que nos apoyaron durante nuestra primera campaña.

Marie Claire y María Victoria

-----

A message from the co-founders

This campaign closed on March 26, 2021; for the most part, it showcased our first dream - the SuperLatinas collection. At the time of closing, we were in the process of collecting the authorization for the use of images, and exploring partnerships with foundations that have our same objectives, all this prior to the manufacture and commercialization of the collection. In addition, we began the process of designing other pieces from our permanent collection, which celebrates Latin America from a more comprehensive perspective. To learn more about what Dutidú, LLC is doing, visit our website www.dutidu.com or find us on social media as @dutiduoficial.

A heartfelt thanks to everyone who supported us during our first campaign.

Marie Claire & María Victoria
